320072004.speaker: 燃烧疤痕成员A
320072004.content: B-Boss... I don't think this is working... She must be using some kind of protheses...

320072005.speaker: 伽梨
320072005.content: Just hang back and enjoy the show, Longville. All of your minions will fall sooner or later.

320072006.content: As Longville's lackeys look at him, their gazes change slightly. He stares at the injured gang members on the ground for some time before snorting coldly and stepping forward.

320072007.content: He walks with even, steady strides, treating the wounded men like stairs. Finally, he arrives in front of Kali.

320072008.speaker: 伽梨
320072008.content: Once someone sets foot here at Meruism, no one has the right to take them away.

320072009.content: Longville smiles, slugging Kali with an unexpected punch. His brass knuckles strike her gauntlet, spraying dazzling sparks into the air.

320072010.speaker: 朗维尔
320072010.content: Is there a single prosthesis specialist in Gharpur who could imbue your tiny body with such explosive power? Looks like I'm not the only one using "outside guns."

320072012.speaker: 朗维尔
320072012.content: You think your hypocritical accusations make Meruism look more honorable? Order, peace... Heheh... Just look at your fists.

320072013.speaker: 朗维尔
320072013.content: Those who forget how to fight deserve to die. The fists of the survivors are caked in blood... That's Gharpur!

320072014.content: Longville shoves Kali away and takes a few steps backward as if he is preparing to launch another attack.

320072015.content: Kali observes Longville cautiously, getting ready for a fight. However, the expected attack never comes. Instead, a mocking grin spreads across his face.

320072019.content: Sparks erupt in the darkness. Kali darts back and takes cover. The Meruism members hiding in nearby buildings unexpectedly rush out together, guarding Kali.

320072020.content: Meanwhile, a blue tracer bullet is fired from the Meruism rooftop. It pierces the night sky overhead and lands on a distant roof, followed by a scream.

320072021.speaker: 朗维尔
320072021.content: Meruism has opened fire! Arm yourselves and move in!

320072022.speaker: 弥楼衍成员B
320072022.content: You're the f***ing ones who fired first!

320072023.content: The gunfire quickly devolves into rampant chaos. The crowd that Kali held off surges forward again, colliding with Meruism's supporters.

320072024.content: Multiple nearby streets that were previously quiet are suddenly completely illuminated by flashlights, rapidly approaching the Meruism building located at the intersection.

320072025.speaker: 弥楼衍成员B
320072025.content: S***! An ambush from the next block over! Where are all these people coming from!?

320072028.content: After bolting to the front, a member of the Burning Scars lights the makeshift bomb in his hand and winds up to toss it. However, someone trips him and he falls to the ground.

320072030.content: The molotov cocktail that slips from his hand leaves him instantly panicked, and he scrambles backward on his hands and feet. But when he looks up, he realizes the entire street has suddenly gone silent.

320072031.content: A man over two meters tall holds the molotov in his hand and proceeds to extinguish the flaming rag with his clothes. He ignores the lackey, walking back to the sidewalk and standing at attention like a soldier greeting his king.

320072032.content: Throughout the entire street, men and women seemingly appear out of nowhere, in numbers ten times greater than Longville's men. They take the agitators' weapons in complete silence and stand on the sidewalk, gazing at the Meruism door.

320072033.content: To be more precise, they are gazing at the petite figure exiting the Meruism building.

320072034.speaker: 朗维尔
320072034.content: Brahmā... looks like you found quite a few helpers.

320072035.speaker: 梵天
320072035.content: Meruism still has an... honorable reputation in Gharpur.

320072036.speaker: 梵天
320072036.content: Whoever's backing you, this is just excessive.

320072037.speaker: 朗维尔
320072037.content: What... are you so cocky about!?

320072038.content: As he watches Brahmā casually stroll down the street, Longville clenches his fists and barrels forward. But even as he charges right at her, he feels as if she is moving farther away...

320072039.content: By the time unbearable pain awakens Longville from the momentary breakdown of his consciousness, his body has already slammed into the ground. The remaining energy sends him skidding across the ground, leaving a long red streak on the bumpy Gharpur street.

320072040.speaker: 伽梨
320072040.content: ...Don't even think about laying a finger on Boss Brahmā.

320072042.speaker: 伽梨
320072042.content: I blocked it. I'm fine. Compared to this—

320072043.content: She slowly withdraws her fist, watching the Burning Scars retreat with an icy stare. She stands amidst the rain in the center of the intersection like an unshakable wall.

320081001.speaker: 我
320081001.content: ...That's basically what happened. Ver is looking after Lil' Osi. I'll let you know when she wakes up.

320081002.speaker: 休
320081002.content: So much has gone down on your first day in Shashvat... Who would've guessed?

320081004.speaker: 我
320081004.content: This is usually how things go at Aether Gazer.

320081005.speaker: 休
320081005.content: You didn't bargain like that when you first joined Aether Gazer.

320081006.speaker: 我
320081006.content: We all have to grow up sometime.

320081007.speaker: 休
320081007.content:
Anyway, I'm glad you're all okay.
I'll ask Odin about the Access Key when she gets back.

320081008.speaker: 休
320081008.content: I have no idea what she "saw"... She didn't prepare me for this at all.

320081009.speaker: 休
320081009.content: I feel like I could become a pawn in her scheme at any time, but I don't know what she wants us to do. I have no idea what to expect. And any time I want to ask her, she's nowhere to be found...

320081010.speaker: 我
320081010.content: Heh, it's rare to hear you complain like this.

320081011.speaker: 休
320081011.content: You've been through a lot, so I'm sure you understand. Or do you want me to act more like a teacher around you?

320081012.speaker: 我
320081012.content: I barely managed to graduate. I'd rather not relive that experience.

320081013.speaker: 我
320081013.content: I just think most people at Aether Gazer think you're a reliable guy—that you'd rather find a solution than complain. But everyone has their own problems to deal with.

320081015.speaker: 休
320081015.content: ...Yeah. Ever since she took me under her wing, I've thought she was extremely capable, like there was no problem she couldn't solve. But in all of Aether Gazer, she probably has the most to worry about.

320081016.speaker: 休
320081016.content: Stuff she didn't want to say, couldn't say, or didn't know if she should say... She probably has a million reasons to hide things from me. Over time, it's gotten harder and harder to understand her.

320081017.speaker: 我
320081017.content: But you still trust her more than anyone else does, right?

320081018.speaker: 休
320081018.content: Who said she was perfect? That time with the Crow God, you know she temporarily transferred me to Jokurr.

320081019.speaker: 休
320081019.content: But even if you completely trust her judgment, you might have avoided that mess today if she'd just given you a little more information...

320081020.speaker: 我
320081020.content: She always says, "That's part of my visions," and refuses to reveal any information. Maybe she's already seen this exact conversation in her visions.

320081021.speaker: 休
320081021.content: If that's true, she's going to tell you off for talking about her in her own visions.

320081022.content: Shu and I both smile. As we hear footsteps approaching, I remain silent for a few moments to identify their owner. I pull my eyes away from the retreating Burning Scars and turn to lean against the guard rail, picking up the box next to me.

320081023.speaker: 我
320081023.content: Kali's here. I think she's looking for me.

320081024.speaker: 休
320081024.content: Contact me if anything happens. If you run into a real problem, Division Nine has some on-hand personnel that can assist you.

320081025.speaker: 我
320081025.content: I won't hesitate to let you know if we need help. I just hope it doesn't come to that...

320081026.content: My eyelids twitch as I say this. I hang up the call with a bitter smile and turn to wave at Kali. She walks toward me, two cans of milk tea in hand.

320081029.speaker: 伽梨
320081029.content: It was a big racket, but injuries were minimal... It's a good thing I got shot. Anyone else, and they probably wouldn't have been able to block it.

320081030.content: I open the can of milk tea Kali tossed over as we lean against the guardrail side by side. She glances at the box in my hand, then turns around to look out at the vast view afforded by the building.

320081031.speaker: 伽梨
320081031.content: Boss Brahmā said you were the one who discovered the ambush on the nearby streets, and you handled the gunman on the opposite side. Thanks.

320081032.speaker: 我
320081032.content: I just unloaded his gun. I don't like people firing at my companions or the place I'm staying.

320081033.speaker: 我
320081033.content: Speaking of Brahmā... seeing her like that was kind of unbelievable. She's small, but she's incredibly powerful. The Burning Scars shut right up when she came out.

320081034.speaker: 伽梨
320081034.content: Pfft, you've got it all wrong... Somewhere like Gharpur, a girl like her leading a gang would be really weird.

320081035.speaker: 伽梨
320081035.content: Whenever Boss Brahmā goes out, she uses her powers to disguise herself. She looks more mature to everyone else.

320081036.speaker: 我
320081036.content: That's amazing... Ah, "disintegration and reconstruction," right? I guess it makes sense.

320081037.speaker: 我
320081037.content: What about you? I watched you fighting without any Divine Power from up here. It was just like an action movie. Does it mess with your head?

320081038.speaker: 伽梨
320081038.content: Well... not really. I grew up on the streets, after all. Fighting is just second nature. It's like eating a meal.

320081039.speaker: 我
320081039.content: Could you really survive three square fights a day?

320081040.speaker: 伽梨
320081040.content: Ah, not that often. It was more like once every two or three days.

320081041.speaker: 伽梨
320081041.content: Getting wrapped up in gang fights, scrapping over leftovers, hanging out at underground boxing rings to earn an appearance fee... You hesitate, you get hit. That's how Gharpur used to be.

320081042.speaker: 伽梨
320081042.content: After Boss Brahmā took me in, life got a lot easier. But every time I walk down these streets, I still feel like the brat who used to tussle over a bite of food. I'm nothing without Meruism.

320081043.speaker: 伽梨
320081043.content: ...Isn't it weird? I don't need to fight anymore, but I still think like that.

320081044.speaker: 伽梨
320081044.content: It seems like everyone around me is always busy, doing what they can to make Gharpur a better place. Boss Brahmā makes the rules, Kubera brings in the money, and Vati calmly handles all sorts of conflicts...

320081045.speaker: 我
320081045.content: Your work at the orphanage and boxing gym has helped a lot of people.

320081046.speaker: 伽梨
320081046.content: Yeah, people always say that. But I feel like I'm just patting myself on the back, or trying to be like everyone else.

320081047.speaker: 伽梨
320081047.content: ...You know what? When Longville stood in front of me today, there was so much anger in his eyes—like he'd happily tear himself to pieces if it meant he could watch us crumble.

320081048.speaker: 伽梨
320081048.content: I don't know where that anger came from, but it felt familiar... It reminded me of my own eyes in the mirror every morning after washing my face.

320081049.speaker: 伽梨
320081049.content: ...What do I want to see crumble?

320081050.content: Kali looks down at her fists, clenching them tightly before slowly loosening her grip. As if she suddenly snaps back to her senses, she shrugs, smiles helplessly, and looks over at me.

320081051.speaker: 伽梨
320081051.content: Geez. I'm acting all sappy after one little gunshot.

320081052.speaker: 伽梨
320081052.content: I'm just complaining. I'll feel better after I sweat it out at the boxing ring.

320081053.speaker: 我
320081053.content: Everyone has stuff on their mind. If you can find someone to lend an ear late at night, when everyone else is asleep, it'll be easier to let it out.

320081054.speaker: 伽梨
320081054.content: Then I owe you one. If you ever have something on your mind, I'm all ears.

320081055.speaker: 我
320081055.content: That isn't something you'd typically plan for... Ah, right—speaking of feeling better, I want to run something by you.

320081056.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320081056.content: Are you going to investigate downtown? Count me in!

320081057.speaker: 我
320081057.content: CORG only suspects that big companies in Jivitabad are tied to the Cognizant Visbanes. I'm going there to conduct some contactless investigations and take a look at Kubera's route from earlier. Don't get too excited.

320081058.speaker: 我
320081058.content: Kali will be there. We're totally new to Jivitabad, so we need a guide more than a bodyguard.

320081059.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320081059.content: I'm... still a little worried. You've both been hurt. Let me go with you.

320081060.speaker: 我
320081060.content: I know why you're worried. I'd normally bring you along, but Lil' Osi still hasn't woken up...

320081061.content: I glance over at Osiris lying on the bed. She doesn't show any signs of waking up. The device reading her vital signs flashes with a green light.

320081062.speaker: 我
320081062.content: That Access Key might still have a lingering effect on Osiris and Ausar. If something like that happens again, I need you here to protect her.

320081063.speaker: 我
320081063.content: Brahmā has a lot of important stuff to take care of. We can't exactly ask her to look after Osiris. I trust you more than anyone to handle it.

320081064.speaker: 伽梨
320081064.content: Don't worry. I'll make sure no one lays a finger on your Administrator. Even if we happen to run into Ravana, I always have the "secret weapon" I didn't use last time.

320081065.content: Ver places her hand on her chest, clearly still worried. I walk over to her, rubbing her shoulder gently. After some time, her shoulders relax.

320081066.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320081066.content: You're reminding me more and more of Miss Shu...

320081067.speaker: 我
320081067.content: Does that mean I'm getting more dependable too?

320081068.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320081068.content: That wasn't a compliment... Well, just let me know if you need anything. I'll come find you right away.

320082001.speaker: 我
320082001.content: It looks like the downtown area is just up ahead... Ah, you guys call it the "Affluent District," right?

320082002.speaker: 伽梨
320082002.content: It's all the same. You're not from Gharpur, so just call it whatever you like.

320082003.content: The motorcycle comes to a stop next to a sign delineating the boundary between the Affluent District and the Slums. We walk closer to read it, but it is completely covered in graffiti.

320082004.speaker: 我
320082004.content: This graffiti is all really... aggressive.

320082005.speaker: 伽梨
320082005.content: Anyone who came this far out to tag something is probably doing it to vent their frustration.

320082006.speaker: 伽梨
320082006.content: A lot of people hold a real grudge against the Affluent District. Those companies have trampled on everything—their relatives, friends, work, and even their lives.

320082007.speaker: 伽梨
320082007.content: They hear about things happening once, twice, three times... after the hundredth time, they don't even need a reason to hate them anymore.

320082008.content: The area between the sign and the towering wall surrounding the Affluent District is like a wasteland, the sun beating down on the profane graffiti. Up ahead, the distant skyscrapers are a far cry from ivory castles.

320082009.speaker: 我
320082009.content: Maybe I'm being careless. If you don't want to go into the Affluent District, I can go by myself.

320082010.speaker: 伽梨
320082010.content: Not happening. I promised Verthandi. What would I tell her if something happened to you?

320082011.speaker: 伽梨
320082011.content: After I beat up Longville last night, I'm just worried someone in the Affluent District might recognize me and cause you trouble.

320082012.speaker: 伽梨
320082012.content: If those big companies really have something to do with the Cognizant Visbanes like CORG suspects, it might be hard for you to investigate with a target on your back.

320082013.content: Deliberate action is the key to disrupting secret schemes.

320082015.speaker: 伽梨
320082015.content: Okay, okay. You're underestimating me! I als—

320082016.content: Just as Kali is about to retort, we hear the sudden roar of an engine in the distance. A convoy arranged in an abnormal formation zooms past us, kicking up a cloud of sand.

320082018.speaker: 我
320082018.content: They must be going at least 80 miles per hour, right? Vati wasn't even driving that fast when she brought us to Meruism. Can the roads in Gharpur handle that?

320082019.speaker: 伽梨
320082019.content: Infinite Power and Biotech... Why are they coming into Gharpur?

320082020.content: At 09:37, Parvati lifts up her blanket to glance at a message on her communicator.

320082022.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320082022.content: After that mess last night, he's back for more? I've got to figure out a plan...

320082023.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320082023.content: Whatever. I'm going to sleep. I'll figure it out when I wake up.

320082024.content: Parvati slips back into bed and closes her eyes, her mind racing.

320082025.speaker: 伽梨
320082025.content: What are we doing at the Infinite Power equipment shop?

320082026.content: Even in the daytime, the streets in the Affluent District flash with neon lights. I drag Kali over to a storefront and peer through the window.

320082027.content: Pristine display cabinets showcase a vivid array of violent weapons. Even with an Ain Soph salary, the products offered here are extremely pricey.

320082028.speaker: 我
320082028.content: Kubera said he met two people at that gala—one was Jiveka from Biotech, and the other was Mandeviya from Infinite Power.

320082029.speaker: 我
320082029.content: His conversation with Mandeviya didn't go so well. I heard he's the one backing Longville. Kubera got attacked right after he left the venue, so he definitely had something to do with it.

320082030.speaker: 我
320082030.content: And it would make sense if Ravana was really the one who attacked Kubera. He was a boxer in Gharpur and had ties to Infinite Power.

320082031.speaker: 伽梨
320082031.content: But we can't just barge into Infinite Power and confront them. That would be way too obvious... Why don't we start here?

320082032.speaker: 店主
320082032.content: Hey! You there, from the Slums! Why are you hanging around my door?

320082033.content: Wearing an inpatient frown, a pot-bellied shop owner strolls out from behind the front desk and over to the door. He is clearly in good health, but he still walks with a gaudy cane, as if it's some kind of king's scepter.

320082034.speaker: 店主
320082034.content: If you're hungry, go find a restaurant. Don't interfere with my business.

320082035.speaker: 伽梨
320082035.content: We'd like to come in and have a look.

320082036.speaker: 店主
320082036.content: "Look"? I don't make money when you "look." If you can't afford anything in here, why should I let you in? Now get movin—

320082037.content: The sharp sound of the cane pounding on the ground abruptly stops as I place my hand on the top. I lightly shake my head at Kali, who has clenched her fists, then turn my attention back to the owner.

320082039.speaker: 我
320082039.content: This is a business, isn't it? Don't be so close-minded. Anyone could be a potential customer.

320082040.content: I pull my business card out of my pocket and wave it in front of his face. The man is stunned as he takes the card from me. As he stares at it, beads of cold sweat slowly develop on his forehead.

320082041.speaker: 店主
320082041.content: S-Strategic Consultant at Aether Gazer? Ain Soph Commercial Alliance...

320082042.speaker: 店主
320082042.content: My apologies, Sir... I mostly focus on local business, so I didn't recognize you as an outsider. It was senseless of me to raise my voice just now... And who is this?

320082044.speaker: 我
320082044.content: A friend of mine. Just treat her like you would treat me. Is that alright, Sir?

320082045.speaker: 店主
320082045.content: Of course! No problem at all. Please, come in. If you two are interested in fighting, I'd be happy to show you around...

320082047.content: As we listen to the owner blather on, I lead Kali around the store, acting pretentious.

320082048.speaker: 我
320082048.content: You seem to know a lot about the Infinite Fight Night. Do you know all the boxers competing?

320082049.speaker: 店主
320082049.content: Of course. I'm practically part of the community. I know I've put on a few pounds, but I competed in the trials back in the day.

320082050.speaker: 我
320082050.content: I'm curious about someone named Ravana. He might be a boxer, a coach, or even an agent... Have you heard of him?

320082052.speaker: 店主
320082052.content: Ah! A while back, about half a year ago, there was a boxer from the Slums named Ravana. He didn't compete in the Infinite Fight Night though. He only won a few B-level tournaments.

320082053.speaker: 店主
320082053.content: I heard the Infinite Fight Night manager personally invited him. He seemed really interested at first, but I didn't see him again after that. He must have gone back to the Slums.

320082054.speaker: 伽梨
320082054.content: Half a year ago? He must have gone to get ready for...

320082055.speaker: 我
320082055.content: Right. Do you know anything else about Ravana? Has he been in contact with any other boxers, managers, or higher-ups?

320082056.speaker: 店主
320082056.content: I... I'm not too sure. I just own this store.

320082057.speaker: 店主
320082057.content: Take care, Sir. If you happen to run into Mr. Mandeviya and mention my humble store, I'd be eternally grateful!

320082058.content: After exchanging pleasantries with the owner, Kali and I walk back to the street. We hop on the motorcycle and continue searching for our next clue.

320082059.speaker: 伽梨
320082059.content: ...Are you really a "strategic consultant" or whatever?

320082060.speaker: 我
320082060.content: Heh, I tricked you too? I'm busy enough at Division Nine. It's just a fake to make things easier.

320082061.speaker: 伽梨
320082061.content: If I didn't know you, I might have really believed it. You acted so natural...

320082062.speaker: 伽梨
320082062.content: Unlike the owner of that store... It's obvious he wasn't being honest. He was hiding something.

320082063.speaker: 我
320082063.content: He relies on the boxing gym to make a living. There's no way he'd reveal sensitive information to an outsider like me, especially about Mandeviya. He could lose his job if he said too much.

320082064.speaker: 伽梨
320082064.content: What's the point of all this? I just don't get it...

320082065.speaker: 我
320082065.content: Who are you talking about? Ravana or Mandeviya?

320082066.speaker: 伽梨
320082066.content: Both. To me, heads of big corporations like that are just like Cognizant Visbanes. They're pretty much a different species—I don't understand them at all.

320082067.speaker: 我
320082067.content: Well, just in terms of scale, Aether Gazer is bigger than Biotech or Infinite Power...

320082068.speaker: 伽梨
320082068.content: Don't overthink it! I wasn't saying you guys are evil or anything... But to be honest, if I got thrown into your world, I probably wouldn't understand it.

320082069.speaker: 伽梨
320082069.content: But for the record, Boss Brahmā and Miss Odin are friends, so you and I... are friends too. I trust you guys. That's enough.

320082072.speaker: 伽梨
320082072.content: What does that mean? Does it have something to do with the Cognizant Visbanes?

320082073.speaker: 我
320082073.content: Probably not. After all, Gaea isn't too stable right now. Occasional computational power issues are pretty normal.

320082074.speaker: 我
320082074.content: But it does have something to do with the underlying architecture of Gaea. That means we need to be cautious. I'll send it to the Cryptics and have them take a look... What's over in that direction?

320082075.speaker: 伽梨
320082075.content: Just some big companies, I think. ProWay Information, Biotech, and...

320082076.content: Kali looks over in the direction I'm pointing. She suddenly notices an advertisement for an investment opportunity illuminated on the large city square screen.

320082077.speaker: 伽梨
320082077.content: ..."Planning and construction for the new industrial park in the North District of Gharpur is now underway. Investment opportunities are still available"...

320082078.speaker: 伽梨
320082078.content: Those people who just drove by were... construction workers!?

320091001.speaker: 记者
320091001.content: The robbery of a Biotech shipment in Gharpur has been solved by the police. The prime suspect has been identified as Yudini, the leader of the "Midnight Thorns," a gang in the North District of Gharpur.

320091002.speaker: 记者
320091002.content: Violent gang conflicts in the North District of Gharpur are intensifying. Over 20 brutal incidents have taken place in the past month alone, which may pose a challenge to the development and construction of the new industrial park.

320091003.speaker: 记者
320091003.content: According to our sources, the Joint Arbitration is considering assigning additional security personnel to the North District industrial park to protect the financial interests of individuals involved in the project...

320091005.content: The fortified AGI Mech is like a front-heavy siege chariot, effortlessly leveling any structure in its path. Armed soldiers form a macabre human barrier along the roadside, forcing the frightened crowd out.

320091006.speaker: 助理
320091006.content: We need the main road paved ASAP. The demo orders and compensation need to be given out immediately.

320091007.speaker: 助理
320091007.content: The first batch of construction workers and the Joint Arbitration inspection squad will be here tomorrow. I don't want anyone messing this u—

320091010.content: A portion of the crowd suddenly grows agitated. A rock the size of a fist sails toward Jiveka's assistant. She seemingly has no reaction as the rock thuds against her back.

320091013.speaker: 联合仲裁安保队长
320091013.content: Who threw that rock!? Bring them here! Do you have a death wish!?

320091015.speaker: 北区帮派成员A
320091015.content: Why? We're being crushed under the wheels of these corporations. We've already lost our homes! Where can we run!?

320091016.content: Security guards pin the culprit to the ground. He doesn't bow his head, glaring at Claure with bloodshot eyes as she turns around.

320091017.speaker: 北区帮派成员A
320091017.content: Longville can't stop getting his hands dirty, but he never faces consequences. Instead, everyone he hurts gets put on a wanted list. The "law" in the Affluent District is a sick joke!

320091018.speaker: 北区帮派成员A
320091018.content: If that b****** hadn't manipulated the gangs around here, picking 'em off one by one, no one would dare barge in here like this!

320091019.speaker: 联合仲裁安保队长
320091019.content: These sewer rats sure do think highly of themselves...

320091020.speaker: 北区帮派成员A
320091020.content: Shoot! I hope my blood boils you alive!

320091022.content: Kali and I happen upon this scene when we rush back to Gharpur. While I'm frozen in shock at witnessing this public execution, Kali has already raced over and pushed aside the security guard's gun that was aimed at the gang member.

320091024.speaker: 联合仲裁安保队长
320091024.content: Kali? The one who fought for Meruism last night?

320091025.speaker: 伽梨
320091025.content: You sure are well-informed, huh? I wonder if you know who started the conflict in the West District of Gharpur last night?

320091026.speaker: 伽梨
320091026.content: Did you know that Longville was coming to Meruism to provoke us? Or were your people there too?

320091028.speaker: 克洛尔
320091028.content: I'm fine. I don't want to see anyone causing trouble. Let him go.

320091030.speaker: 北区帮派成员B
320091030.content:
Thank you, Big Sis Kali.
C'mon, bro... let's go.

320091031.content: Kali looks down at the young man kneeling on the ground. His eyes are full of confusion as his lips part, but he ultimately just shakes his head.

320091032.content: The young man's tense body gradually loses its strength. The passion in his eyes slowly dims, like fading smoke after a fire is extinguished. He allows his companions to pull him away, disappearing outside the crowd.

320091033.content: The roaring AGI Mech continues on, drowning out the lingering sounds of the young man's questions. Claure, acting as though she had just watched a comical farce, simply ignores us and follows after the convoy with her security.

320091036.speaker: 伽梨
320091036.content: Are you in charge of this project?

320091037.speaker: 克洛尔
320091037.content: No. I am the assistant to Miss Jiveka, the CEO. I am supervising preliminary preparations for this project on behalf of the Joint Arbitration.

320091038.speaker: 克洛尔
320091038.content: Don't worry. The Joint Arbitration isn't concerned with the conflict between Meruism and Longville. No one will get in your way.

320091039.speaker: 伽梨
320091039.content: Is this why you guys have been bankrolling Longville? To drive the gangs out of the North District and take the land for yourself?

320091040.speaker: 伽梨
320091040.content: Did you forget that Gharpur and the Joint Arbitration signed an agreement stating they wouldn't use violence to encroach on each other?

320091042.content: Seemingly having trouble understanding these terms, Claure just shakes her head and gestures to her security guards to continue onward.

320091043.speaker: 克洛尔
320091043.content: Miss Kali, all of the land within the planned scope of the industrial park is under Longville's name. You can check the deeds.

320091044.speaker: 克洛尔
320091044.content: He accepted an investment from the Joint Arbitration to build the industrial park here. Our transaction was completely legal. There was no violence or encroachment whatsoever.

320091045.speaker: 伽梨
320091045.content: You know exactly who helped him steal this land.

320091046.speaker: 克洛尔
320091046.content: If you have no evidence to back up that claim, I can consider it defamation.

320091047.speaker: 克洛尔
320091047.content: Like you said, neither side will interfere with the other. Whatever Longville wants to do in the slums has nothing to do with the Joint Arbitration.

320091048.speaker: 我
320091048.content: Aren't you responsible for the consequences of your investments and products after the fact?

320091049.content: Noticing that Kali is about to fall into the trap set by Claure's legal jargon, I quickly interrupt them and covertly gesture to Kali to let it go.

320091051.speaker: 我
320091051.content: #{nickname}#. I'm a strategic consultant to Aether Gazer in Ain Soph. I came to Shashvat for research.

320091052.content: Claure's consistently expressionless face finally reveals a clear hint of surprise. She takes my business card, glances at it, and nods.

320091053.speaker: 克洛尔
320091053.content: After applying for use of the Photon Rail station, this survey hasn't been cheap.

320091054.speaker: 我
320091054.content: But for Aether Gazer, it's just a matter of routine. I'm an investor. As long as the return is high enough, the cost can be covered by the profits.

320091055.speaker: 克洛尔
320091055.content: If Aether Gazer is interested in partnering with us, you're welcome to visit Biotech if you get the chance.

320091057.speaker: 克洛尔
320091057.content: Miss Jiveka has a packed schedule tomorrow. But I'm happy to discuss things with you on her behalf, as long as you don't mind.

320091058.speaker: 我
320091058.content: I don't care who I talk to. I'm more concerned with things that could affect our partnership—like the question I still haven't gotten an answer to.

320091059.speaker: 克洛尔
320091059.content: You'll have to judge the answer for yourself. I have no right to answer it.

320091060.content: Watching as a trail of smoke and dust follows the gradually retreating convoy to the end of the street, Claure pauses thoughtfully.

320091061.speaker: 克洛尔
320091061.content: Just like the people in the Slums aren't interested in seeing things from our point of view, perhaps it's difficult for us to find a reason to pay attention to issues like that.

320091062.speaker: 克洛尔
320091062.content: Those two places are just too far apart.

320092001.speaker: 北区帮派成员B
320092001.content: Bro, no one is here. Did someone tip them off?

320092002.speaker: 北区帮派首领
320092002.content: What's going on? You said the Burning Scars would be here. That's the only reason we risked coming. You screwing with us?

320092003.speaker: 北区帮派成员A
320092003.content: ...You said the Burning Scars would f****** be here, didn't you!?

320092004.content: Feeling his companions' eyes burning a hole in his back, the young man becomes nervous. He pulls everyone close, whispering.

320092005.speaker: 加尔居民
320092005.content: They were here. Look—they're on the surveillance cameras... They must have gone to the North District!

320092007.content: The group arrives at the location shown on the surveillance cameras to discover a crowd of people dressed in Burning Scars uniforms.

320092009.content: A Molotov cocktail is hurled into a house, immediately engulfing it in flames.

320092010.speaker: 北区帮派成员A
320092010.content: I'm going to smash it to pieces!

320092011.speaker: 北区帮派成员B
320092011.content: Bro! I don't think the building is burning... Uh...

320092013.content: The gang members' assault is cut short by rapid gunfire. A rain of bullets breaks through the sea of fire blocking their view. They fall one after another, mowed down like grass.

320092014.speaker: 曼达维亚
320092014.content: When rats scurry around on the street, aren't they just begging to die?

320092015.content: Mandeviya, equipped with a pair of quick-fire gauntlets, easily rips through the invading enemy with a raging storm of bullets.

320092016.speaker: 北区帮派首领
320092016.content: It's an ambush! Draw your weapons! C'mon! Ah—

320092018.content: After breaking his opponent's neck with a single punch, Mandeviya spits cruelly on the fallen man and waves to the security guards standing behind him.

320092019.speaker: 曼达维亚
320092019.content: Kill half of them and arrest the rest!

320101001.speaker: 我
320101001.content: Yeah, the strategic consultant title really came in handy. I need to look over the list of Division Seven's business partners...

320101003.content: After hanging up, I slip my communicator into my backpack and spot Parvati walking toward me. She points at the door next to me and yawns.

320101005.speaker: 我
320101005.content: Yeah, I saw her this morning. She came down to check on Lil' Osi.

320101006.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320101006.content: I see. She told me yesterday that Green will wake up. Relax—if Boss Brahmā says everything will be fine, you can trust her.

320101007.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320101007.content: Kali said you're heading to Biotech today?

320101008.speaker: 我
320101008.content: I wasn't planning on it, but I unexpectedly ran into Claure yesterday. She invited me, so I might as well go take a look.

320101009.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320101009.content: If Biotech's hands aren't clean, you're walking right into a trap. Something happened in the North District last night. Kali and I can't come with you.

320101010.speaker: 我
320101010.content: That's why I told CORG about my little field trip.

320101011.speaker: 涅赫贝特
320101011.content: "If anything happens, we'll assist you right away."

320101012.speaker: 涅赫贝特
320101012.content: The person who infiltrated our institute a month ago is suddenly willing to put his life in our hands now?

320101013.speaker: 我
320101013.content: "Be respectful and serious." When it comes to tracking down the Cognizant Visbanes, I trust that our interests are completely aligned.

320101014.speaker: 涅赫贝特
320101014.content: ...Don't let the call get cut off then.

320101015.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320101015.content: If it were me, I’d want to know if you’re willing to put your life in CORG’s hands too. Ravana and Bathin are seriously strong.

320101016.speaker: 我
320101016.content: I know CORG has made mistakes, like with Khnum and the Sasanami Photon Rail Station... But their partners like Aether Gazer are the only ones who know how many things they’ve truly accomplished and how many crises they’ve prevented.

320101017.speaker: 我
320101017.content: They know how strong Ravana and Bathin are, but they still sent someone to handle this issue. So, yes. I trust them when it comes to this.

320101018.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320101018.content: Hah… Alright. Then I’ll leave it to you guys.

320101019.content: Parvati pats my shoulder and rubs her eyes. Just as she raises her fist to knock, the door opens, and her knuckles thud against the forehead of the person in the doorway.

320101021.speaker: 梵天
320101021.content:
Green's awake. You can head in.
…Hehe, ready for your punishment, Vati~?

320101022.content: Brahma flashes an evil smile and reaches out to Parvati, scaring the latter and sending her running. Brahma jolts forward to chase after her, but I quickly grab her.

320101023.speaker: 我
320101023.content: We've been here for three days. How much longer do you guys need?

320101024.speaker: 梵天
320101024.content: You can’t rush these things. Just take care of what you need to first… Vati’s getting away.

320101025.content: "Dark clouds formed overhead as rain poured down. The hawk and the sheep rested together in a cave."

320101026.content: "The hawk’s wings have healed. She is ready to soar again."

320101027.content: “I can find food for you. What are you still so worried about?”

320101028.content: “Why do I fly through the skies? Getting stronger is reason enough. What else do you need?”

320101029.content: The device monitoring Osiris’s vital signs flashes with a green light as the sun shines down on her face. She works hard to part her lips and opens her tired eyes.

320101030.content: As her sense of smell gradually recovers, she notices the air is sweet with the aroma of fruit. The frail girl then spots a plate of peeled apples on the nightstand next to her.

320101033.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320101033.content: Here—I just peeled these apples. You haven’t eaten for two whole days.

320101034.speaker: 奥西里斯
320101034.content: Thank you. Um... Verthandi, is that a little bit of apple on the corner of your mouth?

320101036.content: Osiris looks somewhat dazed when I enter the room. She seemingly recalls something when she looks at me, suddenly growing panicked. She then scrambles out of the hospital bed and runs over. Wrapping her arms around my waist, she begins trembling with fear.

320101039.speaker: 我
320101039.content: Everything’s alright. I’m fine now, see? Just pretend it was a bad nightmare, okay?

320101041.content: Her embrace loosens slightly. Lost for words, Osiris sits on the edge of the bed and stares at me guiltily.

320101042.speaker: 奥西里斯
320101042.content: I finally got sent out on a mission after convincing Miss Shu… but I messed everything up… I’m so sorry…

320101043.speaker: 我
320101043.content: Don’t think like that. We all know it wasn’t your fault. I already told Shu about everything that happened with the Access Key. As long as you’re fine, that’s all that matters.

320101044.content: I reach out and softly pat her head. I smooth out her hair, which has become quite messy after sleeping for so long.

320101047.speaker: 奥西里斯
320101047.content: S-She says she wants to talk to you herself…

320101048.content: Osiris lowers her head as she prepares to switch personalities. In the moment her consciousness changes, she loses control of her body and falls backward.

320101049.content: By the time I lunge forward to help her, she has already grabbed onto my wrist and pulled herself up off the bed.

320101050.speaker: 冥王
320101050.content: …How irritating. You still can’t tell the difference between being brave and being reckless.

320101051.speaker: 冥王
320101051.content: Getting pretty close, huh? Not scared you’re gonna get sliced up again?

320101052.speaker: 我
320101052.content: You weren’t the one who wanted to cut me up with that scythe, right? I’m sure it wasn’t you.

320101053.speaker: 冥王
320101053.content: Of course it wasn’t. But if you keep blabbing on, who knows? Maybe I’ll kick you out of the way and smash that thing to pieces…

320101054.speaker: 我
320101054.content: It's normal to run into situations we can't control on missions. Either way, you’re our—

320101055.speaker: 冥王
320101055.content: Who said I couldn’t control it!?

320101056.content: The girl suddenly raises her voice, grabbing my collar and shoving me onto the bed.

320101057.speaker: 冥王
320101057.content: Listen up—when I find whoever that thing belongs to, I’m going to tear it to shreds!

320101058.speaker: 冥王
320101058.content: Ah! Osiris, stop pulling me back…

320101059.speaker: 我
320101059.content: I’ve never doubted your intentions, Ausar. You’ve always been an important companion to us. When it comes to taking down enemies, we’re always happy to ask for your help.

320101060.speaker: 我
320101060.content: But you saw it yourself—this time, the situation is connected to you, Lil’ Osi, and to that “traitor” you mentioned…

320101061.content: I gently release Ausar’s grip, standing up and placing a hand on her shoulder. However, she frowns and brushes my hand away sullenly.

320101062.speaker: 冥王
320101062.content: Don’t talk about that. It pisses me off.

320101063.speaker: 我
320101063.content: But I don’t even know who they are… You mentioned that name for a reason, right? Tell me who he is, at the very least. Otherwise, how can I help you?

320101064.speaker: 冥王
320101064.content: Who asked for your help? This has nothing to do with you. You three just need to bask in my power like always…

320101065.content: She dejectedly bites into an apple from the plate, occasionally looking over at me. It’s clear that she wants to say something, so I gaze at her understandingly.

320101066.content: She glances at me, staring at my chest for some time.

320101067.speaker: 冥王
320101067.content: …Later. I’m going to wait until I remember and I need your help. Until then—

320101068.content: Before I can speak, she stuffs a chunk of apple into my mouth and turns her head to end our conversation.

320101069.speaker: 奥西里斯
320101069.content: …I’m sorry, Administrator. Ausar was being rude again.

320101070.speaker: 奥西里斯
320101070.content: She meant she doesn’t know who the “traitor” is. She just suddenly remembered that name.

320101071.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320101071.content: I'll send a message and ask Hodur, but the Intelligence Office doesn't have any record of it.

320101073.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320101073.content: If Odin knew, she would’ve told us a long time ago, right?

320101074.content: Recalling my previous conversation with Shu, I sigh with a bitter chuckle. I decide not to share my worries with them.

320101075.speaker: 我
320101075.content: You guys are both fine—that’s the best news we could hope for. Let’s give Ausar some time.

320101076.speaker: 我
320101076.content: …It’s almost time. I have to head out.

320101077.content: I look down at the time as I make this comment, but as soon as I open my mouth, I can sense a pair of eyes staring at me intensely…

320111001.speaker: 朗维尔
320111001.content: What are you f****** trying to do here? Huh?

320111002.content: The square at the entrance of the industrial park has been transformed into a makeshift outdoor courtroom. Three men dressed as judges sit in the middle of the square, while six scarred individuals kneel in front of them. At a glance, many would recognize them as the right-hand men to gang leaders in the North District.

320111003.speaker: 北区帮派成员C
320111003.content: Kallanza of the Vultures, Reyana of the Wasps…

320111005.speaker: 朗维尔
320111005.content: Didn't you guys say you wanted to sit down and talk a few days ago? Now that I brought the trash here to discuss things with the company, you're not happy? What do you b******* actually want?

320111006.speaker: 北区帮派成员C
320111006.content: There was a huge commotion last night—that was no "discussion." Do you think I'm blind? Or deaf?

320111007.speaker: 北区帮派成员C
320111007.content: Longville, when the Burning Scars were on their last legs, the North District gangs helped you out. Is this how you repay us!?

320111008.speaker: 朗维尔
320111008.content: "Help"... Back then, that useless geezer came to the North District looking for help. Other than the Midnight Thorns, who was willing to give a single cent? What does it have to do with you guys?

320111009.speaker: 朗维尔
320111009.content: Besides—the Burning Scars almost completely disbanded under his watch. If he'd handed the gang over to me early, I would be rolling in f****** cash right now.

320111010.speaker: 曼达维亚
320111010.content:
Alright, enough nonsense.
Let's begin, Judges.

320111011.content: Mandeviya holds a bottle of champagne as he sits behind the bench. He glances at Longville standing in the corner, then watches one of the portly judges pick up a document with a mocking gaze.

320111012.speaker: 法官
320111012.content: This court alleges that the six defendants, with full knowledge that the plaintiff, the Joint Arbitration, was behaving in a friendly manner, repeatedly violated their agreement and deliberately destroyed the plaintiff's property...

320111013.speaker: 法官
320111013.content: Eight New Town citizens in the plaintiff's employ unfortunately perished due to the defendants' violent acts. Their lives were cruelly stripped away, resulting in a serious infringement on the plaintiff's rights and interests.

320111014.speaker: 法官
320111014.content: Considering the obvious nature of the six defendants' crimes, the conclusive evidence, the grave circumstances, and the resulting negative social impact, this court has decided to punish them according to the law.

320111015.speaker: 法官
320111015.content: In conclusion, the court will now read the sentence. The six defendants will be immediately executed to serve as a warning to others, as well as uphold justice and the rule of law. All land under these gangs' purview will be confiscated and will fall under the jurisdiction of the Joint Arbitration.

320111016.content: Two security guards step forward and draw their guns. They release the safety and aim at the six gang members, ready to pull the trigger.

320111018.speaker: 朗维尔
320111018.content: Just shut up before you breathe your last breath.

320111019.speaker: 卡兰萨
320111019.content: Your master is still here, so you're not on the chopping block yet, Longville. Think about this long and hard! You're such a coward... always ready to kiss any corporation's a**.

320111020.speaker: 卡兰萨
320111020.content: They're executing us today after reading off a few words. Tomorrow, they'll find an excuse to bury you too! Know your place!

320111021.speaker: 曼达维亚
320111021.content: You dare question me in front of all these people? Question the fairness of these three judges and the laws of Shashvat? Kallanza... Excellent. I'll remember you.

320111022.speaker: 卡兰萨
320111022.content: No one in Gharpur is trying to discuss the laws of the Affluent District with you. This is between us and the Burning Scars. Gharpur has its own rules for gang disputes.

320111023.speaker: 卡兰萨
320111023.content: Or are you trying to say that the industrial park's land doesn't actually belong to Longville, and that the Joint Arbitration is taking over?

320111024.speaker: 曼达维亚
320111024.content: Heh, who taught you to talk like that? No one has brought up the non-encroachment agreement in years.

320111025.speaker: 曼达维亚
320111025.content: Infinite Power's name is on that agreement—I won't deny it. Dishonesty leaves the deepest stain on any company. And once that stain seeps in, a competitor can simply slaughter them like a lamb.

320111026.content: Mandeviya turns around and smiles at some of the people in fancy clothing, raising the champagne in his hand.

320111027.speaker: 曼达维亚
320111027.content: So... if you think they shouldn't be judged by the law, what are these "rules" you're talking about?

320111028.speaker: 卡兰萨
320111028.content: No gang member dies on their knees. According to the rules in Gharpur, I die on my own terms. But I don't think these f****** cowards would dare let that happen!

320111029.speaker: 卡兰萨
320111029.content: Longville, you b******! Do you have the guts to take me on? If not, don't you dare let these companies tie me up for you!

320111030.content: Longville is silent for a moment. He then waves to Mandeviya and winks at the security guards aiming at the six "defendants."

320111031.content: The ropes binding the six gang members are gradually cut. Just as they begin to celebrate, the sound of knuckles cracking can be heard behind them. Longville's prosthesis revs up, changing form as the meat grinder roars to life in his hand.

320111032.speaker: 朗维尔
320111032.content: Let's have some fun before you die.

320111033.speaker: 朗维尔
320111033.content: We fight to the death. Who's first?

320111034.content: The over 10-meter perimeter is like a blood-red barrier, separating the familiar neighborhood from the other side, where they cannot tread.

320111035.content: A crowd has gathered outside the main entrance to the industrial park, forming a semi-circle around the gate. No one notices a figure pushing her way to the front of the horde until a hand reaches out from behind and grabs her.

320111036.speaker: 尤蒂妮
320111036.content: Big Sis Kali? What are yo—

320111037.speaker: 伽梨
320111037.content: Shh...! Don't go up near the front. You're still wanted...

320111038.speaker: 尤蒂妮
320111038.content: I have to! They caught so many people from the North District. I can't just leave them to die.

320111039.content: Yudini reacts with instinctive anger, but Kali doesn't let go; the disapproval in her gaze is extremely clear. Yudini grits her teeth, finally taking a step back.

320111040.speaker: 伽梨
320111040.content: I heard the same thing you did. I came here to see what was really going on.

320111041.speaker: 伽梨
320111041.content: Find a place to hide out. I'm going in to take a look. If I can, I'll bring them out for you.

320111042.speaker: 朗维尔
320111042.content: Too late, Kali. Show's already over.

320111043.content: The scent of blood fills the air. Mangled, broken bodies are strewn across the ground. The various holes and depressions in the corpses make it difficult to even imagine the attacks they had endured.

320111044.content: The entire crowd is silent. Only two people still remain in the perimeter. They use every ounce of their strength to take a defensive stance.

320111045.content: Longville stretches his joints, grabbing a towel and bottle of water from an underling. He cleans the blood off his fist as he glances over at Kali with an amused look, who has just squeezed her way to the front of the crowd.

320111046.speaker: 伽梨
320111046.content: ...Are you crazy? Slaughtering people in front of such a big crowd?

320111047.speaker: 朗维尔
320111047.content: Hey, don't throw accusations around before you know what's going on. They wanted to settle this privately. They lost, they died—how is that my fault?

320111048.speaker: 伽梨
320111048.content: That's a military prosthesis... You can't get that thing on any normal market. You're not even trying to pretend anymore, Longville?

320111049.speaker: 朗维尔
320111049.content: You just don't have the right connections. If you're jealous, just say so. I might even sell you one if I'm feeling generous.

320111050.speaker: 伽梨
320111050.content: ...Regardless, you should never turn that thing on your own people.

320111051.speaker: 朗维尔
320111051.content: "My own people"? They were my enemies—they were trying to kill me. I already showed them mercy and gave them a chance to live. But trash is trash...

320111052.speaker: 朗维尔
320111052.content: Remember what I said? People who forget how to fight don't deserve to live.

320111053.content: Having lost their will to fight back, the remaining two gang members see a flash before their eyes as Longville's fist slams into them. As their chests collapse into their spines, their screams are abruptly cut off.

320111054.speaker: 朗维尔
320111054.content: The execution has concluded, Your Honors.

320121001.speaker: 克洛尔
320121001.content: These two... are they your assistants?

320121003.content: Ver and Osiris greet Claure as briefly as possible. I nod at them slightly, masking our usual closeness with an air of leadership.

320121004.content: They had insisted on coming out with me. I knew the incident with the Access Key had left them shaken, so I couldn't refuse. We had all agreed to investigate together and remain cautious.

320121005.speaker: 我
320121005.content: If you have a reception service for visitors, I'm sure they would be interested in looking around. I won't bring them with me to discuss a potential business partnership since they aren't ready for negotiations yet.

320121006.speaker: 克洛尔
320121006.content: I'm sorry, we don't typically show outsiders around. You two can wait in the lounge.

320121008.speaker: 克洛尔
320121008.content: It's right across from our elevator. Security, please show them the way.

320121010.content: After Ver and Osiris leave, Claure dives right into discussing a partnership. Sitting at the negotiation table, she appears completely different than she was at the construction site. Her professionalism leaves me somewhat awestruck.

320121011.content: Business divisions, product descriptions, development plans, demand gaps... Though I'd scanned the meeting minutes from several Division Seven negotiations, I'm still slightly overwhelmed when experiencing her fast-paced offensive firsthand.

320121012.content: After about an hour, we finally reach an agreement on a few deals involving civilian prostheses, medical devices, and pharmaceuticals.

320121013.speaker: 我
320121013.content: ...Thank you for your time. I will submit this to the head of our Medical Department. I hope we can begin working together as soon as possible.

320121015.speaker: 我
320121015.content: Negotiations are rarely ever this quick. You're truly impressive. I'm just worried about mistakes—they could affect my performance.

320121016.speaker: 克洛尔
320121016.content:
Everyone has something different to worry about.
What would you like to drink?

320121017.speaker: 我
320121017.content: Coffee is fine. Do you have a terrace or a rooftop?

320121019.speaker: 我
320121019.content: That's a shame. We have quite a few outdoor break areas at Aether Gazer. I like to go out and get some fresh air when work tires me out... Thank you.

320121020.content: I take the coffee from Claure and crack open the window. So close to the top floor of the Biotech building, this place overlooks half of the Affluent District. The Slums are nearly completely blocked by the towering wall on the border. Only a faint outline of some of the skyscrapers is visible.

320121021.speaker: 我
320121021.content: The Joint Arbitration moves very quickly with its construction projects.

320121022.speaker: 克洛尔
320121022.content: Business ventures like this aren't inherently complicated. Obstacles behind the scenes make them more complex. The new industrial park is a win for everyone. There's been no resistance, so it's moving along quickly.

320121023.speaker: 克洛尔
320121023.content: Speaking of, I don't understand why you contacted Meruism. In terms of both supply and demand, they don't seem qualified to catch Aether Gazer's eye.

320121024.speaker: 我
320121024.content: The Tian Lu Traders in Xu Heng have been our business partners for many years, and they've worked with Meruism too. You can never have too many friends—it's just a matter of navigating those relationships...

320121025.content: I slowly move my coffee cup from my lips to the table. I then put on a stressed expression as I sigh.

320121026.speaker: 我
320121026.content: I wasn't planning on discussing this matter during my visit, but I was asked to. Though you don't have to answer, I figured I'd try. Meruism's friends are looking for an explanation.

320121027.speaker: 克洛尔
320121027.content: Are you referring to the incident at the industrial park?

320121028.speaker: 我
320121028.content: They want to know the reason behind that incident, as well as the consequences.

320121029.speaker: 克洛尔
320121029.content: I was only following orders. I don't know the specific plan. As for the reason, it's simple—there is no land to the east of New Town.

320121030.speaker: 克洛尔
320121030.content: Most of the blue-collar industries in the main city are in New Town, but development has moved fast over the past few years. Land and labor costs are going up, and profit margins are dropping, leaving a lot of people dissatisfied.

320121031.speaker: 克洛尔
320121031.content: Even though the Slums are a bad area, labor and land are cheap. Industrial expansion like this is inevitable, and it's good for the development of the Slums. New Town is a good example of that.

320121033.speaker: 我
320121033.content: I can't answer for them. I'm sure you're aware that Gharpur's gangs don't see this as a simple cost-benefit issue.

320121034.speaker: 克洛尔
320121034.content: Of course. Everyone has their own principles.

320121035.speaker: 克洛尔
320121035.content: I enjoyed our discussion today. It looks like it's almost time for my next meeting.

320121036.speaker: 我
320121036.content: Right, I should go make sure my interns haven't caused any trouble.

320121038.speaker: 生命科技安保A
320121038.content: What would you two like to drink?

320121039.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320121039.content: Oh, don't worry about it. There's a drink cabinet here, so we can grab something later.

320121040.speaker: 奥西里斯
320121040.content: Ver, the Ad... Erm, the consultant might be a while. Should we play a game in the meantime?

320121041.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320121041.content: Sure. I'm definitely gonna get a high score today!

320121042.speaker: 生命科技安保A
320121042.content: ...You two are welcome to do as you please. Just call me if you need anything.

320121043.content: The security guard closes the door to the lounge. Ver and Osiris stare at the game on their communicators, but neither log in. The two pretend to chat for a long time before Ver sneakily glances at the door.

320121045.speaker: 奥西里斯
320121045.content: Phew... I was so nervous. I almost slipped up just now.

320121046.speaker: 奥西里斯
320121046.content: Ver, we can hack that communicator over there. Let's go.

320122001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320122001.content: ...Is he still not finished? Should we play another round?

320122002.speaker: 我
320122002.content: Playing games again? Did you two finish reading the industry analysis I gave you yesterday? And what about the merger and acquisition summary I asked you to write?

320122003.content: I frown, pushing the lounge door open. My stern question scares Ver and Osiris, and they rush to turn off their communicators. They jump to their feet, awkwardly fiddling with their fingers and not meeting my gaze.

320122004.speaker: 克洛尔
320122004.content: My unwarranted opinion? You can take it easier on your subordinates when you're away from the company.

320122005.speaker: 我
320122005.content: Well, Aether Gazer is very strict when it comes to passing probation. I'm afraid they won't take it seriously.

320122006.speaker: 我
320122006.content: Thank you again for having us, Miss Claure.

320122007.speaker: 克洛尔
320122007.content: Could I ask what your plans are for the rest of your time in Shashvat?

320122008.speaker: 我
320122008.content: If I get the chance, I'd like to visit all of the big companies involved in the Joint Arbitration.

320122009.speaker: 我
320122009.content: I've seen Jivitabad's corporate influence ranking. "Infinite Power" is right behind Biotech, right?

320122011.speaker: 我
320122011.content: I'm sure you've interacted with them quite a bit. Do you have any advice?

320122012.speaker: 克洛尔
320122012.content: No. But if you intend to discuss a partnership with Mandeviya, you should know it won't go nearly as smoothly as our meeting today.

320131001.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320131001.content: You were so loud! It scared us to death.

320131002.content: Ver hits me softly as I run away, smiling. I look through the surveillance footage Ver and Osiris recorded as I explain myself.

320131003.speaker: 我
320131003.content: I didn't have a choice. I didn't know if you guys were finished before I opened the door.

320131004.speaker: 我
320131004.content: If you were still gathering intel and I freaked you out by opening the door, it would be hard to explain to Claure. I figured I'd give you a scare first. That way, it would make sense if you turned off your communicators in a panic.

320131005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320131005.content: Oh... that's why you asked if we should play one more game when we heard the Administrator's footsteps?

320131006.speaker: 奥西里斯
320131006.content: Eh? It was all planned out ahead of time?

320131007.speaker: 我
320131007.content: Better safe than sorry. If I told you everything, your reactions wouldn't be real.

320131008.speaker: 奥西里斯
320131008.content: You're so mean, Administrator! You only told Ver... Is it because my reactions are more convincing or something?

320131009.content: Osiris looks at me, pouting. I laugh it off as I turn on my communicator and glance back at the Biotech building.

320131010.speaker: 我
320131010.content: This test site does look pretty strange. I remember there being a similar place during the Vimoksha Pharma incident... Well, the professionals at CORG can worry about analyzing the intel.

320131011.speaker: 我
320131011.content: It seems like they haven't found the locator I put on the conference room window yet... Ver, how tall is the Vimoksha Pharma building?

320131012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320131012.content: 452.44 meters tall. I used our drone to measure it, so it should be accurate.

320131013.speaker: 我
320131013.content: ...Weird. They met us on the 73rd floor, and the locator sent back a height of 289.5 meters. From what I could see, each story was about 4 meters tall.

320131014.speaker: 我
320131014.content: Based on those numbers, subtracting the spire... there should be 105 floors. But when you take the elevator, the buttons only go up to the double digits.

320131015.speaker: 奥西里斯
320131015.content: Does that mean the elevators can't go anywhere over the 100th floor?

320131016.speaker: 奥西里斯
320131016.content: But some floors could be taller than 4 meters, right? People can ask for certain floors to be taller when buildings are being designed, can't they?

320131017.speaker: 我
320131017.content: I've seen how the Affluent District handles its construction process at the industrial park. Everything is standardized, modular, and incredibly efficient. Changing the height of certain floors would increase the cost. I don't see the point.

320131018.speaker: 我
320131018.content: It's a possibility, but I have my doubts... Anyway, let's keep it in mind.

320131019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320131019.content: Now that you mention it, the Aether Gazer building has a similar design. You need to switch to a special elevator to get to the Division Nine floor...

320131020.speaker: 我
320131020.content: You get it now, right? We do that because we don't want the world to know about Modifiers. But what is Biotech, a company that has nothing to do with CORG or Modifiers, trying to hide?

320131021.content: As they watch soldiers toss the six bodies into a car like trash, the crowd, originally stunned by the bloodshed, now grows agitated once more.

320131022.speaker: 朗维尔
320131022.content: What are you shouting about? This is none of your business. Go back to where you belong. Don't stain my turf with your tears.

320131023.speaker: 伽梨
320131023.content: ...Longville, are you declaring war on the entirety of Gharpur?

320131024.speaker: 朗维尔
320131024.content: "The entirety of Gharpur"? Is it really that grand?

320131025.content: Longville sneers. He glares at Kali in the distance, just like that night on the street. But this time, he is backed by both the Burning Scars and the cold, watchful eyes of the Affluent District corporations.

320131026.speaker: 朗维尔
320131026.content: With so many gangs in the East and North Districts, they fall apart with just a little push. Threatening me with revenge is just a joke.

320131027.speaker: 朗维尔
320131027.content: You all think working with these companies makes me evil, huh? Then what about you? Has Gharpur seen even a modicum of progress under your leadership!?

320131028.speaker: 伽梨
320131028.content: Meruism's goal is to make Gharpur self-sufficient. That way, it won't need to depend on other people's whims for money, or even worry about its own safety.

320131029.speaker: 伽梨
320131029.content: There are still a lot of problems, but everyone's lives are slowly getting bette—

320131030.speaker: 朗维尔
320131030.content: "Better"... Better my a**! You're just a bunch of spineless rats. The days of shambling around like zombies are over. Are you all so numb that you're willing to be crushed like slaves!?

320131031.speaker: 朗维尔
320131031.content: Back in the day, you earned happiness with your fists in Gharpur. Whoever packed the biggest punch was in charge.

320131032.speaker: 朗维尔
320131032.content: And now? Doing business? Selling junk on the black market? What's the difference between you b******* and the rich people you scoff at!?

320131033.speaker: 朗维尔
320131033.content: At this rate, Gharpur might as well be dead—because it won't serve a purpose anymore.

320131034.speaker: 北区帮派成员C
320131034.content: For a traitor, you really have some nerve! Just keep hiding out in your doghouse, got it!? If you so much as poke your head out, you'll be slaughtered!

320131035.speaker: 朗维尔
320131035.content:
You. You're from the Wasps, right? Perfect.
Bring them out.

320131036.content: Longville gestures at an underling. Soon after, six people with bags over their heads are brought in front of the crowd. Longville pulls off the bags to reveal pale faces, as though they are still overcome with fear.

320131039.speaker: 北区帮派成员C
320131039.content: Boss, that monster Longville killed Kallanza! We hav—

320131040.speaker: 普利特维
320131040.content: This was all a big misunderstanding. Longville, it had nothing to do with me.

320131041.speaker: 普利特维
320131041.content: The Wasps are here to serve you, Longville. We'll partner with these companies and work hard on the industrial park...

320131042.content: The leader of the Wasps completely ignores the massive crowd watching his every move, essentially prostrating himself as he begs Longville. The crowd roars in response, startling the Wasp member further.

320131043.speaker: 朗维尔
320131043.content: Hmm, Prithvi. One of your subordinates isn't being very obedient. She's criticizing me in front of all these people. What do you think I should do with her?

320131048.speaker: 朗维尔
320131048.content: You heard him. Your boss wants you to die. You know the gang rules—if you can't do it yourself, I'd be happy to help you out.

320131049.content: Longville flashes a ridiculing grin as he gazes down at the trembling female gang member who has collapsed to the ground. He grabs a gun from the security guard next to him and aims it at her.

320131051.speaker: 曼达维亚
320131051.content: Oh? The real boss has finally arrived.

320131052.content: The quiet voice is seemingly laced with powerful magic, and the crowd instantly quiets. It effortlessly parts, creating a path for her.

320131053.speaker: 伽梨
320131053.content: Boss Brahmā? What are you doing here?

320131054.speaker: 梵天
320131054.content: Should I have waited for you to come back and sulk around instead? Take the people you brought with you back. They were worried sick when you didn't come out.

320131055.content: Brahmā walks into the perimeter, surrounded by a large group of Meruism members. Standing at the head of the group, she glances at the sullen Longville before her gaze falls on Mandeviya.

320131056.speaker: 曼达维亚
320131056.content: I heard your gang was serious about turf boundaries. What are you doing in the North District? Meruism is from the West District.

320131057.speaker: 梵天
320131057.content: In Gharpur, repaying favors trumps everything.

320131058.speaker: 梵天
320131058.content: I don't have a problem with "a life for a life." But if you keep pushing it, you'll be breaking the gang rules. Anyone on their knees doesn't deserve to be in charge. The Wasps don't have to listen to him.

320131059.speaker: 梵天
320131059.content: Longville, I'd say you back up your words with action. So let me ask you one last time—do you really want to be a hired thug for New Town?

320131061.speaker: 普利特维
320131061.content: ...Listen to Longville. Partner with the companies and work hard in the industrial park...

320131062.content: A mocking smile plays on Longville's lips, but Brahmā just nods indifferently.

320131063.speaker: 梵天
320131063.content: Mandeviya, this industrial park has destroyed many people's homes. I know you offered compensation, but money can't shut people up. It can't tie their hands either.

320131064.speaker: 梵天
320131064.content: If you don't want constant attacks on the park once it's finished, I suggest we sit down and have a good talk first.

320131065.speaker: 曼达维亚
320131065.content: We aren't adept at running places like the Slums. What do you suggest?

320131066.speaker: 梵天
320131066.content: I'll round up some North District reps, and you bring some Joint Arbitration reps. In three days, we'll meet here and come up with a plan to make everyone happy.

320131069.content: Mandeviya intends to make another snarky comment, but a Joint Arbitration security guard suddenly walks up to him and whispers something in his ear. Mandeviya's expression gradually sours, landing on irritation.

320131070.speaker: 曼达维亚
320131070.content: Get the car ready. Idiotic pigs... What are you hopeless cretins even good for!?

320131071.speaker: 曼达维亚
320131071.content: Three days—this was your idea. Hurry up and get ready.

320131072.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320131072.content: ...Administrator, why do I feel like we're getting further away from Infinite Power?

320131074.content: The driver doesn't respond. He hadn't spoken a word since we entered the taxi. Not all drivers are talkative, so it didn't set off any alarm bells.

320131075.content: Only when I notice we are traveling farther away from the Infinite Power building on my GPS do I realize we are being covertly watched.

320131077.content: I give Ver and Osiris a look, pulling out my gun and pressing it to the back of the driver's head. He remains silent but finally steps on the brakes.

320131079.speaker: 我
320131079.content: There's something wrong with this guy. Get ou—

320131081.content: Getting out of the car, I see a tall silhouette in the alleyway next to me. Before I can identify why it feels familiar, Ver yanks me away. The golden light of her sword slices through a Visbane that is leaping toward me.

320131082.speaker: 奥西里斯
320131082.content: With that, a horde of Visbanes suddenly appears.

320131083.speaker: 我
320131083.content: Looks like they've got a big appetite... Prepare for combat.

320141001.speaker: 俱毗罗
320141001.content: Miss Zhiming doesn't mind, so I'll lend you this stuff for now. When you don't move, you're pretty much invisible. It's not as effective when you run, but it's still helpful.

320141002.speaker: 俱毗罗
320141002.content: We got this ammo from Yudini—I had Zhiming process it and put it in that weapon for you. The bullets burn with a blue fire that really packs a punch. There aren't many, so it's first come, first served for the Visbanes.

320141003.speaker: 俱毗罗
320141003.content: Don't even think about paying me back—you already saved me, so let's just call it even~

320141004.content: Kubera stuffs everything in my backpack without another word. He then suddenly whips around and shouts into the distance.

320141005.speaker: 俱毗罗
320141005.content: Hey, Kali. Deal's done. Add another one to the Aether Gazer account book!

320141006.content: I charge forward, activating the camouflage cloak Kubera lent me. As I monitor the Bane Energy with my Mimir system, Ver, Osiris, and I make our way through enemy territory.

320141007.content: Thanks to our daily training, I'm already familiar with Ver and Osiris's fighting style. I know just how to use my gun to create openings for them to attack.

320141009.content: The Divine Grace that explodes from my muzzle shatters the Visbane's supporting organs. I swap to the magazine filled with flaming bullets and turn to aim down the alley.

320141010.content: Ver and Osiris turn along with me, but there is no one in my crosshairs. A shadow flits over Osiris's head, sending a shiver down her spine. Before I can even speak, she swings her scythe up in a shining arc.

320141011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320141011.content: Don't try to sneak up on us!

320141012.content: Ver's sword and Osiris's scythe collide with a fist crashing down from above. I look up to see both Access Keys being pushed toward the ground.

320141013.content: Without hesitation, I raise my gun and fire nonstop at the dim, backlight figure in the sky. The flaming bullets ignite his clothes, the flames illuminating a devilish grin.

320141015.speaker: 罗波那
320141015.content: Not bad... No wonder Gremory couldn't handle you.

320141017.speaker: 罗波那
320141017.content: Hah! Trying to get yourself killed?

320141018.speaker: 我
320141018.content: You've got some nerve, showing your face. Do you have a death wish? Or did Mandeviya send you?

320141019.speaker: 罗波那
320141019.content: I'll tell you before you die.

320141020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320141020.content: Administrator... Our Divine Grace signals are blocked. It's just like what happened to Deputy Zhiming.

320141021.speaker: 我
320141021.content: Looks like we can't run without handling this guy first... But that's fine.

320141022.speaker: 我
320141022.content: I didn't think we'd catch such a big fish.

320142002.content: I switch my rifle to sniper mode and continuously fire at Ravana as he races toward us. However, he dodges every bullet, displaying agility at complete odds with his size.

320142003.content: His two fists slam into the massive sword and scythe again with immense force. Ver grips her sword with both hands, swings it to the right to break free from Ravana's punch, and whirls around to slice through him.

320142004.content: Unable to dodge, Ravana raises his arm and takes the brunt of Ver's attack. He then transfers all his strength to the other hand. The sudden impact from the surging Bane Energy sends Osiris flying.

320142008.speaker: 冥王
320142008.content: (You're weak. Even if you do land a hit, you'll barely leave a scratch.)

320142009.speaker: 冥王
320142009.content: (When we can finally separate, I won't tell you how to do things, okay? Don't waste this opportunity.)

320142011.speaker: 冥王
320142011.content: (Let the Cryptics worry about whether it's possible or not. Haven't you thought about it? Why are you acting so hesitant?)

320142012.speaker: 冥王
320142012.content: (Switch with me. I haven't seen Verthandi for a while—she's not half bad. If we work together, we might be able to take this guy down.)

320142014.speaker: 冥王
320142014.content: (...Well? You said okay, but you're not letting me out. Hurry up. My patience is running thin.)

320142016.speaker: 奥西里斯
320142016.content: It kinda hurts, but I'm okay... Administrator, I'm going to let Ausar—

320142017.content: Judging by her expression, I have a rough idea of what Ausar had said to her. But this is an emergency—if Ausar is willing to help, she might be able to help us out of this mess.

320142018.content: Ver seemingly hears us, a dark red power exploding out of her body as her power intensifies. She barely holds off Ravana, but it seems like she is at her limit.

320142019.speaker: 罗波那
320142019.content: Tch, Modifiers... Always quantity over quality.

320142020.content: Just as Ausar is about to take over for Osiris, the bloodlust in Ravana's eyes suddenly fades. He grits his teeth, knocks Ver back with his left fist, and rips a hole in the Source Layer behind him with his right hand.

320142022.speaker: 罗波那
320142022.content: I'm not interested in fighting a mob. I don't want to waste my time.

320142023.speaker: 罗波那
320142023.content: Don't think I can't see what's going on. You can't hold out for much longer, Verthandi.

320142025.content: Ravana strikes with a burst of energy similar to a sandstorm, and Ver immediately protects Osiris and me with a Divine Grace shield. When the energy dissipates, Ravana has already vanished.

320142026.content: Dense footsteps can be heard from outside the alley. Ver gasps as she stashes her Access Key, and Ausar stops the consciousness transfer process. We lean on one another as a team rushes toward us.

320142027.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320142027.content: So he realized CORG was here. I thought...

320142029.speaker: 我
320142029.content: Yeah... I was too careless. That disguise wasn't in any of the records. I didn't expect a taxi driver to trick us in broad daylight.

320142030.content: CORG soldiers quickly set up a perimeter around the scene, beginning their investigation. I quickly check the time—from the moment we stepped out of the car and I'd sent a backup request, less than five minutes had passed.

320142031.speaker: 我
320142031.content: You guys came here from Biotech? How did you get here so fast?

320142032.speaker: 涅赫贝特
320142032.content: Unfortunately, we had eyes on the wrong place. After you went into Biotech, I had my guys guard the building.

320142033.speaker: 涅赫贝特
320142033.content: Do you have any idea why Ravana attacked you guys?

320142034.speaker: 我
320142034.content: We were on our way to Infinite Power.

320142035.speaker: 涅赫贝特
320142035.content: Mandeviya. Our intelligence center looked into him yesterday—including his whereabouts before and after the attack on Kubera. He wasn't involved.

320142036.speaker: 我
320142036.content: ...Maybe you should have your people check again.

320142037.content: The lights in Gharpur are as bright as ever at night, but the streets are much emptier than our first two days here. After we head back to Meruism, I learn about the conflict in the North District, sensing a haze enveloping the surrounding area.

320142039.content: As I scan the two girls' injuries to make sure they haven't been corroded by Bane Energy, I can't help but sigh.

320142040.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320142040.content: What's wrong? Are you worried we won't be able to catch Ravana?

320142041.speaker: 我
320142041.content: Yeah. It just seems a little too convenient. I know it's a little crazy, but why did Ravana and the Joint Arbitration both choose to make a move when they did?

320142042.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
