320142042.content: Nothing special has happened recently. It couldn't be because we're here...

320142044.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320142044.content: Why aren't you saying anything? Do you really think that's why? I was just joking!

320142045.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320142045.content: If you really think about it, the conflict between the Joint Arbitration and Gharpur started when Yudini stole those goods. I'm not sure about the Cognizant Visbanes—who know's what they're planning?

320142046.speaker: 我
320142046.content: I can't say those two things are related. But us being here is definitely important. The three of us being here and our relationship with Brahmā might have put a target on our backs...

320142047.speaker: 我
320142047.content:
...I don't have any concrete evidence, so I'll stop with the conspiracy theories.
Lil' Osi, what are you looking at?

320142048.content: Osiris stares at her bruised hand, dazed. After clenching her Access Key too tightly, blood had collected in a circle under the skin of her palm. As I speak, she looks up at me before lowering her head again.

320142049.speaker: 奥西里斯
320142049.content: Administrator, were the Cognizant Visbanes you and Ver fought before that strong too...?

320142050.speaker: 我
320142050.content: You fought off a Cognizant Visbane yourself. Why do you look so disappointed?

320142052.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320142052.content: I couldn't have done it without Lil' Osi. Everyone needs to work together for a team to reach its full potential.

320142053.content: Ver gently takes Osiris's hands in hers, showing an encouraging smile. I hand her a towel, patting Osiris's head.

320142054.speaker: 奥西里斯
320142054.content: After all, I've trained with Ver countless times.

320142056.speaker: 我
320142056.content: Good thing I had Ningishzida prepare a few cans of Medical Spray. Do you guys feel better?

320142057.speaker: 奥西里斯
320142057.content: Yeah, I just got a little scratched up. I'm fine now...

320142058.speaker: 我
320142058.content: Ver, are you feeling okay after that fight?

320142059.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320142059.content: I'm not hurt—just a little tired from using the new Access Key... I don't feel like eating dinner. I just want to sleep.

320142060.speaker: 奥西里斯
320142060.content: Ver, are you... possessed by a Cognizant Visbane!?

320142062.speaker: 奥西里斯
320142062.content: It's freaky... Administrator, Ver said she's not going to have dinner... Isn't that weird?

320142063.content: I look at the two of them as they grow more lively, subbing my brow with a smile.

320151001.content: A black car comes to a stop outside the industrial park gate. A bullet-riddled door opens, and someone jumps out of the driver's seat. They open an umbrella and make their way into the temporary venue.

320151003.speaker: 梵天
320151003.content: Then I'm right on time. Is everyone here?

320151004.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151004.content: They're all here. You're the last one.

320151005.speaker: 梵天
320151005.content: Oh my, I kept you all waiting for so long. But you can't blame me—I left first thing in the morning.

320151006.speaker: 梵天
320151006.content: What a shame the road from Gharpur to the industrial park is such a mess. It's not an easy trip.

320151007.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151007.content: Looks like your car handled it pretty well. At least it didn't break down. What brand is it?

320151009.content: A massive open-center conference table with chairs lined up both inside and outside sits in the square at the entrance to the square. Brahmā nods at the familiar faces on the outside and finds an empty seat in the center.

320151010.speaker: 梵天
320151010.content: It's about time. Should we get started?

320151011.speaker: 梵天
320151011.content: Why do you look so upset, Kali?

320151012.speaker: 伽梨
320151012.content: ...The negotiations. Can't you bring me and Vati with you?

320151013.content: The streets are empty. All of the Meruism members are stationed on nearby rooftops to monitor the situation. On the entire block controlled by Meruism, the engine of the black car next to Brahmā and Kali is the only thing quietly humming.

320151014.content: Brahmā gets into the driver's seat and rolls down the window halfway.

320151015.speaker: 梵天
320151015.content: Everyone is sending one representative. We're lucky those companies are even willing to talk—let's not push our luck. What, are you worried about me?

320151016.speaker: 伽梨
320151016.content: Of course! Who knows what they're scheming? I don't believe for a second they're willing to negotiate peacefully.

320151017.speaker: 梵天
320151017.content: And? Did you forget who I am?

320151018.speaker: 伽梨
320151018.content: I know how strong you are, Boss Brahmā. But CORG is just waiting for a chance to mess with you. They even had Aether Gazer pay us a visit... It's a good thing the Administrator doesn't have any animosity toward us.

320151019.speaker: 梵天
320151019.content: Hehe, just remember that first thing you said.

320151020.speaker: 梵天
320151020.content: As for the Joint Arbitration and CORG... there are things I'm still not finished with—much more important things than our reputation or relationships.

320151021.speaker: 梵天
320151021.content: If someone really wants to screw with me, I won't mind reminding them...

320151022.content: Placing one hand on the steering wheel, Brahmā rolls up the window and looks ahead.

320151023.speaker: 梵天
320151023.content: Meruism has only stuck to the West District of Gharpur for this long simply because I have no interest in destroying them.

320151024.speaker: 尤蒂妮
320151024.content: ...Hey, where's the bazooka? Bring me the bazooka!

320151026.content: Lounging with her legs out the car window, Yudini suddenly sits up, turns around, and spots the black car approaching from Meruism's turf. She quickly reaches out the window and bangs on the car door.

320151027.speaker: 尤蒂妮
320151027.content: Enough playing around—let's move! Guard Boss Brahmā's car!

320151028.speaker: 尤蒂妮
320151028.content: If any of those company lapdogs even think about jumping her, kick their a**!

320151029.content: The convoy waiting on the roadside is arranged into two neat rows. Driving on either side of the black car, the convoy drives at the exact same speed as they head north together.

320151030.speaker: 高尔
320151030.content: What do you need this time? Money? Goods? Intel?

320151031.speaker: 俱毗罗
320151031.content: None of the above. I need your media connections. Something big is happening in the North District of Gharpur tomorrow.

320151032.speaker: 高尔
320151032.content: "Something big"? You're full of it. I haven't heard a thing.

320151033.speaker: 俱毗罗
320151033.content: Naturally, the big companies don't want anyone to know about it. You blinked—I can tell you're interest is piqued.

320151034.speaker: 高尔
320151034.content: I see how it is—you're playing with me. Who would report on something those companies don't want anyone to know?

320151035.speaker: 俱毗罗
320151035.content: Give it up, Gore. I know how the industry works. Those corporations hold each other back, and no one dares mess with the media. The TV stations and newspapers might be more conservative, but what about reporters?

320151036.speaker: 俱毗罗
320151036.content: They'd risk their lives to expose the truth or break an explosive piece of news.

320151037.content: The textbook left hook smashes into its target's ear. The victim's cheekbone cracks immediately, leaving half of his face deformed.

320151038.content: Azim wipes the blood off his fist, nods to his fellow boxers who have also taken down their opponents, and looks to the south to see an approaching convoy.

320151039.content: Dense gunfire follows the convoy with another group of cars right on their tail. But when a horde of drones with cameras near the convoy, their pursuers suddenly panic and cease firing.

320151040.speaker: 阿齐姆
320151040.content: Vati, someone really did come here to plant mines. Anyway, I had someone take care of it, so they didn't bury them in time.

320151041.speaker: 阿齐姆
320151041.content: You're amazing... How did you know there would be an ambush here?

320151042.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320151042.content: Ah, I got robbed when I went to pick someone up a few days ago. I'm pretty familiar with Longville's game. The rest was obvious after checking out a map...

320151044.speaker: 阿齐姆
320151044.content: It looks like everything is fine, but the escort convoy took a beating.

320151047.content: Brahmā looks up, raindrops falling into her eyes. The sky is like a colossal sieve, engulfing the venue.

320151048.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151048.content: We don't have time to worry about the weather. Say what you need to say.

320151049.speaker: 梵天
320151049.content: Here's the deal: I don't want to talk about Meruism's interests. I'm sitting here on behalf of Gharpur.

320151050.speaker: 梵天
320151050.content: We're here to find a solution everyone can agree on. That includes the people at your table—not just the various representatives from Gharpur on my side.

320151051.speaker: 梵天
320151051.content: Or do you think Infinite Power could back me up in these negotiations too? Why don't you ask your people, President Jiveka? Is that what you had in mind?

320151052.speaker: 吉维卡
320151052.content: We represent the interests of the Joint Arbitration as a whole. Internal profit distributions will be discussed after the meeting.

320151053.content: Mandeviya looks at Jiveka, who is sipping a cup of tea. He slowly reveals a wicked smile, pointing at Brahmā from a distance.

320151054.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151054.content: No wonder you're in charge of Meruism. That mouth of yours could take you straight to the top.

320151055.speaker: 梵天
320151055.content: Shall we continue discussing the disagreement on the industrial park's boundaries?

320151056.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151056.content: The development plan has already been decided, so it's pointless to argue about stuff we can't change.

320151057.content: Mandeviya spreads a map out on the table, pulls out a marker, and marks a giant square around the center of the map.

320151058.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151058.content: We'll be developing the entire area north of the Holy River. I guess you guys call it the "North District."

320151059.speaker: 梵天
320151059.content: Heh... Weird. It was smaller a few days ago.

320151060.content: Brahmā sneers. Her finger glides across the map, leaving behind a blue line that marks a significantly smaller area than Mandeviya had.

320151061.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151061.content: Understand something—more and more companies are joining in on this project. The Joint Arbitration can't play favorites. Everyone needs their fair share of the pie.

320151062.speaker: 梵天
320151062.content: The size of the pie has nothing to do with how it's cut. I didn't know you guys were so generous. Why not give out smaller pieces?

320151063.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151063.content: When you talk like that, I have to assume you're just ignorant. How can we make a profit without upping the scale?

320151064.speaker: 梵天
320151064.content: And how can people survive without land?

320151065.content: With that comment, Brahmā leans back in her chair, arms crossed. She closes her eyes, feeling the expressions of the representatives from Gharpur shift. She sighs inwardly.

320151066.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151066.content:
Alright. Let's negotiate seriously.
Construction has already been completed from here to here. We can stop there, but we're not tearing down anything that is already finished.

320151067.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151067.content: Wake up—everyone here is smart enough to know how many jobs an industrial park like this can create.

320151068.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151068.content: A factory salary is higher than what most of you earn hustling. Once you guys see the beauty in a stable job, we can talk expansion.

320151070.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151070.content: We're businessmen. Cash is king. As long as you guys work hard, why would we want to mess with our own business?

320151071.speaker: 梵天
320151071.content: Heh, that's exactly what you guys said before Gharpur existed.

320151072.speaker: 梵天
320151072.content: "New opportunities, a new sense of freedom. The new region of Gharpur will witness the future of Jivitabad. We'll develop the west together."

320151073.speaker: 梵天
320151073.content: Back then, you heard that sentiment echoed all over Jivitabad. There was no Affluent District, no New Town... It was just Jivitabad.

320151074.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151074.content: We're here to negotiate, not to listen to a history lesson!

320151075.speaker: 梵天
320151075.content: But who can guarantee history isn't repeating itself?

320151076.speaker: 梵天
320151076.content: Back in the day, everyone was parroting those impassioned slogans. They naively thought cash would roll in if they went all in on the West, bought up real estate, and invested in projects.

320151077.speaker: 梵天
320151077.content: But how did that story end? It was just a meticulously planned game by a few promoters. They pulled the rug out from under everyone, just when hopes were the highest.

320151078.speaker: 梵天
320151078.content: The bubble burst, and countless people woke up to find out they had lost everything. So many people jumped off of buildings that the news couldn't even report on all of them. The orphans didn't know who had hurt their parents.

320151079.speaker: 梵天
320151079.content: Those who survived in silence are now considered elders. They recall the history of this place over and over again, but you people won't even acknowledge its true name—Gharpur.

320151080.speaker: 梵天
320151080.content: Because you and your forebearers were behind it. You established these corporations as well as the Joint Arbitration, built a towering wall around the non-existent "downtown," and robbed the people of Jivitabad of their freedom.

320151081.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151081.content: Enough, Brahmā! All of that is in the past. What does it have to do with the here and now!? You're insulting your negotiating partners!

320151082.speaker: 梵天
320151082.content: Who knows how many lives Longville alone has taken? Isn't the current Joint Arbitration even more evil than those who came before you?

320151083.speaker: 梵天
320151083.content: What, you heard a few stories and got spooked? Did you even come here in good faith?

320151084.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151084.content: I hope you understand the position you're in. Just because I agreed to negotiate doesn't mean we're equals. If you continue to bring up irrelevant information, we're done here.

320151085.speaker: 梵天
320151085.content: Alright, then let's discuss the practicals. You guys can keep whatever's completed. No problem.

320151086.speaker: 梵天
320151086.content: But if you want to prove this isn't just another scam, let's see some transparency. I'll send people to patrol the industrial park. If they find any evidence of you breaking the la—

320151087.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151087.content: Do you even hear yourself? What makes those Slumdwellers qualified to "patrol" our park?

320151088.speaker: 梵天
320151088.content: Think about all of the dirty tricks you've pulled in the past. Meruism would never blindly leave lives in your hands.

320151089.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151089.content: How much are those lives worth in Gharpur? We're building a factory in the Slums, giving your people a chance to work. Did I give the impression I think too highly of you all?

320151090.speaker: 梵天
320151090.content: A legitimate job, respectable work, and basic dignity... is that asking for too much? Why won't you allow us to monitor the construction? Are you hiding something?

320151091.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151091.content: This is a factory overseen by the Joint Arbitration. It isn't a playground for gangsters and thugs. Either come here to work, or stay out.

320151092.speaker: 梵天
320151092.content: Then we're done here. Human lives aren't that cheap. I don't trust you guys.

320151093.content: Brahmā stands up and waves at the representatives behind her, signaling for them to leave.

320151094.speaker: 梵天
320151094.content: This is the Burning Scars' property. Everyone wants Longville's head on a stake, causing conflict between the gangs. Looting and theft are par for the course.

320151095.speaker: 梵天
320151095.content: You all need to get ready for what's coming next. Explain everything to your people.

320151096.content: Brahmā smiles indifferently, turning to leave. However, the Joint Arbitration security has already blocked the entrance to the park.

320151097.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151097.content: You think you live here? Think you can just waltz in here and leave whenever you please?

320151098.content: Mandeviya slams his fist on the table, and hundreds of humanoid security AGI Mechas approach from within the park. Lined up in neat rows, they are trailed by several large AGI Mechas. A low roar sounds as they charge their weapons, all of their crosshairs fixed on Brahmā.

320151099.content: Several of the company representatives clearly weren't expecting Mandeviya to do something like this. Their nervous expressions are evident.

320151100.speaker: 梵天
320151100.content: Aren't you afraid the media might expose you?

320151101.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151101.content: Before you threaten me, think carefully about who owns the media.

320151102.speaker: 曼达维亚
320151102.content: Sign the agreement, and we can avoid all this unpleasantness. Know your limits.

320151103.content: Brahmā's unconcerned smile slowly fades. She glances at Mandeviya, looks at the terrified representatives from Gharpur behind her, and sighs.

320151104.speaker: 梵天
320151104.content: Right, I should know my limits...

320161003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320161003.content: Looks like you're in a hurry. Are you heading out?

320161004.speaker: 伽梨
320161004.content: Yeah, but I'm just running some errands.

320161005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320161005.content: Ah, I see... I caught you just in time.

320161007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320161007.content: When I got back, Vati was tanning downstairs.

320161008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320161008.content: She told me you might be heading out. She asked me to remind you... not to go through the garage or jump through the window. Otherwise, she'll be right on your heels.

320161009.content: Kali is shocked for a moment before her tense body relaxes somewhat. She nods to Ver, retracts her hand from the windowsill, and quickly walks over to the stairs.

320161010.speaker: 伽梨
320161010.content: Did you want to talk to me about something?

320161011.content: Upon hearing Kali's voice, Parvati, who is sprawled out on her stomach in a lounge chair, rubs her eyes and sits up. Under the dazzling sunlight, she looks like a fish flipping over in a pan.

320161012.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161012.content: Isn't that my line? Don't you want to talk to me about something?

320161013.speaker: 伽梨
320161013.content: ..If I don't admit it, can I just leave?

320161014.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161014.content: I'm not your boss... Don't ask dumb questions like that...

320161015.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161015.content: But Kali, have you thought this through?

320161016.content: Kali, who has already turned around and taken a few steps away, slowly stops. After some time, she walks back to Parvati who is basking in the sun comfortably, and shakes her by the shoulder.

320161017.speaker: 伽梨
320161017.content: Can you be a little more serious? Even though I don't have to listen to you... Do you think I should go check on Boss Brahmā?

320161019.speaker: 伽梨
320161019.content: Boss Brahmā can't make a move—you know that better than me. It would be a headache if CORG found out about the stuff she and Miss Zhiming are researching.

320161020.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161020.content: ...No, you're not worried she's in danger. Even if thousands—no, tens of thousands of guys come after her, you know they can't hurt her.

320161021.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161021.content: You still haven't thought it through... How are you feeling?

320161023.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161023.content: Yeah, like, emotionally—happy, excited, calm, sad, angry...? Looks like you're mostly angry, so you're in a bad mood.

320161024.speaker: 伽梨
320161024.content: Of course I'm not. Do you honestly believe they're going to sit down and negotiate?

320161025.speaker: 伽梨
320161025.content: Gharpur sees the Joint Arbitration as murderous bloodsuckers. And they see Gharpur as disposable, completely absolving them of any guilt. That's how it's been for decades.

320161026.speaker: 伽梨
320161026.content: A "solution that makes everyone happy"... doesn't exist.

320161028.speaker: 伽梨
320161028.content: ...Are you saying she knew the negotiations wouldn't go as planned?

320161029.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161029.content: Well, Boss Brahmā isn't Odin or anything...

320161030.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161030.content: Maybe the negotiations are going well. #{nickname}# told me the Joint Arbitration isn't building the industrial park to destroy Gharpur—some guys in New Town just want to make some cash.

320161031.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161031.content: If they build an industrial park like the one in New Town, it wouldn't be horrible for Gharpur. You know that.

320161032.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161032.content: But the real question is: how much cash do they want to make? They're greedy, not hateful... If they don't treat the people of Gharpur like human beings, there will always be a power imbalance, no matter what "agreements" we sign.

320161033.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161033.content: Even if Boss Brahmā doesn't care about those little brawls, if the Joint Arbitration takes it too far and brings the fight to Meruism's doorstep, she'll put her foot down. Then...

320161034.speaker: 伽梨
320161034.content: It'll turn into a real fight... If you knew that, why didn't you say anything?

320161035.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161035.content: Because I knew you'd go... Even if I didn't send someone after you, I knew you'd go anyway. And I'm not good at handling conflict...

320161036.speaker: 伽梨
320161036.content: Are you seriously saying that like I don't know how strong you are?

320161037.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161037.content: It's not about whether I can fight or not. It's just not my style...

320161038.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161038.content: ...Do you hate those big companies? Do you want to kill Longville and his men?

320161039.content: Kali is taken aback, letting go of Parvati's shoulders. She looks at the Meruism deputy's lazy gaze. The subtle difference in her eyes shows Kali that her question is serious.

320161040.speaker: 伽梨
320161040.content: No... I mean, we're Modifiers. I just don't think the people of Gharpur should be pushed around like this. But I don't know anything about how to negotiate. I want to stop them, but I don't know how...

320161041.speaker: 伽梨
320161041.content: Azim, Yudini, all of the gangs in the East and North Districts... They're just trying to survive here in Gharpur, staying in their own lane.

320161042.speaker: 伽梨
320161042.content: Even they have to live in fear, suffering for things that have nothing to do with them. And they just roll their eyes at the life we want, where everyone has food on the table, clothes to wear, and basic dignity... Will it ever become a reality?

320161043.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161043.content:
I'm not sure, but you're overthinking it.
This is Gharpur. You know better than anyone how Gharpur handles conflict.

320161044.content: Parvati shrugs, pulls a piece of chocolate out of her pocket, and drops it in Kali's hand.

320161045.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161045.content: Have something to eat, then go teach those bullies a lesson.

320161047.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161047.content: You know you're a Modifier, so you shouldn't have gotten involved from the beginning. But you feel like this is tied to you, right? And why don't Longville and the gangsters see anything wrong with you stepping in?

320161048.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161048.content: You understand what I'm saying, right? Judging by your expression, I think you do... In this fight, we're just humans.

320161049.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161049.content: I'm Meruism's gopher—you're our fighter. You're the one who drove back a street full of people that night, and you're the one with that new prosthesis like Longville's.

320161050.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161050.content: Now, someone is challenging Meruism's boss. Our fighter is ticked off and wants to show the troublemakers who's boss, using some kind of... prosthesis? Device? I'm not even sure what to call it.

320161051.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161051.content: Everyone knows they shouldn't cross Meruism. They know why Meruism is in charge of the West District, why we make the rules in Gharpur. As for why that "Kali" girl is such a good fighter...

320161052.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161052.content: I heard Meruism has been working with the Tian Lu Traders, and they even have visitors from Aether Gazer now. Where did her prosthesis come from, I wonder? It's anyone's guess...

320161053.content: Reclining in her chair once again, Parvati gives the stunned Kali a thumbs-up, then retracts her thumb to make a clenched fist.

320161054.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320161054.content: The Affluent District's laws don't apply to Gharpur. Isn't that how it's always been?

320161055.speaker: 曼达维亚
320161055.content: Sign the agreement, and we can avoid all this unpleasantness. Know your limits.

320161057.content: The Security AGI Mechas surround Brahmā as the representatives from the Affluent District and Gharpur are led out of the venue. Mandeviya raises his chin, gazing at Brahmā triumphantly.

320161058.content: The latter remains quiet. She doesn't so much as glance at the deadly barrels aimed at her, simply whispering something under her breath.

320161059.speaker: 曼达维亚
320161059.content: Didn't you hear what I said?

320161061.content: Following his subordinate's gesture, Mandeviya looks outside the industrial park. His pupils gradually dilate before a dark cast falls over his gaze...

320171001.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320171001.content: By the way—it's been a while since you used your other Access Key, hasn't it?

320171002.speaker: 伽梨
320171002.content: ...Yeah. Something that violent could lead to accidents.

320171003.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320171003.content: It would be perfect against AGI Mechas. Hmm... they'll probably send some. After all, those big shots will have to pay for any little bumps and scratches...

320171004.speaker: 伽梨
320171004.content: Are you sure...? That thing is pretty flashy. Isn't it a little overkill?

320171005.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320171005.content: Overkill? Nah. Right now, the bigger the better...

320171007.speaker: 伽梨
320171007.content: (How could I lose a fight like this...)

320171008.content: The armed AGI Mechas are crushed and warped by the constant strikes from the massive hammer. Sparks fly in all directions, but Kali emerges completely unscathed.

320171010.speaker: 曼达维亚
320171010.content: What the hell? Why won't this girl die!?

320171011.speaker: 联合仲裁安保队长
320171011.content: There's something off about her protheses...! They must be military-grade!

320171012.speaker: 曼达维亚
320171012.content: Bull****! Those poor Meruism rats can't afford stuff like tha—

320171013.speaker: 曼达维亚
320171013.content: Heh... First, it was someone from Xu Heng, then someone from Ain Soph. Looks like they've been prepping for a while.

320171014.content: The sound of the fight can be heard clearly several blocks away. Kali has drawn the attention of almost all the security guards, with people outside the park coming to watch as well.

320171015.content: The Affluent District representatives' expressions grow increasingly grim. Nearly all of them summon their bodyguards, worried Kali might dash over and tear them limb from limb.

320171016.speaker: 吉维卡
320171016.content: Chairman Mandeviya, your "hardline" approach doesn't seem to be working.

320171017.speaker: 曼达维亚
320171017.content: I underestimated them. After rising to the top in a dog-eat-dog place like the Slums, they've earned the right to be arrogant.

320171018.speaker: 伽梨
320171018.content: If you wanna keep fighting, bring it on! If you're scared, just put down your weapons!

320171020.speaker: 伽梨
320171020.content: You agreed to negotiate, but you brought all these AGI Mechas and soldiers along with you. It's obvious you were trying to kill Boss Brahmā. So let me ask you—if I wanted you dead, do you really think YOU could leave?

320171021.content: Mandeviya and Kali lock eyes, droplets of sweat forming on his forehead. She possesses a rage he's never seen before, whether it be in the ring or when doing business, seemingly ready to devour everything in sight.

320171022.speaker: 伽梨
320171022.content: Since Boss Brahmā is fine, I'll only wreck your AGI Mechas this time and save you some humiliation.

320171023.speaker: 伽梨
320171023.content: But you need to understand something before you end up in the ground—this isn't the Affluent District. You can't come in here like a tyrant... This is Gharpur. We know how to get revenge.

320171024.content: Kali looks back toward the entrance. Kubera, Yudini, Azim... the crowd behind her is filled with familiar faces.

320171025.content: Brahmā stands sideways between Kali and the crowd, her indifferent expression and stance unflinching since the battle began.

320171026.speaker: 梵天
320171026.content: That's enough, Kali. Let's hear what they have to say.

320171027.content: Kali nods at Brahmā's order. She shakes out her arms and walks toward the crowd, turning her back on the security guard's guns. The guards all glance at one another, and ultimately, no one fires.

320171028.content: The crowd welcomes Kali's victorious return with reverent gazes. Kali can't help but shudder, knowing that if she wasn't forced to wait for Brahmā and the Joint Arbitration to negotiate right now, she would have crossed a line.

320171029.speaker: 伽梨
320171029.content: Yudini, what are you doing here? What if they see you... Yudini?

320171031.content: Yudini is the only one looking away from Kali. Her eyes are glassy, fixed on a tall and muscular figure next to Jiveka as her lips part in surprise...

320171032.content: The man seemingly notices Yudini's gaze, and he turns away slightly. However, his expression under the mask is completely unclear.

320171034.speaker: 尤蒂妮
320171034.content: I don't know... It's impossible! He already...

320171036.content: The conference table was destroyed during the battle, and the Joint Arbitration still hasn't brought out another one. Negotiations must go on, but no one wants to stand around and talk.

320171037.speaker: 吉维卡
320171037.content: It's clear that Meruism, or rather, Gharpur, can enter discussions as our equal. It would be best to pretend the incident just now never happened.

320171038.speaker: 吉维卡
320171038.content: We need to reach a conclusion for the industrial park. I think both sides should take a step back and think about how we can solve this issue.

320171040.speaker: 吉维卡
320171040.content: You claim to be representing the entirety of "Gharpur," while Mandeviya and I represent the Joint Arbitration. But at the end of the day, we're both competing for the right to speak and lead, hoping the situation will shift in our favor.

320171041.speaker: 梵天
320171041.content: I won't deny that. Meruism sets rules to shape Gharpur into what we believe is "better."

320171042.speaker: 吉维卡
320171042.content: See? It isn't hard to come to a consensus.

320171043.speaker: 吉维卡
320171043.content: But since we've reached an impasse on how to handle this matter, why don't we turn it over to the people we represent?

320171044.speaker: 吉维卡
320171044.content: Personally, I've always seen the industrial park as a positive for the North District of Gharpur. I understand your distrust, but I have faith that the majority of people will welcome a chance to develop the area.

320171045.speaker: 吉维卡
320171045.content: We'll use your plan as a compromise—everyone who used to live in this area will vote. If a majority of the previous residents agree, I think it would only be fair for Meruism to respect their wishes, no?

320171046.speaker: 梵天
320171046.content: And what if the majority disagrees?

320171047.speaker: 吉维卡
320171047.content: At the very least, Biotech will be the first to withdraw our investment.

320171048.speaker: 格莫瑞
320171048.content: Ravana, it seems you've turned up empty-handed.

320171049.speaker: 罗波那
320171049.content: Those two girls are tougher than you think. Paired with CORG's people, none of us would stand a chance.

320171050.speaker: 罗波那
320171050.content: Besides, they're laser-focused on me now. Isn't that what we wanted? What more do you want from me?

320171051.content: Deep within the Source Layer, all but hidden to Modifiers, several crimson projections slowly gather in the ruins around Ravana.

320171052.content: Save your frustration for the enemy, Ravana. No one blames you. You performed well this time.

320171053.content: It's just a shame you weren't able to retrieve the scythe in the meantime, even after taking such a big risk...

320171054.speaker: 罗波那
320171054.content: So you admit it was a risk? I'm throwing myself into these pointless fights to solve your petty problems, and you think I can just do stuff "in the meantime"!?

320171055.speaker: 诺维赫
320171055.content: Let's focus on the situation as a whole. Don't get caught up in the details.

320171056.speaker: 罗波那
320171056.content: You don't get to decide what's important, Novich. Just worry about your Isolation Hold.

320171057.speaker: 诺维赫
320171057.content: Don't worry. Everything is proceeding smoothly.

320171058.speaker: 罗波那
320171058.content: ...I have to remind you all that Meruism was already a thorn in our side. Now, we've attracted the attention of both Aether Gazer and CORG. Don't expect me to clean up your mess.

320171059.speaker: 巴钦
320171059.content: I will assist you. Just follow Master Turing's orders.

320171060.speaker: 罗波那
320171060.content: I need all the help I can get. Next time I run into Brahmā, I'm going to settle the score.

320171061.speaker: 巴钦
320171061.content: That isn't the plan. Acting without authorization will be considered blatant disobedience. There will be consequences.

320171062.speaker: 罗波那
320171062.content: Hah! The thing Turing is after is smack dab in the middle of her turf. You really think we can avoid her?

320171063.speaker: 罗波那
320171063.content: I guess orders are orders—no choice. Gremory, didn't you guys have a nice little plan when you went to Xu Heng too? Distract Gengchen, take the Sephirah Core, then escape? How did that turn out?

320171065.speaker: 罗波那
320171065.content: You lost—don't deny it. I don't even know why Turing brought you along. You couldn't even handle that little girl with the sword.

320171067.speaker: 巴钦
320171067.content: Enough! You're a Revelator! Watch your tongue!

320171068.content: The speaker's anger explodes in a sharp outburst. Bathin's warning erupts in their minds as a blazing slash.

320171070.speaker: 罗波那
320171070.content: Enough nonsense. Figure out how to handle those Modifiers. You can't run from this fight.

320171071.content: Ravana's aura disappears. Silence lingers over the remaining individuals for some time.

320171073.content: Heh, looks like he still doesn't know how Botis died.

320171075.content: It's just a face. More than a dozen people witnessed his battle with Odin. Gremory was there too.

320171076.content: Tell me—why was Agares, who rushed to the front, unscathed, but Botis was killed while shooting from a distance?

320171078.content: Well, you chose the safest answer. Cautious as always. For now, I'll believe you really didn't notice him protecting them...

320171079.content: Bathin, what are you so worried about? When it comes to Master Turing's plan, the fewer people with ulterior motives, the better.

320171080.speaker: 巴钦
320171080.content: The plan requires manpower. This isn't the time to cast suspicion at one another. Master will decide who stays and who goes.

320171081.speaker: 巴钦
320171081.content: Ravana is right about one thing—we have attracted too much unnecessary attention.

320171082.content: Relax. It will all be worth it in the end. Don't worry about them watching you like a hawk—I'll keep those Modifiers busy when the time comes.

320171083.content: Of course, if anyone else is willing to help, I welcome them.

320171084.speaker: 诺维赫
320171084.content: I'll have to decline. Just going to Shashvat is a headache, and I have enough on my plate. I assume your answer is the same, Gremory?

320171086.speaker: 格莫瑞
320171086.content: I can ask around each of Turing's Sephirah Zones, but it's like you said—this plan requires manpower. That's unfortunately true of every plan.

320171087.content: Really? Well, it can't be helped. But we still need to retrieve the scythe that Master Turing wants...

320171088.content: It seems that Ravana is out of his depth against Verthandi and the other personality in Osiris's body. What about you?

320171089.speaker: 巴钦
320171089.content: The mission has already been decided. No need to discuss this further.

320171090.content: The space goes silent as the most powerful of the bunch suddenly disappears, leaving behind nothing more than a chilling thirst for blood.

1107401002.speaker: 我
1107401002.content: Yep. There are two potted plants from Xu Heng in a Division Nine hallway at Aether Gazer. No one knows how to take care of them, so they don't look too good. They were withering by the time I left.

1107401003.speaker: 我
1107401003.content: We brought them back from Xu Heng last time. I want to figure out how to save them, but I don't even know where to start. That's why I need your guys' help.

1107401004.speaker: 禄良
1107401004.content: Don't sweat it. The Tian Lu Traders are always happy to lend Aether Gazer a hand. Besides, you've been up to your ears helping the Quad. I'm glad we can repay the favor.

1107401005.speaker: 禄良
1107401005.content: You said they're native to Xu Heng, right? You came to the right place. Our head butler is an expert when it comes to gardening.

1107401006.content: The Tian Lu Traders' head butler...? Did she mean Yingzhao? I met her the first time I came to Xu Heng. We've worked together a few times since then, so we already know each other pretty well.

1107401007.content: I picture Yingzhao as I think. She always speaks efficiently, her gaze both concerned and restrained...

1107401008.speaker: 选项一
1107401008.content: Yingzhao is the head butler?/Yingzhao is a gardening expert?

1107401009.speaker: 禄良
1107401009.content: Yingzhao handles anything and everything for the Tian Lu Traders. We would be completely lost without her as head butler.

1107401010.speaker: 禄良
1107401010.content: She helped you out a lot, right? Last time you came to Xu Heng, she was taking care of things at the Tian Lu Traders while she helped you with all those documents.

1107401011.speaker: 禄良
1107401011.content: You didn't know? Yingzhao really cares about Xu Heng plants.

1107401012.speaker: 禄良
1107401012.content: Last time you came to Xu Heng, you had a lot on your plate. Yingzhao was the one who put those calming plants in your room. She didn't tell you?

1107401013.speaker: 禄良
1107401013.content: Either way, we've all known each other for a long time. This should be a cinch. Here's Yingzhao's address—there's a big garden behind her house.

1107401014.speaker: 禄良
1107401014.content: Just tell her what's going on, and she'll take care of everything. Rest up tonight. You can go see her tomorrow morning.

1107401015.content: After a busy day, I go to sleep early and wake up bright and early the next day. Without anything to do, I leave for Yingzhao's house after washing up.

1107401016.speaker: 我
1107401016.content: Yingzhao, are you here? Sorry, I wanted to ask you some questions about plants.

1107401018.content: In my head, Yingzhao always looks like she's hard at work. She handles even the most complex problems with poise and precision, almost like she doesn't even need to rest.

1107401019.content: But the person in front of me looks bleary-eyed, her hair touseled. It's clear she has just awoken from a deep sleep.

1107401020.speaker: 英招
1107401020.content: My boss already let me know. Come in.

1107401023.speaker: 英招
1107401023.content: Nope. Do you mind? I'll make a note of it.

1107401024.speaker: 我
1107401024.content: No, I mean... I obviously came over before you were ready. I'm the one who should apologize.

1107401025.speaker: 英招
1107401025.content: It's alright. I don't mind if you see any of this.

1107401026.content: Looking past Yingzhao, I spot her neat yet cozy room. It's surprisingly different from the chilly impression she gives off.

1107401027.speaker: 英招
1107401027.content: But I still have a few things to take care of, so I'll have to ask you to wait a moment.

1107401028.speaker: 我
1107401028.content: No rush. You can help me take a look at the plants after you're done.

1107401029.content: Yingzhao moves back and forth within the room as if I'm not even there, tidying up and getting ready for the day. She picks out her outfit, braids her hair...

1107401030.speaker: 英招
1107401030.content: There's a knot in my hair... tsk.

1107401031.speaker: 英招
1107401031.content: One earring is missing... I'll wear these today.

1107401032.speaker: 英招
1107401032.content: ...Don't rush. Calm down. We just need to reassure them...

1107401033.speaker: 英招
1107401033.content: ...We have the upper hand in the deal. Slow and steady... When the boss is ready, we can...

1107401034.content: As I listen to the sound of running water and mumbling coming from the bathroom, I can't help feeling somewhat emotional.

1107401035.speaker: 我
1107401035.content: Luliang clearly mentioned Yingzhao was off today—why is she still handling all this stuff?

1107401036.speaker: 我
1107401036.content: This is the first time I've seen Yingzhao in an everyday situation. But I'm not surprised, considering how she is...

1107401037.content: Yingzhao walks out of the bathroom as she hangs up on the call.

1107401038.speaker: 英招
1107401038.content: Administrator, would you like some tea? I don't have anything else to drink.

1107401039.speaker: 我
1107401039.content: No, that's alright. But have you had breakfast, Yingzhao? Could we have a quick bite?

1107401041.content: Yingzhao opens the adjacent refrigerator, revealing a rare sheepish expression. I walk over behind her, curious, and peer into the fridge.

1107401042.speaker: 我
1107401042.content: It's all frozen pancakes and rice balls. You don't have any other groceries?

1107401043.speaker: 英招
1107401043.content: This is the most efficient way to meet my nutritional needs.

1107401044.speaker: 我
1107401044.content: Even though I was already aware of your eating habits, seeing it for myself is a real trip...

1107401045.speaker: 英招
1107401045.content: Sorry, I don't have anything prepared for guests.

1107401046.speaker: 我
1107401046.content: It's alright. You obviously don't see me as an outsider.

1107401047.speaker: 我
1107401047.content: So I don't mind. I'll just walk a mile in your shoes today.

1107401049.speaker: 英招
1107401049.content: Alright. I'll heat some up for you.

1107401050.content: As the automatic cooking device beeps, white steam and the aroma of food wafts over to the table.

1107401052.content: I sit down at the table across from Yingzhao, diligently finishing all of the food on my plate. Perhaps because food is always comforting, or maybe because she clearly sees me as a friend, I truly begin to relax.

1107401053.content: Opposite me, Yingzhao is distracted, sorting through files on her handheld device as she eats. She isn't ignoring my presence, but she isn't being overly polite either.

1107401054.content: It's like I've been seamlessly integrated into Yingzhao's morning routine.

1107401057.speaker: 英招
1107401057.content: Is something wrong? You keep looking at me.

1107401058.speaker: 我
1107401058.content: Well... you're the only thing in front of me. I guess there's nothing else to look at.

1107401059.speaker: 英招
1107401059.content: Waiting for me here will be too boring for you. Would you like to check out Sophora Garden first? It's at the end of the hallway.

1107401060.speaker: 英招
1107401060.content: It's the garden behind my house—Linyu and I built it together. It has a lot of plants native to Xu Heng. We'll need to go there anyway to get you some fertilizer and tools for your potted plants.

1107401061.speaker: 英招
1107401061.content: I should show you around, but I'm not quite finished here...

1107401062.speaker: 我
1107401062.content: It's alright. I'll go take a look first.

1107401063.speaker: 英招
1107401063.content: If you see any flowers or plants you like, feel free to take a few back with you. I'll be there in a bit.

1107401064.content: Luliang had casually described Sophora Garden as a "garden behind Yingzhao's house" yesterday, leading me to underestimate it.

1107401065.content: The large area is exquisitely arranged, blanketed in a serene atmosphere. Clusters of flowers and trees flood my eyes as soon as I step in. With the sound of my unfamiliar footsteps, a few small creatures scamper into the dense branches.

1107401066.speaker: 我
1107401066.content: There are so many plants I've never seen before... I've been to Xu Heng multiple times, and I've seen all sorts of trees lining the roads and potted plants. Where did Yingzhao find all of these rare plants for her garden?

1107401067.speaker: 我
1107401067.content: This bush... looks kind of familiar. Have I seen it before?

1107401068.speaker: 我
1107401068.content: These plants all look so healthy. Yingzhao must spend a lot of time and energy taking care of them. Looks like I came to the right place.

1107401070.speaker: 英招
1107401070.content: That's a wildflower that belongs to the genus Viola.

1107401071.content: Yingzhao is seemingly finished with her documents. Without me even realizing it, she walks over to my side, speaking softly in my ear.

1107401072.speaker: 英招
1107401072.content: Pansies used to be common wildflowers that grew on the ground. You could see them everywhere. But after the Cloudsong Crisis, the ground soil degraded, and they couldn't survive.

1107401073.content: Yingzhao bends down and lifts the plant's withered leaves that stand out from their surroundings, revealing dry and rotted roots.

1107401074.speaker: 英招
1107401074.content: I brought them here to save them. But Yu Jing's environmental conditions are different than those on the ground. Small changes to air pressure, temperature, and soil all affect how plants survive.

1107401075.speaker: 英招
1107401075.content: I finally got this one to grow recently, but it's already... Other types of violets grow just fine.

1107401076.speaker: 英招
1107401076.content: These pansies aren't the only plants that have a hard time surviving. If it wasn't for that disaster, these little guys would be growing freely like they're supposed to. It wouldn't be so tough...

1107401077.content: Yingzhao stares at the plant in silence. I don't want to interrupt her train of thought, so I quietly study her calm face.

1107401079.speaker: 英招
1107401079.content: What about those withered potted plants? What's going on with them?

1107401080.speaker: 我
1107401080.content: I can't really describe it... but I took some pictures of them from different angles.

1107401081.content: I turn on my communicator and pull up the pictures. Yingzhao instinctively glances over.

1107401082.speaker: 英招
1107401082.content: Yeah, those Evermoon Azaleas don't look too good.

1107401084.speaker: 英招
1107401084.content: Yeah... it's a type of azalea that began growing after the Cloudsong Crisis. As far as potted plants go, they're the best of the best.

1107401085.speaker: 我
1107401085.content: I just searched it up—the blooms are actually light green. Looks like there's a story behind them too...

1107401086.speaker: 我
1107401086.content: "They say the person who developed this flower and her lover were childhood friends, but they were separated for years after the Cloudsong Crisis. Fortunately, they reunited, and this azalea is named after their shared companionship."

1107401088.speaker: 我
1107401088.content: Did you not know that story, Yingzhao? Well... I guess made-up stories like that are useless when it comes to actual gardening.

1107401089.speaker: 英招
1107401089.content: No... I've actually heard it before. It's a nice story.

1107401090.speaker: 英招
1107401090.content: But unfortunately, judging from these pictures, they can't be saved.

1107401091.speaker: 我
1107401091.content: They can't...? I haven't seen them bloom the entire time I've been at Aether Gazer.

1107401092.speaker: 英招
1107401092.content: Then... do you want to try growing some new ones?

1107401093.speaker: 我
1107401093.content: Me? Grow them from seeds...? Can I really keep such pretty flowers alive?

1107401094.content: Yingzhao shakes her head as she spots me looking down at the withered pansies on the ground.

1107401095.speaker: 英招
1107401095.content: Plants that emerged after the Cloudsong Crisis are much easier to grow than those from before. It won't be that hard.

1107401096.speaker: 英招
1107401096.content:
I can give you tools and advice, but I don't think I have any Evermoon seeds right now.
Give me a second... I'll check.

1107401097.speaker: 英招
1107401097.content: We could buy seeds from Meigu zone, but you'd have to wait a few days. Or... there happens to be an event going on at Yu Jing Commercial Street.

1107401099.content: I glance over the promotional poster, instantly intimidated by the creativity displayed by Xu Heng's commercial department, as well as its citizens' recreational activities.

1107401101.speaker: 英招
1107401101.content: Why don't we go check it out?

1107401104.speaker: 英招
1107401104.content: You need the seeds, and I'd like to experience this kind of thing for myself.

1107402001.content: Bustling noise, surging crowds of people, and rows of activities and stalls fill the venue. As soon as we step onto the commercial street, we are immediately swept up in the festive atmosphere.

1107402002.speaker: 我
1107402002.content: This is a commercial street? This looks more like a carnival.

1107402003.speaker: 英招
1107402003.content: Hi, we're looking for Evermoon seeds.

1107402004.speaker: 工作人员A
1107402004.content: You two are looking for Evermoon seeds too? You know what they say, "Share an Evermoon, share a life together!" Congratulations!

1107402005.speaker: 工作人员A
1107402005.content: You need to earn a certain number of points to redeem Evermoon seeds. Today is the last day of our three-day event, so it's now or never! The clock's ticking!

1107402006.speaker: 我
1107402006.content: It's already the last day of the event?

1107402008.content: While I'm still surprised, Yingzhao has already whipped out a notebook. She calculates the number of points we need by consulting the poster next to us.

1107402009.speaker: 我
1107402009.content: Yingzhao, have you ever been to a carnival like this before?

1107402011.speaker: 英招
1107402011.content: I used to live on Nanjiao Isle. I helped out at similar events there.

1107402012.speaker: 我
1107402012.content: ("Helped out"...? I guess Ying Zhao is a real workaholic. I'm not even surprised to hear that.)

1107402013.content: As I'm distracted, Ying Zhao finishes her calculations and stashes her pen.

1107402014.speaker: 英招
1107402014.content: We can't get more points by spending money, so we'll have to try out more activities.

1107402015.speaker: 英招
1107402015.content: Which one would you like to try first?

1107402017.speaker: 我
1107402017.content: This brain teaser over here looks pretty easy.

1107402019.speaker: 英招
1107402019.content: We can rack up points fast with this quiz over here.

1107402021.content: After walking over to the stall and jotting down our information, questions begin popping up on the screen.

1107402022.content: To me, the questions are easy and fun. But I can sense some confusion on Yingzhao's face.

1107402023.speaker: 题目
1107402023.content: Four steamed buns sit in a bowl. Four children each take one, but there is still one left in the bowl. Why?

1107402024.speaker: 英招
1107402024.content: Because something happened to one of the children, so he couldn't come get it?

1107402025.speaker: 英招
1107402025.content: That's not right... Everyone took one, so there shouldn't be any left.

1107402026.speaker: 英招
1107402026.content: Is there a problem with the way they were distributed? Or maybe there's a hidden reward and punishment system?

1107402027.speaker: 我
1107402027.content:
What a complicated theory...
I think the last child took the bowl with him.

1107402028.speaker: 题目
1107402028.content: Which of Xiaoying's family members does she most closely resemble?

1107402029.speaker: 英招
1107402029.content: Based on the information given to us, it's impossible to know which parent Xiaoying most closely resembles.

1107402030.speaker: 英招
1107402030.content: But in terms of age, it's likely that Xiaoying most closely resembles a sister.

1107402031.speaker: 英招
1107402031.content: Linyu and I aren't actually related by blood, but sisters always share similar characteristics.

1107402032.speaker: 我
1107402032.content: Well, actually, Xiaoying most closely resembles herself.

1107402034.speaker: 我
1107402034.content: Yingzhao, have you not done brain teasers like this before? Most kids love these kinds of games.

1107402035.speaker: 英招
1107402035.content: Well, I wasn't expecting that. It looks like I have to think outside the box...

1107402036.speaker: 我
1107402036.content: It's just another way of thinking about things.

1107402037.speaker: 题目
1107402037.content: You can do it, I can do it, everyone can do it. One person can do it, but two people cannot do it together. What is it?

1107402038.content: As I look on with anticipation, Yingzhao falls deep into thought.

1107402041.content: I let out a loud exclamation, but awkwardly regain my composure as Yingzhao looks at me.

1107402043.content:
Yingzhao's gaze falls on me. In fact, it seems like it has always been on me.
She smiles faintly.

1107402045.content: With that, Yingzhao and I quickly make our way through multiple stalls related to plant science.

1107402046.speaker: 英招
1107402046.content: From bottom to top, those are the pedicel, receptacle, calyx, petals, and stamen.

1107402047.speaker: 英招
1107402047.content: Identify the leaf specimens? From left to right, those are ginkgo, elm, birch, and oak.

1107402048.speaker: 英招
1107402048.content: Potatoes are tubers, radishes are root vegetables, lotus roots are rhizomes, and strawberries are receptacles.

1107402049.speaker: 我
1107402049.content: You sure know a lot, Yingzhao.

1107402050.speaker: 英招
1107402050.content: It's just some basic knowledge I picked up as a hobbyist.

1107402051.speaker: 英招
1107402051.content: If you don't need to take a break, we can move on to the next activity.

1107402053.speaker: 英招
1107402053.content: Multiple pairs compete at the same time, and whoever reaches the finish line first earns points. Looks like we have a big advantage.

1107402054.speaker: 工作人员B
1107402054.content: The next round starts in three minutes. Would you two like to sign up? You can try standing on it first if you want.

1107402056.content: Before I can react, Yingzhao is already stepping lightly on the long wooden plank. She faces the finish line and leans over to reach for me.

1107402059.content: A gentle force spreads throughout my body from my wrist. I can almost feel the heat from her fingers through the fabric. My body reacts before my brain can keep up, and my feet land steadily on the plank.

1107402060.content: I remain calm and don't look down at the ground. Instead, I gaze up at Yingzhao's beautiful face.

1107402061.content: The second my foot leaves the ground, I know something's off. Unfortunately, there is no turning back. I veer forward, about to hit Yingzhao in front of me.

1107402062.content: Fortunately, my arms are supported by a steady pair of hands. I stand firm but nervous, and my eyes inadvertently move along the arms supporting me until I meet Yingzhao's concerned gaze.

1107402063.speaker: 英招
1107402063.content: Just keep your balance. Leave the rest to me.

1107402064.speaker: 工作人员B
1107402064.content: Is everyone good to go? Ready... set... go!

1107402065.content: Just the right amount of force supports my arms. I step, jump, and breathe, all while my heart pounds. Through my disoriented vision, I seem to see Ying Zhao staring into my eyes.

1107402066.speaker: 工作人员B
1107402066.content: You two weren't only the first in this group—you got the fastest time in all three days!

1107402067.content: After completing a few more activities, we find a shady area to take a short break.

1107402068.content: Yingzhao pulls out her little notebook and scribbles something inside.

1107402069.speaker: 英招
1107402069.content: We still don't have enough points.

1107402070.speaker: 我
1107402070.content: Well, this was a three-day event. We came on the very last day.

1107402071.speaker: 英招
1107402071.content: There's got to be a way...

1107402072.content: I have the urge to tell Yingzhao to loosen up a bit, but met with her typical serious expression, I'm at a loss for words.

1107402073.speaker: 我
1107402073.content: Yingzhao, look. The cart over there is sellin—

1107402075.speaker: 我
1107402075.content: Oh, you know what it is? Well... I guess it would be even weirder if you didn't.

1107402076.speaker: 英招
1107402076.content: Linyu ate it when she was little.

1107402077.speaker: 英招
1107402077.content: As a plant, cotton is widely grown and extremely practical. I've grown it in Sophora Garden before.

1107402078.speaker: 英招
1107402078.content: But cotton candy... can only be enjoyed by people with a lot of free time. For me, it's always been a waste of time.

1107402079.speaker: 我
1107402079.content: Then do you want to waste some time and try it out together?

1107402080.speaker: 我
1107402080.content:
We have nothing but free time right now. You're not going to suddenly pull out some documents you need to look over like you did this morning
...right?

1107402083.speaker: 工作人员C
1107402083.content: Sorry, but I just sold out. These two kids bought the last two.

1107402084.speaker: 女孩
1107402084.content: How pretty... Miss, do you wanna eat cotton candy too?

1107402085.speaker: 英招
1107402085.content: Yes, I wanted to try it for the first time.

1107402086.speaker: 女孩
1107402086.content: Huh? You've seriously never had cotton candy before?

1107402087.speaker: 男孩
1107402087.content: When it comes to sweets, cotton candy is the tastiest and most fun of all!

1107402089.speaker: 男孩
1107402089.content: Keep it down! The adults are gonna hear us. We don't want them to find out we snuck here to eat cotton candy.

1107402090.speaker: 女孩
1107402090.content: They won't! Are they heading this way? We should go to the eastern area and hide out for a bit. But it's still fenced off over there...

1107402091.speaker: 男孩
1107402091.content: You hold the cotton candy, and I'll give you a boost. We can jump over.

1107402093.content: The boy and girl look at one another as they take the cotton candy. The girl then reaches out, handing hers to Yingzhao.

1107402094.speaker: 女孩
1107402094.content: Take it, Miss. No need to thank me—we'll just eat one. I was so happy the first time I ate cotton candy, so make sure you savor it!

1107402095.speaker: 男孩
1107402095.content: Gotta go! Maybe we'll see ya around!

1107402097.content: The two kids rush off with their cotton candy, and Yingzhao's gaze is fixed on where they left.

1107402098.speaker: 我
1107402098.content: Those two, sneaking around to eat cotton candy... They're so cute.

1107402099.speaker: 我
1107402099.content: It's a good thing we're adults. We can just sit right here and eat it.

1107402100.speaker: 英招
1107402100.content: It didn't really look like they were in a hurry. They seemed really happy. Is cotton candy really that delicious?

1107402101.speaker: 我
1107402101.content: Well, everything "sweet" is definitely worth cherishing. But it's not just the "sweet" flavor of cotton candy—it's also the "sweet" feeling of two kids playing together.

1107402102.speaker: 我
1107402102.content: So I hope you'll accept this "sweet" treat.

1107402105.speaker: 英招
1107402105.content: Since it's only "sweet" when two kids play together, let's share it.

1107402106.content: Without hesitation, Yingzhao gently places the cotton candy in my palm.

1107402107.speaker: 英招
1107402107.content: Up close, it really does look like a cotton plant.

1107402108.speaker: 英招
1107402108.content: It's so soft and fluffy... Where should I start?

1107402110.speaker: 我
1107402110.content: Any feelings of doubt vanish in the face of cotton candy! Just be brave and open your mouth!

1107402111.content: As Yingzhao watches on, I open my mouth wide and bite off a chunk, enjoying the sweet flavor as it melts on the tip of my tongue.

1107402113.content: The airy threads of sugar brush against her lips, tongue, and cheeks.

1107402114.content: Yingzhao and I look at each other helplessly as bits of cotton candy melt onto our cheeks.

1107402115.speaker: 我
1107402115.content: Just eat it however you want. There aren't any rules when it comes to cotton candy.

1107402116.content: For the first time since we met, I glimpse a sense of puzzlement in Yingzhao's gaze.

1107402118.content: Yingzhao reaches out and tears off a chunk of cotton candy. Seeing it is about to melt onto her fingertips, she pushes it into her mouth, along with her fingers.

1107402119.content: Watching me tear off a piece just like she did, Yingzhao reveals a somewhat helpless expression.

1107402120.content: The puff of cotton candy resting on the glutinous rice stick gradually grows smaller.

1107402121.speaker: 英招
1107402121.content: Huh... why are my lips sticky? My fingers too...

1107402122.speaker: 我
1107402122.content: It's kind of annoying and inefficient, right? You definitely can't eat it and look through documents at the same time. That's just how cotton candy is.

1107402123.speaker: 我
1107402123.content: Are you feeling a little more relaxed now?

1107402125.speaker: 我
1107402125.content: Stuff that seems pointless isn't always completely pointless. You should have tried it sooner.

1107402126.speaker: 英招
1107402126.content: I never got the chance before. There was no one like you around, Administrator.

1107402129.speaker: 英招
1107402129.content: Sometimes, she makes Wensi Tofu for us to eat together. It's pretty tough to cook, and it requires a lot of time to savor.

1107402130.speaker: 英招
1107402130.content: But whenever we eat it together, Linyu is always relaxed and happy.

1107402131.speaker: 我
1107402131.content: Someone you can compromise with, someone to enjoy "pointless" moments with... It sounds like Linyu is really important to you.

1107402132.speaker: 英招
1107402132.content: Someone... to enjoy pointless moments with...

1107402133.content: I look up to meet Yingzhao's gaze.

1107402134.content: The now-bare rice stick clutched in my palm is slightly warm from my grip. It rests right in the middle as we sit side-by-side, as if it is somehow measuring the ever-shifting distance between us.

1107402136.content: That is, until a familiar face appears in the corner of my eye.

1107403001.speaker: 英招
1107403001.content: It really is her. What's she doing here? I didn't know she liked carnivals...

1107403003.content: We walk over to the puzzle game stall from earlier. As we call out her name, Linyu spins around, surprised.

1107403005.speaker: 麟钰
1107403005.content: You guys are here too? I didn't see either of you over the last two days.

1107403008.content: Upon hearing Linyu's evasive tone, I quickly help her change the subject.

1107403009.speaker: 我
1107403009.content: Since you've been here for all three days of the event, you must know all about redeeming points for seeds, right?

1107403010.speaker: 英招
1107403010.content: The Administrator needs two Evermoon seeds. We're working together to get them.

1107403011.speaker: 麟钰
1107403011.content: What a coincidence! I'm actually saving up points too.

1107403012.speaker: 英招
1107403012.content: Did you run out of something?

1107403013.speaker: 麟钰
1107403013.content: No, no, I've got everything I need. Don't you worry about me, Yingzhao.

1107403014.speaker: 我
1107403014.content: Well, this is our only day here, so we're still short on points. Is there anything we can do, Linyu?

1107403016.speaker: 麟钰
1107403016.content: Ah! There's a three-person activity that gives out the most points. I've heard it's really hard, but if the three of us give it a shot, I'm sure we can do it.

1107403017.speaker: 麟钰
1107403017.content: We can go try it out. What do you think, Sis?

1107403018.content: It seems as if Yingzhao doesn't know how to respond to Linyu's excitement, and she avoids her gaze. I can't stop myself from silently tugging on her sleeve.

1107403019.speaker: 英招
1107403019.content: Yeah, of course we can... You really saved us.

1107403020.speaker: 麟钰
1107403020.content: I'm just happy to help, Sis!

1107403021.content: Linyu winks at me as she says this, covertly expressing her gratitude.

1107403023.content: We followed Linyu to the team activity registration area.

1107403024.speaker: 我
1107403024.content: Oh, it's a team puzzle game.

1107403025.speaker: 麟钰
1107403025.content: Let's see... the three participants all play individually.

1107403026.speaker: 英招
1107403026.content: The first needs to be blindfolded to make their way through an obstacle course. The second gives directions from a distance, and the third goes into a spooky dark room where they have to feel their way around...

1107403028.speaker: 英招
1107403028.content: ...The third person has to explore the room and solve the puzzles to help the two other people win.

1107403029.speaker: 英招
1107403029.content: I can go into the room.

1107403032.speaker: 麟钰
1107403032.content: When it comes to solving puzzles, I'm the best of the best. Sure, it'll be a little dark... but it's nothing for a Modifier!

1107403033.speaker: 麟钰
1107403033.content: I've never gotten the chance to fight by your side, Sis. Plus, it's just a game.

1107403034.content: Linyu pulls on my sleeve as if she's looking for some support.

1107403036.speaker: 选项一
1107403036.content: I get where you're coming from./It's just a game, after all.

1107403038.speaker: 麟钰
1107403038.content: Hehe, it's great having you around my sister, Administrator.

1107403039.speaker: 麟钰
1107403039.content: Ahem... I mean, you're the best, Sis! Anyway, just leave it to me!

1107403040.content: Though she doesn't turn her down, Yingzhao nervously watches Linyu until she disappears from sight.

1107403041.speaker: 英招
1107403041.content: Then I'll do the blindfolded course.

1107403042.speaker: 我
1107403042.content: Playing to our strengths, huh? Alright, then I'll give the instructions.

1107403043.speaker: 我
1107403043.content: You always handle everything by yourself flawlessly—I don't get the chance to guide you step by step every day. Make sure you listen carefully, haha.

1107403045.content: With the help of an employee, we step into the escape room, which is bathed in a projection. Yingzhao puts on the blindfold, as well as headphones to listen to my instructions. Then, we are led to the start and finish respectively.

1107403046.speaker: 选项一
1107403046.content: Can you hear me?/Where are you?

1107403048.speaker: 英招
1107403048.content: I'm here. Do you see me?

1107403049.speaker: 我
1107403049.content: Yeah, I see you. How are you feeling?

1107403050.speaker: 英招
1107403050.content: Well, I can't see anything now. It's a little uncomfortable.

1107403051.speaker: 我
1107403051.content: Are you afraid of the dark, Yingzhao?

1107403052.speaker: 英招
1107403052.content: No. I just can't see anything in front of me with my eyes covered like this. I feel... like I'm not in control.

1107403053.speaker: 我
1107403053.content: I see. You're the type to handle every little thing yourself. But now, it's time to work together!

1107403054.speaker: 工作人员B
1107403054.content: Is everyone good to start? Alright... ready, set, go!

1107403057.content: In the distance, Yingzhao steadily follows each of my instructions. Soon, the mechanism blocking her path slowly unlocks.

1107403058.content: Thanks to our teamwork, we successfully complete the first three stages.

1107403059.speaker: 我
1107403059.content: However, the stages only grow more difficult. It takes longer and longer to solve the puzzles, so I need to give my instructions even more quickly and decisively.

1107403060.speaker: 我
1107403060.content: No wonder this awards more points than any other activity.

1107403061.speaker: 英招
1107403061.content: Are we running out of time?

1107403062.speaker: 我
1107403062.content: Don't sweat it. We don't have that many stages left. Believe in your teammates and just enjoy the game, okay?

1107403063.speaker: 英招
1107403063.content: It's not that I don't believe in you guys, I just...

1107403064.speaker: 英招
1107403064.content: This is bad. I have to hurry. I have to...

1107403066.content: Before I can even finish speaking, Yingzhao seemingly hears the mechanism shifting and takes a step forward.

1107403067.content: The countdown continues on the screen as the final mechanism whirs. Yingzhao follows my instructions, stopping in her tracks.

1107403068.speaker: 英招
1107403068.content: Maybe the last puzzle is too hard for Linyu... Are we in the last minute of the countdown? I heard a sound.

1107403069.speaker: 英招
1107403069.content: I could just force my way through...

1107403071.speaker: 我
1107403071.content: I know you're used to flying solo, but Linyu and I are your teammates this time.

1107403073.content: Yingzhao agrees to wait, but she continues to listen intently to the sound of the mechanism, attempting to analyze its rotation. As the countdown steadily decreases, I put down the communicator and push myself to think.

1107403074.speaker: 我
1107403074.content: Is Linyu having trouble with the last puzzle? But knowing her skill level, it shouldn't be a problem...

1107403075.speaker: 我
1107403075.content: Let me think about this... Even if she solves the puzzle now, the mechanism's rotation will only slow down, not stop... So there's still a chance Yingzhao might get hurt...

1107403076.speaker: 我
1107403076.content: Linyu had one minute to familiarize herself with the different types and locations of the puzzle mechanisms before she entered the room...

1107403077.content: As I stare at both the mechanism and the still-blindfolded Yingzhao, my concerns lead to a eureka.

1107403078.speaker: 我
1107403078.content: The fork in the road! I didn't choose the other way earlier because it was a long detour, but we won't run into any puzzle mechanisms over there!

1107403080.speaker: 我
1107403080.content: Turn back. There was a fork in the road earlier. Do you remember?

1107403081.speaker: 我
1107403081.content: I think Linyu must have chosen that path.

1107403082.speaker: 英招
1107403082.content: ...You said that path was sealed off before unlocking the puzzle mechanism earlier. It's too late to turn back.

1107403084.speaker: 我
1107403084.content: You're not alone. You don't need to shoulder everything by yourself. Listen to my voice—I'm right here with you.

1107403087.speaker: 我
1107403087.content: Turn back... to the left and back... Yes! Right there!

1107403088.content: As if in response to Yingzhao's arrival, the puzzle mechanism unlocks just in time. I immediately look over to the finish line, opening my arms to welcome Yingzhao.

1107403090.content: As she steps out of the room, Yingzhao pulls off her blindfold. Light rushes into her crystal-clear eyes once again. She holds onto my arm tightly as she slows down her breathing.

1107403093.speaker: 我
1107403093.content: See? You can always count on me and Linyu.

1107403094.speaker: 英招
1107403094.content: Looks like I had nothing to worry about.

1107403095.speaker: 英招
1107403095.content: Since you were giving me instructions, I should have just calmed down and left everything to you.

1107403096.speaker: 英招
1107403096.content: ...I'm starting to understand what it feels like to have you by my side.

1107403099.content: After exiting the puzzle room a little later, Linyu happily rushes over to our side.

1107403100.speaker: 麟钰
1107403100.content: I wasn't half bad, right? The stuff in that room didn't scare me at all!

1107403101.speaker: 英招
1107403101.content: You did a great job, Linyu. So did you, Administrator.

1107403102.speaker: 麟钰
1107403102.content: Hey... Yingzhao, are you feeling okay? You look a little pale.

1107403103.speaker: 英招
1107403103.content: I ran out here blindfolded just now. I need to catch my breath.

1107403104.speaker: 麟钰
1107403104.content: Sit down and take a break. I'll go get you a bottle of water!

1107403105.content: As the girl rushes out, we notice she left the voucher on the bench.

1107403106.speaker: 我
1107403106.content: Did Linyu forget to take the voucher? I'll go catch up with her.

1107403107.content: Soon after, I catch up with Linyu. As I approach the redemption stall, I pretend to casually strike up a conversation.

1107403108.speaker: 我
1107403108.content: Yingzhao told me that you guys lived on Nanjiao Isle when you were little?

1107403109.speaker: 麟钰
1107403109.content: That's right! My sister and I both awoke after the Cloudsong Crisis.

1107403110.speaker: 麟钰
1107403110.content: Things were different back then. My sister joined the Tian Lu Traders, and I met my teacher. Everyone in the Quad took really good care of us.

1107403111.speaker: 麟钰
1107403111.content: At first, we didn't even have somewhere to shelter ourselves from the rain. I was too young, so I couldn't work. My sister had to work multiple jobs just to support us. She was only 14 or 15 then.

1107403112.speaker: 我
1107403112.content: Working just to survive, huh... It must have been really hard.

1107403113.speaker: 麟钰
1107403113.content: If my sister heard you say that, I'm sure she'd say, "It was nothing. Almost everyone in Xu Heng works their fingers to the bone to make a living."

1107403114.speaker: 麟钰
1107403114.content: But she's the one who's always worked hard to support us, so I don't have the right to say that.

1107403115.speaker: 麟钰
1107403115.content: It's just... my sister is always so busy. After she came to Yu Jing with the Tian Lu Traders, we didn't have to worry about surviving anymore. But she still works non-stop, just like before.

1107403116.speaker: 我
1107403116.content:
So before, you two...
No wonder she was so anxious just now.

1107403117.speaker: 麟钰
1107403117.content: My sister is almost weirdly calm most of the time, but she still gets really anxious once in a while. She'd never admit it, but I always worry I'm being a burden...

1107403118.speaker: 我
1107403118.content: Don't worry. You did a great job today. You really helped me and Yingzhao out.

1107403119.speaker: 我
1107403119.content: I think that tense feeling from before is still sticking around. But she'll slowly grow out of it.

1107403120.speaker: 英招
1107403120.content: Back so soon? What were you guys talking about?

1107403123.speaker: 我
1107403123.content: We have enough points now, so let's go redeem our seeds.

1107403124.content: By the time we leave the redemption area, it's already getting dark.

1107403125.content: Since we didn't register at the same time, Yingzhao and I headed to a different window than Linyu. When we meet up again, Linyu is holding the same seed.

1107403126.speaker: 麟钰
1107403126.content: I actually came here so I could get this seed and give it to you, Sis. I don't know why I was so embarrassed to tell you earlier.

1107403129.speaker: 麟钰
1107403129.content: Hehe, You're always the one worried about me. I'm just happy I got to do something for you this time.

1107403130.speaker: 麟钰
1107403130.content: It's getting late. I promised my teacher I'd be back around now.

1107403131.content: Linyu pauses as her gaze floats between me and Yingzhao.

1107403132.speaker: 麟钰
1107403132.content: I'll let you guys enjoy each other's company.

1107403133.content: A soft breeze blows through the night air. Perhaps we don't want the day to end, because Yingzhao and I walk around and sit down on a bench together for some time.

1107403134.content: People continue to stroll back and forth along the street. Separate from the bustling noise and laughter, we enjoy a small moment of peace that belongs to us alone.

1107403135.speaker: 我
1107403135.content: I was worried about you helping me all day long, but now you have a seed too.

1107403136.speaker: 英招
1107403136.content: We can plant these Evermoon Azaleas together.

1107403137.speaker: 我
1107403137.content: Yeah. Evermoon Azaleas represent companionship—even though you only have one here, ours will grow at the same time. That makes them companions.

1107403138.speaker: 我
1107403138.content: I still haven't thanked you for helping me today.

1107403139.speaker: 英招
1107403139.content: No need. I should thank you and Linyu for helping me add another flower to Sophora Garden.

1107403140.speaker: 我
1107403140.content: Now that you mention it, why did you start Sophora Garden? You're so busy, and taking care of those plants must eat up a lot of time.

1107403141.speaker: 我
1107403141.content: Is it just because you enjoy it? You're always so diligent. It's hard to imagine you'd have such a relaxing hobby.

1107403142.speaker: 英招
1107403142.content: I'm not sure I'd say I "enjoy" it.

1107403143.speaker: 英招
1107403143.content: It's more that every time I see plants or animals on the ground, I think about how they once thrived, but now they struggle to survive in that harsh environment. I never know if they can survive on their own, so I can't just leave them alone.

1107403144.speaker: 英招
1107403144.content: I know about the laws of nature. Every living thing has its own unique adaptations to survive, so bringing them to Sophora Garden is also selfish of me.

1107403145.speaker: 选项一
1107403145.content: It's not selfish.\Everyone is a little selfish.

1107403146.speaker: 我
1107403146.content: How is that selfish? You're just helping. You help the plants and animals in Sophora Garden, you help Linyu, and you helped me today.

1107403147.speaker: 英招
1107403147.content: I'm happy when I'm with everyone else... and with you. Satisfying your own desires is inherently selfish, so I think it's fair to call it that.

1107403148.speaker: 我
1107403148.content: If that's the case, then everyone is extremely selfish. I guess I'm being completely selfish sitting with you right now.

1107403149.speaker: 英招
1107403149.content: If you were being selfish today, then... so was I.

1107403150.content: Yingzhao's gaze rests firmly on the street in the distance. I feel an inexplicable burning sensation on my shoulder as my thoughts jumble.

1107403151.speaker: 我
1107403151.content: Other than earning these seeds... Linyu also told me a little bit about your past today.

1107403152.speaker: 我
1107403152.content: I don't want to imply that today made up for it or anything. After all, those harsh but precious memories you two share are just touching stories to me.

1107403153.speaker: 我
1107403153.content: But I really hope you felt like you could relax a bit and have fun today.

1107403155.speaker: 英招
1107403155.content: My boss has given me time off before, but I couldn't stop myself from finding something to stay busy. I thought the same thing would happen today.

1107403156.speaker: 英招
