1107403156.content: But today... I feel like time has never flown by so fast. I didn't do anything, but my body and mind felt much more relaxed.

1107403157.speaker: 我
1107403157.content: It looks like you've found a way to rest.

1107403159.speaker: 英招
1107403159.content: I think it's because you're here with me.

1107403160.content: Yingzhao turns, her hair gliding over her shoulder, and leans in closer to me. Her hands silently shift from their position on the bench as her crystalline eyes blink slowly.

1107403162.speaker: 我
1107403162.content: We were just having fun or sitting together like right now. I really didn't do much...

1107403163.speaker: 英招
1107403163.content: It's enough... Just having you here is always enough.

1107403165.content: A group of laughing kids runs by, a few employees stroll past us and chat after finishing their shift, and a smiling couple points at the stars overhead as they pass by...

1107403166.content: And the two once-articulate people on the bench are suddenly at a loss for words. As their eyes meet, they carefully brush against the murmurs deep within their hearts, simultaneously wanting to run away.

1107403167.speaker: 英招
1107403167.content: Administrator... when were you planning on heading back to the Tian Lu Traders?

1107403169.speaker: 英招
1107403169.content: Would you like to go to Sophora Garden with me one more time? We can get the tools ready to plant the Evermoon seeds.

1107403170.speaker: 我
1107403170.content: (Didn't Yingzhao already get everything ready before we left this morning...?)

1107403172.speaker: 我
1107403172.content: No, not at all. It's just late, so I'm worried I might be bothering you.

1107404002.speaker: 英招
1107404002.content: Everything you need to prepare the soil, plant the seeds, germinate them, and keep them growing is all right here. I've also sent a list of important things to remember to your communicator.

1107404003.speaker: 英招
1107404003.content: If you have questions later on, you can ask me anytime. And just let me know if you need more fertilizer or soil nutrients. I'll send them to Ain Soph.

1107404004.speaker: 我
1107404004.content: What about you, Yingzhao? Don't you need this stuff?

1107404005.speaker: 英招
1107404005.content: I have plenty for Sophora Garden.

1107404006.speaker: 英招
1107404006.content: There's more than enough space to plant it in the soil, but maybe it would be better as a potted decorative plant. Do you want to help me pick out a pot?

1107404007.content: Yingzhao and I look at each other, silently agreeing to extend my stay.

1107404009.speaker: 英招
1107404009.content: Azaleas are sensitive to water, and they like wide, shallow pots that allow for better airflow. They keep the soil moist but not too wet.

1107404010.speaker: 我
1107404010.content: That's what the two pots in the Aether Gazer building look like too.

1107404011.speaker: 英招
1107404011.content: Which of these two do you like better?

1107404013.speaker: 我
1107404013.content: It‘s even lighter than the Evermoon. It'll be perfect for the flower.

1107404014.speaker: 我
1107404014.content: You can never go wrong with a nice simple color.

1107404016.content: After choosing the pot, Yingzhao places it in front of the window by the desk. She gazes at it for some time.

1107404017.speaker: 英招
1107404017.content: They were growing here before too.

1107404019.speaker: 英招
1107404019.content: When you brought those two Evermoon Azaleas back from Xu Heng, they had already broken through the soil and sprouted leaves. Naturally, I had to germinate the seeds ahead of time.

1107404020.speaker: 我
1107404020.content: Wait... are you saying those two azaleas were from you?

1107404021.content: Yingzhao turns around somewhat shocked, looking into my eyes.

1107404022.speaker: 英招
1107404022.content: I asked someone else to give the flowers to you since I was busy that day. It seems like you got a bunch of gifts when you left Xu Heng, so they probably got lost in the mix.

1107404023.speaker: 我
1107404023.content: I haven't apologized for ruining your flowers like that.

1107404025.content: Yingzhao's fingers gently brush against the flower pot. It seems as if she's done it many times before, caressing a flower pot before giving it away.

1107404026.speaker: 英招
1107404026.content: At least this time, they get to be with you again.

1107404027.content: Following Yingzhao's movements, I feel like I can visualize the buds in the pot, both past and future.

1107404028.content: The urge that has been simmering in my heart surges up into my throat.

1107404031.speaker: 我
1107404031.content: Remember the dead pansies I saw in Sophora Garden this morning? I have an idea.

1107404032.speaker: 我
1107404032.content: We should preserve them as plant specimens.

1107404033.speaker: 英招
1107404033.content: Where did that idea come from?

1107404034.speaker: 我
1107404034.content: When you were answering those botanical science questions earlier, I learned a little bit about preserving specimens.

1107404035.speaker: 我
1107404035.content: But... I know it's a little sudden. I don't even know if you have the right tools.

1107404037.content: Yingzhao and I return to Sophora Garden. The pansies that haven't yet been preserved are still lifelessly splayed out on the soil.

1107404038.speaker: 英招
1107404038.content: I'll definitely save you next time...

1107404039.content: With Yingzhao's guidance, we snip the stems and leaves off the pansies. We leave the roots in the soil, allowing them to become nutrients for other plants when the soil is turned someday.

1107404040.speaker: 我
1107404040.content: Let's use some of the dead leaves too. They were part of the plant when it was alive, after all.

1107404041.speaker: 英招
1107404041.content: Alright. We can head back to the house.

1107404042.speaker: 英招
1107404042.content: After we clean and shape the flowers, we can press and air dry them. That would usually take a few days, but we can use the drier Linyu helped me modify.

1107404043.speaker: 英招
1107404043.content: Could you help me grab the picture frame?

1107404044.content: When everything is finished, Yingzhao places the picture frame on the table. The dead stems and leaves intertwine with their living counterparts, and the small buds that had only begun to bloom are now forever frozen in the picture frame.

1107404045.content: It is reminiscent of both eternal life and death.

1107404046.speaker: 我
1107404046.content: It's actually really pretty. Don't you think?

1107404047.speaker: 英招
1107404047.content: If they could grow out of the earth, their green foliage and vivid blossoms covering the mountains... that would show their real, innate beauty.

1107404048.speaker: 我
1107404048.content: But it's been a long time since the Cloudsong Crisis.

1107404049.speaker: 我
1107404049.content: Even though you couldn't save this one, you saved so many other plants, right? Sometimes, you just have to move forward.

1107404050.speaker: 英招
1107404050.content: Letting go of the past is easier said than done.

1107404051.speaker: 我
1107404051.content: You don't have to let go of it.

1107404052.speaker: 我
1107404052.content: For these pansies, all of their past suffering, hardship, and struggle to survive is already over.

1107404053.speaker: 我
1107404053.content: You don't have to bury a past like that, but you don't have to carry it with you either. Sometimes, it's nice to put it in a picture frame as a decoration and a reminder.

1107404054.speaker: 英招
1107404054.content: Its past... is a decoration and a reminder...

1107404055.speaker: 我
1107404055.content: Ah, whoops. Am I talking about "pointless" stuff again?

1107404056.content: I wink mischievously. However, Yingzhao unexpectedly reveals a smile.

1107404057.speaker: 英招
1107404057.content: People hardly ever joke with me like that.

1107404058.speaker: 英招
1107404058.content: My boss doesn't get sidetracked when we're talking about work, and other people usually don't like me because they think I'm too serious and boring.

1107404059.speaker: 英招
1107404059.content: How should I put it... Maybe it's just because we spent a "pointless" day together, so...

1107404060.content: Yingzhao pauses, responding to me with a "joke" of her own.

1107404061.speaker: 英招
1107404061.content: ...So we got to know each other better.

1107404062.speaker: 我
1107404062.content: There was always a sort of distance between us before. But today and tonight... you feel much closer.

1107404064.speaker: 英招
1107404064.content: I want to keep you here... I want to respond to you. But I don't know what to give you. My only idea is to share pieces of my life with you.

1107404065.speaker: 英招
1107404065.content: #{nickname}#, I want to invite you to Sophora Garden again.

1107404066.speaker: 英招
1107404066.content: I know I'm busy with work and don't have much downtime. I don't want to even think about spending my time on things with no value. But here in Sophora Garden, there's a place where I can really relax.

1107404067.content: As I slowly follow Yingzhao through Sophora Garden, I spot two wicker chairs placed side by side in a nook I hadn't noticed this morning.

1107404069.content: The cool evening breeze, chittering insects, as well as the scent of grass, trees, and soil blankets the garden. I look up to see countless stars in the night sky.

1107404070.speaker: 英招
1107404070.content: This is one of my favorite parts of life. I wanted to share it with you.

1107404072.content: My mind floats up to the stars and gazes back at my body. Wedged between the vast sky and the warm earth, it feels as if only Yingzhao and I exist, as if it will always be that way.

1107404073.content: As I sense an inexplicable burning in my ears, I can't help changing the subject.

1107404074.speaker: 我
1107404074.content: It's easy for fantasies to pop into your head while you're looking at the sky...

1107404075.speaker: 英招
1107404075.content: I've been busy surviving for as long as I can remember. I've always been worried about tangible things—daily necessities, work, and money. I don't know much about childhood fairy tales or fantasies.

1107404076.speaker: 我
1107404076.content: Sorry, I shouldn't have brought it up.

1107404077.speaker: 英招
1107404077.content: No. If it's okay, I'd like you to tell me a few fairy tales.

1107404079.speaker: 我
1107404079.content: Once upon a time, there was a little boy... no, an older sister and a younger sister. They lived with their father and stepmother at the edge of the forest...

1107404080.speaker: 我
1107404080.content: ...When the younger sister heard their parents were going to abandon them, the younger sister began to sob. "Don't cry," the older sister said, as she comforted her younger sister. "Don't worry. I'll think of something."

1107404081.speaker: 英招
1107404081.content: I'm surprised fairy tales for little kids are that dark...

1107404082.speaker: 我
1107404082.content: ...The children ventured through the forest for a long time. Exhausted and hungry, a snow-white bird led them onward, stopping in front of a small cottage.

1107404083.speaker: 我
1107404083.content: The walls were made of sweet-smelling bread. A thick cake made up the roof, and sparkling sugar cubes acted as windows.

1107404084.speaker: 英招
1107404084.content: How could a house be made out of bread and cake...? No, wait. I guess it's just a fairy tale.

1107404085.speaker: 英招
1107404085.content: The walls might get a little sticky, but it must be really nice to live there. You don't need to worry about the cold or ever going hungry. You'd have sweet dreams every night.

1107404086.speaker: 我
1107404086.content: Would you like to live in a house like that, Yingzhao?

1107404087.speaker: 英招
1107404087.content: If I was still a kid, I'd definitely want a stable home and yummy food instead of always worrying about our next meal or where we were going to sleep at night.

1107404088.speaker: 我
1107404088.content: It's sad, but houses made of food don't really exist, and it's a trap created by the villain in this story. But the two sisters eventually outsmart the bad guy, just like you, Yingzhao.

1107404089.speaker: 我
1107404089.content: The next story is about a girl named Alice. She was walking along a riverbank one day and spotted a white rabbit. It had a gold pocketwatch and was talking. Alice chased the rabbit and fell into a fantastical world down the rabbit hole...

1107404090.speaker: 英招
1107404090.content: A rabbit wearing clothes... the mad hatter... weird food that can make someone grow or shrink... a Cheshire Cat that can vanish and reappear out of thin air... and the cruel Queen of Hearts...

1107404091.speaker: 英招
1107404091.content: ...It's so bizarre and magical, but it's just a young girl's afternoon dream... So that's what fairy tales and fantasies are like for other children.

1107404092.speaker: 我
1107404092.content: Do you think fairy tales are fun?

1107404094.speaker: 我
1107404094.content: In the story, Alice is a really happy and cute kid. Yingzhao... are you envious of her?

1107404095.speaker: 英招
1107404095.content: Well, if we're talking about that, there are countless things I'm envious of.

1107404096.speaker: 英招
1107404096.content: Other people have loving parents, come from wealthy families, or even just have better luck.

1107404097.speaker: 英招
1107404097.content: One day, it was raining really hard. I left Linyu with a nice shopkeeper while I went out looking for work, but everywhere was closed. I couldn't find a single job to do.

1107404098.speaker: 英招
1107404098.content: I was supposed to meet up with my friend about another job that day, but I couldn't find her. I could only sit on the side of the road, soaking wet as I hid from the rain.

1107404099.speaker: 英招
1107404099.content: Later on, I learned she happened to find a long-term job that day. I'd shown up late because I had to take Linyu to the shopkeeper. The employer was in a hurry, so she couldn't wait for me.

1107404100.speaker: 英招
1107404100.content: Of course, I have to thank my boss, Luwu, and everyone else in the Quad for all their help. But as long as I can remember, I've needed to handle every meal, every matter, every single little thing by myself to feel at ease.

1107404101.speaker: 英招
1107404101.content: Even Sophora Garden and the wicker chairs we're laying on... I made everything here. I only feel safe after I personally make sure everything is safe and sound.

1107404102.speaker: 我
1107404102.content: I thought helping you relax was just a normal thing to do, but was I actually pushing you?

1107404103.speaker: 英招
1107404103.content: No. I'm so grateful for today, for everything you did, Administrator.

1107404104.speaker: 英招
1107404104.content: It's like you said—I need to move forward.

1107404106.content: Yingzhao's speech slows slightly. I hear the sound of fabric and hair rustling against each other.

1107404107.speaker: 英招
1107404107.content: I'm thinking about how great it would've been if you were there.

1107404108.speaker: 英招
1107404108.content: Maybe you would have brought me an umbrella on that rainy day, or I wouldn't have gone out at all. We could have hid away together and listened to the rain.

1107404109.speaker: 英招
1107404109.content: Having someone to lend a hand would've given me time to relax. I could've helped you and Linyu with the chores, and you would've taught me how to play with rocks and branches we find outside like normal kids.

1107404110.speaker: 英招
1107404110.content: We'd fight and make up, make pointless jokes, plant flowers together, fantasize about the future on sleepless nights, and work hard together for that same future when the morning came.

1107404111.speaker: 英招
1107404111.content: I never wanted a house made of food or a carefree, luxurious life that just fell from the sky.

1107404112.speaker: 英招
1107404112.content: Just like those two kids waiting for cotton candy, just like the horticulturalist who bred the Evermoon Azalea... I want a happy and innocent shared childhood.

1107404113.speaker: 英招
1107404113.content: #{nickname}#, I really can't stop myself from... fantasizing about growing up and living with you.

1107404115.content: My gaze is suddenly pulled away from the starry sky overhead. I inadvertently turn around and look at Yingzhao. Though we are separated by the wicker chairs, only now do I realize how close they really are.

1107404116.content: The aroma of her hair, her beautiful face, and her soft skin are all at my fingertips. The whole time I've been lying down admiring the stars, she has been looking at me like this.

1107404117.content: For a moment, everything I want to say is swept away by the emotions in my chest.

1107404118.speaker: 英招
1107404118.content: I made these two chairs myself. They're not as good at Linyu's, but they're still pretty... sturdy.

1107404119.speaker: 英招
1107404119.content: I want to make one for you too. If you want to come to Sophora Garden more often, I hope that you'll leave traces of yourself behind.

1107404120.content: Perhaps my gaze is burning too hot, because Yingzhao lowers her eyes.

1107404121.speaker: 英招
1107404121.content: Do you remember the riddle from earlier today...? "One person can do it, but two people can't do it together." But we're dreaming together right now.

1107404122.speaker: 英招
1107404122.content: ...Or maybe not. I guess I just planned that all on my own.

1107404123.speaker: 英招
1107404123.content: Life was really hard back then, but here I am, still wishing you could have been there with me. Is it a good thing or a bad thing it's all just a fantasy?

1107404124.speaker: 英招
1107404124.content: I want to know what you think.

1107404125.speaker: 英招
1107404125.content: #{nickname}#, do you want to share this dream with me?

1107404127.content: The heat in our fingers silently entwines, our eyes wholly captivated by each other as our breath and heartbeats grow chaotic.

1107404128.content: We leave the stars and earth behind until it is just the two of us.

415011002.content: Zhiming doesn't lower her head to take a sip of the tea. Instead, she flicks the cup in front of her with her index finger.

415011003.content: The liquid's surface is calm. She rests her cheek in one hand and stares at the tea with a somewhat sharp gaze.

415011004.speaker: 接待员
415011004.content: Professor Zhiming, is something bothering you?

415011005.content: Yes—and it's bothering her a lot.

415011006.content: She thinks this to herself, recalling the infuriating incident from earlier. However, Zhiming deflects with an excuse.

415011007.speaker: 执明
415011007.content: ...It's hot. You can't drink pepper-fruit tea right away.

415011008.speaker: 接待员
415011008.content: Right... So what brings you here today?

415011009.speaker: 执明
415011009.content: You usually welcome me with open arms when I come to the Dai Islands on business trips. You don't want to see me this time?

415011010.speaker: 接待员
415011010.content: That's not it. The higher-ups said you're here on Skycorp business... I wouldn't dream of offending you...

415011011.speaker: 接待员
415011011.content: But as far as I know, you typically go straight to Skycorp instead of coming here for tea.

415011012.speaker: 执明
415011012.content: ...Don't remind me. I started preparing for my meeting with them last night, worked until dawn, and what happened? Skycorp wouldn't even let me in.

415011013.speaker: 执明
415011013.content: They said something like, "The meeting can't start until all of the experts are here..." *Slurp*... Psssh—!

415011014.content: Zhiming gets increasingly flustered as she talks, and she forgets the tea is still scalding. She parts her lips to take a drink but spits it out when it burns her tongue.

415011015.content: She sucks in a few gulps of cold air. Only then does she manage to calm down, suppressing her frustration.

415011016.speaker: 接待员
415011016.content: That must sting, getting turned away at the door... Other than CORG, everyone is so half-hearted... Don't push yourself too hard, Professor Zhiming.

415011017.content: Zhiming's friend pours herself a cup of tea, sets out some pastries, and takes a seat across from her.

415011018.speaker: 接待员
415011018.content: If I were you, I'd probably just head back and sleep for an entire day...

415011019.speaker: 执明
415011019.content: ...You wouldn't be saying that if you read my accident analysis report.

415011020.speaker: 执明
415011020.content: The Cloudsong Ore is agitated. It's only a matter of time before it crashes back to the ground. Think you could sleep through that?

415011021.speaker: 接待员
415011021.content: You don't say... A chunk fell off a few days ago.

415011022.content: If anyone else had told her this, she would just brush it off—but it's coming from Zhiming.

415011023.speaker: 接待员
415011023.content: If it really is that dangerous, then Skycorp is making a big mistake.

415011024.speaker: 执明
415011024.content: Who knows? If Skycorp wants to play dumb, there's nothing I can do about it.

415011025.speaker: 执明
415011025.content: The ore falling isn't what worries me—it's the reason behind it. I need to figure out why this is happening... You're a local. Do you have any suggestions?

415011026.speaker: 接待员
415011026.content: You flatter me. I'm just a business owner—what do I know? But as your friend, I suggest you get some rest.

415011027.speaker: 接待员
415011027.content: If you really can't sleep, take a walk. You might find some clues on the main island.

415011029.content: Zhiming lets out a deep sigh, attempting to cool her tea and clear the storm clouds gathering in her heart.

415011030.speaker: 执明
415011030.content: Could you cool this down a bit?

415021001.content: Blue light blankets the mountains of the main island. The shifting forms of Visbanes seem to dissipate into mist, only to recombine ominously.

415021002.content: Zhiming glances in the direction the Visbanes are approaching. She stops moving forward, instead contacting CORG for help.

415021003.speaker: 执明
415021003.content: I found something. There are Visbanes here on the main island.

415021004.content: A confused exclamation comes from the other end of the call. A few seconds later, they switch to the surveillance feed.

415021005.content: Ethereal Enigma's analysis screen is covered in an alarming red hue, but CORG's monitor only displays a calming green.

415021006.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021006.content: Visbanes? We haven't detected any energy anomalies on our end. I'll have someone double-check.

415021007.speaker: 执明
415021007.content: The mist on this island is acting like some type of energy filter. Just look at what I'm seeing—

415021008.speaker: 执明
415021008.content: The fact you aren't seeing any anomalies is even more concerning. Notify the combat squad to seal off the perimeter immediately. The faster, the better.

415021009.content: Zhiming quickly connects to CORG's mainframe and syncs the data she has collected.

415021010.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021010.content: ...Understood. Leave the main island ASAP and prepare to meet with Skycorp this afternoon.

415021011.speaker: 忧虑的学徒
415021011.content: What are these outsiders going to be able to do? They barely even know what's going on...

415021012.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415021012.content: Exactly. They even sent a teenage girl. What are they thinking?

415021013.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415021013.content: If we can't handle it, those outsiders definitely won't be able t—

415021014.content: The old man helplessly pats the anxious apprentice's shoulder, interrupting him.

415021015.speaker: 天工司老学者
415021015.content: I can see how hard you all have been working.

415021016.speaker: 天工司老学者
415021016.content: The higher-ups know the situation doesn't look good, but they haven't given the order for mandatory evacuation. They're putting a lot of trust into Skycorp, and helping us save face.

415021017.speaker: 天工司老学者
415021017.content: Let's get ready for our meeting this afternoon. Don't think we're just puppets—no one wants this nightmare to become a reality.

415021018.content: "Geostabilizer" data flashes rapidly across a large screen in the middle of the room.

415021019.speaker: 天工司老学者
415021019.content: You have all been invited here because you are experts on Cloudsong Ore technology, so I'll skip the technical details.

415021020.content: The outside researchers sit opposite Skycorp's own research team. An elderly man with silver hair and a cane stands up to speak.

415021021.speaker: 石英
415021021.content: My name is Shiying. I've been researching geological phenomena in Xu Heng for over forty years. I'm also head of the "Geostabilizer" maintenance team.

415021022.content: The silver-haired man stands straight up as he talks, his fingers crossed. He speaks with a slight sense of pride as he continues.

415021023.speaker: 石英
415021023.content: This is footage from the aggregated anchor points on the day of the incident. Take a look.

415021024.content: Zhiming's brow furrows. Along with the others in the room, she watches the footage carefully.

415021025.speaker: 石英
415021025.content: We tried adjusting the device's efficiency to balance out the land coefficient.

415021026.speaker: 执明
415021026.content: But it was ultimately useless. You guys couldn't find a value that would stabilize the land.

415021027.speaker: 石英
415021027.content: The calculation speed couldn't keep up with the rate of change. At first, it was steadily increasing and decreasing, but later, it started fluctuating wildly...

415021028.speaker: 玉京学者
415021028.content: We can skip the detailed explanation—is there a contingency plan?

415021029.speaker: 石英
415021029.content: We've switched to a different energy source to hopefully safely overload it... The workmen are already on their way.

415021031.content: Shiying is abruptly interrupted by a cold laugh. The offending party raises a hand and begins speaking.

415021032.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021032.content: "Safely overload it"... Shiying, I never thought I'd hear those words from your mouth.

415021033.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021033.content: This is the best you could do? That's how you're going to save the Dai Islands?

415021034.speaker: 石英
415021034.content: Yes. It's the most reasonable approach we have at this moment.

415021035.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415021035.content: That's right! We're already urgently developing replacement parts, and we can solve the overloading problem too!

415021036.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415021036.content: It's true! We just need a couple more weeks. Chief! We've identified a pattern in the fluctuations—everything will be fine in a few week's time!

415021037.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021037.content: Enough. You've already replaced more than five parts over the last two months, correct? How can you be sure it won't fail again?

415021038.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021038.content: It's just excuse after excuse. "The parts still need to merge," "The people we sent out need more time to respond"...

415021039.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415021039.content: Those aren't excuses—they're facts! CORG has researchers of its own. If you don't trust us, at least listen to your own people!

415021040.speaker: 科尔盖工程师
415021040.content: Sir, based on the current data, their conclusions hold water. The Geostabilizer really can be repaired.

415021041.content: A momentary silence falls over the meeting. One of the Skycorp apprentices lets out a relieved sigh, but looks up to see a somber expression on the captain's face.

415021042.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021042.content: Let's be clear—CORG won't base its decision to call for mandatory evacuation on technical discussions of "right and wrong." We only consider the risk!

415021043.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021043.content: Are you honestly willing to gamble the lives of tens of thousands of people on a non-zero chance?

415021044.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415021044.content: The workmen from Skycorp left a long time ago— they've been working on the main island for over ten days! It won't be much longer!

415021045.content: Zhiming calmly watches the tense situation play out in front of her. She interrupts in an icy voice.

415021046.speaker: 执明
415021046.content: But according to the "Geostabilizer" refurbishment plan, you need at least three months to fully adjust that thing.

415021047.speaker: 执明
415021047.content: I just got back from the main island. Unfortunately, it seems some problems can't be solved in the short term.

415021048.content: Zhiming connects her communicator to the monitor. In an instant, various red data arrays flash on the screen, leading to gasps from the others present.

415021049.speaker: 科尔盖工程师
415021049.content: The Cloudsong Ore's air buoyancy is still rapidly decreasing... What's going on here? Wasn't the surveillance data all very stable?

415021050.speaker: 执明
415021050.content: That doesn't matter. The "aggregated anchor points" themselves are creating the biggest disturbance.

415021051.speaker: 科尔盖工程师
415021051.content: Then, at the very least, we should wait until we can pinpoint the reason behind the Cloudsong Ore anomaly...

415021052.content: The engineer stops his statement halfway when he realizes the glaring flaw in his statement.

415021053.speaker: 执明
415021053.content: If we could do that, then I wouldn't be here.

415021054.speaker: 执明
415021054.content: The Geostabilizer is deep inside the mountains on the main island. No one knows how to get in.

415021055.speaker: 执明
415021055.content: I'm sure you can already tell, but I personally don't think the maintenance is helping anything. Shiying, you and your team shoul—

415021056.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415021056.content: Sir, we're already precisely targeting those issues... M-Maybe there's another solution! We've already held out this long—we can't just give up now...

415021057.content: The group all turn to look at Shiying, who knows this is the final ultimatum.

415021058.speaker: 石英
415021058.content: Let's go. Lives are at stake. This is no time to be reckless.

415021059.speaker: 石英
415021059.content: We are academics—we must broaden our perspective. That thing is becoming obsolete.

415021060.speaker: 石英
415021060.content: However, it will only... meet its natural end... if an even more incredible invention solves this issue.

415021061.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021061.content: The engineering team is in position. Photon Rail No. 1 and No. 4 will be used in case of emergency evacuation. They will then be destroyed along with the Dai Islands in the disaster. Please maintain communication at all times.

415021062.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021062.content: Evac team—pay attention. The personnel transfer is almost complete. Don't let the people up ahead block the passage behind them!

415021064.content: As she counts down to herself, the first thing to arrive is shock.

415021065.content: An earth-shattering explosion bursts forth, ruthlessly previewing the destructive force that is about to erupt in the sky.

415021066.content: The Dai Islands are engulfed in shadow. Like a fragile shell being gripped by a massive hand, even the core of the Cloudsong Ore begins to splinter.

415021068.content: Someone in the crowd surrounding her calls out, and the explosion suddenly stops, as if it had heard his warning.

415021069.content: The land tilts, rocks, and distorts in midair before finally colliding, raining dust down below.

415021070.content: Even though they are standing on stable ground, the crowd still falls into a worried panic. Everyone makes their way to a more open area.

415021071.speaker: 执明
415021071.content: The land resting on the Cloudsong Ore is breaking apart and falling... It's like the ending to a book.

415021072.speaker: 执明
415021072.content: "Heaven and Earth shape our world, the vast seas cycling into land and back again. Such changes are beyond human control, beyond the vicissitudes of time. All shall ebb and flow, vanishing in the end as misty clouds..."

415021073.content: Zhiming silently recites a passage from the final page of "The Emerald Microcosm," her expression grim.

415021074.content: Nearby, the CORG captain gazes up at the sky, reluctantly shaking her head.

415021075.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021075.content: When the Dai Islands took to the skies, the people of Xu Heng always knew this would happen. Now, the day has really come.

415021076.speaker: 科尔盖工程师
415021076.content: In the coming days, the technical assumptions surrounding the Cloudsong Ore will be debunked, correct?

415021077.speaker: 执明
415021077.content: ...Who knows? You'd better have your researchers get ready for our debrief meeting. There might be a lot more work to do.

415021079.content: The captain sounds somewhat fatigued, but there is also a faint sadness in his tone.

415021080.speaker: 执明
415021080.content: You sounded so decisive when you gave the order. I thought you'd already prepared yourself.

415021081.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021081.content: That was before the evacuation. Watching it fall with my own eyes... is another story...

415021082.content: He sighs, shakes his head, and gazes up at the sky.

415021083.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415021083.content: Actually... I'm from the Dai Islands too.

415031002.content: After being struck by Ethereal Enigma, the odd black haze releases a strange noise and disperses.

415031004.content: Zhiming keeps a cautious distance from the strange, hazy figure, using Ethereal Enigma's ranged attacks to quickly strike and retreat.

415031005.content: The dark cloud separates, swirling into three additional illusory clones.

415031006.content: An eerie wind whips across the battlefield. The monsters formed by the mist suddenly combine, nipping at the girl's shoulders like beasts.

415031008.content: The attack is thwarted as the shield in front of her releases a piercing, scratching sound.

415031009.speaker: 执明
415031009.content: I see... The mist is these Visbanes' body. So it's impossible to kill them in this environment...

415031011.content: The shield's wings unfurl, clamping down on the monster like mining drills and roaring as they begin spinning.

415031012.content: The face of the fake Zhiming created by the haze distorts, her hair scattering before rapidly being sucked into Ethereal Enigma.

415031013.content: Blue data slowly flows into a bottle that Zhiming steadily holds in her hand.

415031014.speaker: 执明
415031014.content: I know it was bad luck running into this thing, but it might be worthwhile if I can analyze the components...

415031015.content: The monster reverses the damage dealt by Ethereal Enigma in just a few short breaths. The hazy figure congeals into a mass again, and a warped smile gradually forms.

415031016.content: As Zhiming spots the monster's twisted grin, she gestures, disgusted, allowing Ethereal Beam to strike the monster head-on once more.

415031017.content: As the haze repairs the damage, the girl summons Ethereal Enigma back to her side.

415031018.content: Naturally, her own Access Key could defeat or even destroy this opponent hundreds of times over, but she sees no point in wasting her energy on an enemy who can't truly be killed.

415031019.content: She strides off, leaving behind the monster as she contacts CORG.

415031021.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415031021.content: Zhiming? We couldn't get ahold of you. Where are you?

415031022.speaker: 执明
415031022.content: I'm on the main island, in the mist. Listen—I'm sure you guys can see what's going on here now.

415031023.speaker: 执明
415031023.content: I collected samples from the source of the mist. There are Visbanes after me. Get your guys ready for combat.

415031024.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415031024.content: We've already ordered a mandatory evacuation!

415031026.speaker: 科尔盖工程师
415031026.content: When the mist covered the main island, the entire city changed. A majority of our data reached the critical threshold! The Dai Islands are about to collapse!

415031027.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415031027.content: Photon Rail No. 1 and No. 4 are being used for emergency evacuation. Pick one and get there ASAP!

415031028.speaker: 执明
415031028.content: ...It might be too late for that. I'll think of something.

415031029.content: Zhiming hangs up, suddenly thankful she hadn't used all of her Divine Grace fighting that monster.

415031030.content: The wilderness is completely silent around her. The occasional dead leaf or branch is blown to Zhiming's feet, as if they are struggling to survive.

415031031.content: A dull cracking sound can be heard in the distance as the wind kicks up dust. Zhiming sprints down the main path between the trees, following the source of the sound. Finally, she comes upon the edge of the floating island and leaps off...

415031032.speaker: 接待员
415031032.content: It must have been terrifying to fall a couple hundred meters through the air like that...

415031033.speaker: 接待员
415031033.content: Where did you run off to when the main island started to collapse? You weren't thrill-seeking or anything, right?

415031034.speaker: 执明
415031034.content: Ahem... No need to freak out... I found a quiet place and caught up on my sleep.

415031036.speaker: 执明
415031036.content: You still have the energy to worry about me? Aren't you out of a job now that the islands collapsed?

415031037.speaker: 接待员
415031037.content: I was just an outsider business owner anyway—I can work anywhere. Anyway, the local merchant's association and Skycorp are up to their ears in work.

415031038.content: The owner smoothes out the wrinkles on her clothes, flashing a bitter smile.

415031039.speaker: 执明
415031039.content: By the way—how are things at Skycorp?

415031040.speaker: 接待员
415031040.content: When everything went down, they were really worried about you.

415031042.speaker: 接待员
415031042.content: Fine. It seems like a few people think... it's a real shame something wasn't recovered from the main island.

415031043.speaker: 执明
415031043.content: ...They blame me for going to the main island without permission.

415031044.speaker: 接待员
415031044.content: If you understood what I meant, why'd you still have to say it out loud?

415031045.content: Zhiming pulls the bottle out of her pocket, examines it, then stashes it again.

415031046.speaker: 执明
415031046.content: ...It's only natural for them to complain—the Dai Islands are gone. I came here for nothing.

415031047.speaker: 接待员
415031047.content: What are you planning next? Gonna head back to Yu Jing? How about a cup of tea first?

415031048.speaker: 执明
415031048.content: No... I have something important to take care of. I need to head back to the lab.

415031049.content: The haze inside the bottle is split into dozens of samples and placed inside sealed devices.

415031050.speaker: 执明
415031050.content: This is the second time I've checked it... How is this possible...?

415031051.content: She stares at the data on her communicator in disbelief.

415031053.content: The monster's sneering hiss seemingly sounds in her ears again.

415041001.content: The AGI Mechas polluted by the Bane Energy blast sudden, blaring alarms. The Bane Energy casts an eerie, disquieting air over the vast mountains of the main island.

415041002.speaker: 执明
415041002.content: The closer I get to the center of the main island, the more Visbanes and polluted AGI Mechas there are... Tch, they're moving in again...

415041003.content: Next to Zhiming, Ethereal Enigma moves at lightning speed. The shield transforms into a blue screen, displaying a conspicuous warning message.

415041004.speaker: 执明
415041004.content: I'm going to be completely surrounded at this rate. It's already come to this...

415041005.content: There is still enough remaining computing power in Zhiming's Access Key. She slowly rises up in the air. After seeing the situation around her for herself, she gives up on fighting the enemies.

415041006.speaker: 执明
415041006.content: No, I can't fight yet. I'm still a long way from the Geostabilizer... If I use up my Divine Power, I'm done for.

415041007.content: After recalibrating the destination to the center of the main island, Zhiming turns off Ethereal Enigma, planning to sneak through the last stretch of the pathway.

415041008.speaker: 执明
415041008.content: The fact I can't fight makes this even more nerve-wracking...

415041009.content: Maneuvering through the mountainous forest consumes more energy than Zhiming had anticipated.

415041010.content: She isn't much of an athlete, so when she finally stumbles over to the flashing device, she nearly collapses.

415041011.speaker: 执明
415041011.content: Hah... ah... if I'd known... I would've contacted CORG... after that fight just now...

415041012.content: Resisting the urge to curl up and rest next to the Geostabilizer, she redeploys Ethereal Enigma as she recovers some of her strength.

415041013.content: She'd found a maintenance manual in the toolbox she'd picked up on the way, and she'd scanned it as she made her way through the woods.

415041014.content: After following the instructions to disassemble the outer casing, Zhiming immediately identifies the abnormality.

415041015.speaker: 执明
415041015.content: There are traces of Bane Energy... but it's not completely destroyed. The core isn't even damaged.

415041016.content: The flowing light is faint. Although there is no irreversible damage, the Geostabilizer is clearly being affected.

415041017.speaker: 执明
415041017.content: The energy core is damaged... the conversion axis is loose...

415041018.speaker: 执明
415041018.content: Why is this sensor only halfway installed...?

415041019.content: As this thought occurs to her, Zhiming reaches out to the sensor. Just when she is about to flip it over, she suddenly spots the toolbox on the ground.

415041020.speaker: 执明
415041020.content: There's an energy core, a conversion axis... but there's no backup sensor...

415041021.speaker: 执明
415041021.content: Bloodstains... It looks like the Visbanes interrupted their maintenance, so they had to use those parts as a last-ditch effort...

415041022.content: She uses Ethereal Enigma to begin charging the Geostabilizer, and the device is soon engulfed by a blue data stream.

415041023.speaker: 执明
415041023.content: This should be the right maintenance process... The next step is...

415041025.speaker: 执明
415041025.content: Damn... Don't screw with me at a time like this...

415041026.content: An AGI Mecha alarm shrieks behind her. Seeing as Ethereal Enigma is unable to perform maintenance and engage in combat simultaneously, Zhiming reluctantly breaks the connection and stands up, prepared to fight.

415041028.content: CORG's call comes through without any action from Zhiming. She stares ahead intently, startled by the officer's impatient outburst.

415041029.speaker: 执明
415041029.content: Spit it out! I'm right next to the Geostabilizer Skycorp was talking about—kinda busy!

415041030.content: As soon as Zhiming says this, the ground suddenly quakes without warning. The communicator held loosely in her hand falls to the ground.

415041031.content: Zhiming sways around like a drunk, her steps wildly unstable. She staggers forward, barely managing to pick up the communicator.

415041032.content: She whirls around to see a large chunk of distorted earth rising slowly behind her.

415041033.speaker: 科尔盖工程师
415041033.content: The Cloudsong Ore's gravity coefficient is shifting!

415041034.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041034.content: Make another model inference with the new data ASAP!

415041035.content: The CORG researchers jump into action, and various analyses pop up on the screen.

415041036.speaker: 执明
415041036.content: Skycorp was right. The Geostabilizer can be repaired to keep the Dai Islands steady again.

415041037.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041037.content: Yes, the data is trending in a positive direction.

415041038.speaker: 执明
415041038.content: I found some of Skycorp's tools and restarted the repair process. Everything happening here is causing the land to react wildly.

415041039.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041039.content: How long will it take to be repaired?

415041040.speaker: 执明
415041040.content: I'll need half an hour to reset it, then another three hours to completely repair it.

415041041.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041041.content: That sounds doable. We can wait t—

415041042.speaker: 执明
415041042.content: No. These fluctuations might spread to the city. It will be safer to evacuate everyone on the Photon Rail first.

415041044.content: The captain's expression is somewhat hopeful, but when she takes a closer look at Ethereal Enigma, her face suddenly shifts.

415041045.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041045.content: Why is there such a high concentration of Bane Energy around you!?

415041046.speaker: 执明
415041046.content: That's the problem. Ethereal Enigma can't repair and fight at the same time.

415041047.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041047.content: I'll immediately notify our combat team to head over and provide backup!

415041048.speaker: 执明
415041048.content: It will take them over half an hour to get here—it's not fast enough. Are you getting my signal? Could you fire some long-rage strikes?

415041049.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041049.content: We can just barely see your location. But the combat team can't make any precise strikes if they can't locate the enemy from your signal.

415041050.speaker: 执明
415041050.content: I'll have Ethereal Enigma guide you. Send some ranged firepower support.

415041051.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041051.content: Understood. Just tell them where to shoot.

415041052.speaker: 执明
415041052.content: These aren't your ordinary Visbanes. They come back after you knock them down, so don't let up until I'm finished over here!

415041053.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041053.content: Roger that! Give us a clear mark—don't get hit by our gunfire.

415041054.speaker: 科尔盖干事
415041054.content: Hang in there for half an hour, then leave the next three hours to us!

415041055.content: Zhiming's heart is pounding rapidly. She touches her chest as she crouches down next to Ethereal Enigma.

415041056.content: She would have to finish the first round of repairs with only CORG's ranged support, all while unable to protect herself.

415041057.content: She connects Ethereal Enigma's sub-machine to CORG's channel, smoothly logging in and establishing a connection.

415041058.content: However, after marking several locations, the expected gunfire doesn't arrive.

415041059.speaker: 执明
415041059.content: Exceeded signal limit!? Damn... I got excited too soon...

415041060.content: The roaring noise gets closer as Zhiming anxiously marks locations on the map displayed by Ethereal Enigma. When the enemy is only around 30 meters away, a wave of gunfire finally rains down from the sky, dispersing the hazy monsters.

415041061.speaker: 执明
415041061.content: I see... The sub-machine has a restricted range since it's separated from the main body... It locks the movement to a circle.

415041062.speaker: 执明
415041062.content: ...This hunk of junk is giving me a real headache.

415041063.content: The shrieks of the Visbanes, along with the AGI Mechas' alarms, grow near once again. Zhiming pumps herself and turns to face them.

415041064.speaker: 忧虑的学徒
415041064.content: Sir, how many more days do you think it can run?

415041065.content: Two anxious young apprentices stand next to the old man, pointing at the machine.

415041066.speaker: 天工司老学者
415041066.content: Thirty, maybe forty days... Evacuating will take time. It's getting down to the wire.

415041067.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415041067.content: We remotely shut down some of the modules that were using a lot of energy, but it's not doing much.

415041068.speaker: 天工司老学者
415041068.content: It's just a quick fix... As long as it's overloading, it will collapse eventually.

415041069.speaker: 天工司老学者
415041069.content: Has our team of workmen been sent yet?

415041070.speaker: 忧虑的学徒
415041070.content: They've already been sent to the main island, but we haven't heard back from them...

415041071.speaker: 天工司老学者
415041071.content: ...I need you to lead the meeting this afternoon.

415041072.speaker: 焦躁的学徒
415041072.content: Uh... Sir, where are you going?

415041073.speaker: 天工司老学者
415041073.content: I'm taking my tools and heading to the Geostabilizer on the main island myself.

415041074.content: The elderly man ambles to a corner of the room, struggling somewhat to pull out a toolbox. When he walks past the communicator, an emergency communication request suddenly sounds.

415041075.content: The man answers the communication. After the caller speaks, the old man and his two apprentices widen their eyes.

415041077.speaker: 执明
415041077.content: Phew... *cough*... Now I just need to connect the hub to the core.

415041078.content: The booming noise of machines grows closer. Although Zhiming tries to hide, the Geostabilizer continues to call Visbanes from the mist and Bane Energy-polluted AGI Mechas toward her.

415041081.content: After processing this good and bad news in her mind, Zhiming continues maneuvering her numb fingers to finish repairing the Geostabilizer.

415041082.content: She had been pushing her Divine Power past the limit to speed up the process, and she is showing clear signs of fatigue.

415041083.content: She hears boots plodding behind her as armed CORG soldiers rush onto the scene. A wave of relief washes over her, but the exhaustion over the past couple of days finally hits her like a brick.

415041084.content: Zhiming staggers and crumples to the ground. She points toward the Visbanes and AGI Mechas as a medic helps her up and rushes her away...

415041085.content: After a long rest in the infirmary, Zhiming awakens late at night as a prompt beeps on her communicator. She opens the message to see a mission brief sent by CORG.

415041086.content: "The incident was mainly due to a combination of external, environmental stress factors."

415041087.content: "Currently, our comprehensive sweep of the main island has not produced any signs of the enemy."

415041088.content: "The situation on the Dai Islands is now stabilized, and the Bane Energy anomalies at the site have disappeared. We will be stationing more personnel to tighten our control over the affected area."

415041089.content: "We greatly appreciate your contributions to the investigation, Professor Zhiming. Please take more caution in the future to avoid hasty decisions."

415041090.speaker: 执明
415041090.content: No Bane Energy? What...? Then what did I see on the main island?

415041091.content: Lights flicker in the dark night outside the window. Zhiming recalls what happened on the main island during the day, feeling completely puzzled.

415041092.speaker: 执明
415041092.content: If I want to figure out what happened, I need to head back to the main island...

1109305024.speaker: 我
1109305024.content: Lean against the window and hug your knees in the standard position.

1109305055.speaker: 我
1109305055.content: I feel like there's more to that.

1109305214.speaker: 我
1109305214.content: Don't even think of slipping away.

1109306082.speaker: 我
1109306082.content: I should've long since been made a director.

1109306095.speaker: 我
1109306095.content: You want me to make the plan, Kuninotokotachi?

1109306115.speaker: 我
1109306115.content: You were also like this back then, Kuninotokotachi.

320541001.speaker: 我
320541001.content: You want to film an ad?

320541002.speaker: 伽梨
320541002.content: Yep. Kubera scraped together a batch of prostheses. They're pretty nice, so we wanna sell them.

320541003.speaker: 我
320541003.content: Why me? Shouldn't you hire a professional actor?

320541004.speaker: 伽梨
320541004.content: Celebrity endorsements don't really work on people in Gharpur. You'd be perfect.

320541005.speaker: 我
320541005.content: Can't you do it? Or Vati?

320541006.speaker: 伽梨
320541006.content: No one will believe it if we brag about our own product! Pleeease? It's just a few lines!

320541007.speaker: 我
320541007.content: Alright, alright. Since it's you asking...

320541008.content: Kali leads me to a small room that looks like a lab before leaving and shutting the door.

320541009.speaker: 伽梨
320541009.content: Hey, can you hear me? Administrator, check out the box in front of you—there's a teleprompter at the bottom. Just read it.

320541010.content: I look up in front of me. As soon as I see the first sentence, a bad feeling creeps over me...

320541011.speaker: 我
320541011.content: "Read the following lines like someone from the Sephirah Zone." What does that mean?

320541012.speaker: 伽梨
320541012.content: Those are just some notes for your performance. Let's get started! Ready, set, action!

320541013.content: Kali suddenly shouts to begin shooting. I barely have enough time to react, so I start reading my lines in a stilted voice.

320541014.speaker: 我
320541014.content: My friends in Gharpur, hello. I am a senior combat expert from Ain Soph...

320541017.speaker: 我
320541017.content: No, no—time out. Are you sure this isn't one of those scam ads for fake meds?

320541018.speaker: 伽梨
320541018.content: Of course not! Wait a sec... Ah! Here it is. "If he gets suspicious, please repeat the following statement..."

320541019.speaker: 伽梨
320541019.content: Ahem. First off, we're selling genuine, quality protheses. Second, saying you're a combat expert isn't a lie.

320541020.speaker: 我
320541020.content: Okay, I'm positive I heard something super suspicious just now!

320541021.speaker: 伽梨
320541021.content: I didn't want to do this either! Kubera said you'd be skeptical if he or Vati asked you, so he had me do it instead.

320541022.speaker: 我
320541022.content: I knew something was off! Even if it's the truth, saying all this stuff is so embarrassing...

320541023.speaker: 伽梨
320541023.content: Help us out, Administrator. Kubera promised this ad would go viral, so we can pay you an endorsement fee!

320541024.speaker: 伽梨
320541024.content: Um, Administrator... the door's locked. You can't leave.

320541025.speaker: 我
320541025.content: ...Is this what it feels like to sell your soul?

320561001.speaker: 我
320561001.content: Kali? Why are you up so late?

320561002.speaker: 伽梨
320561002.content: Oh, I only stay up late once per week. Plus, I could ask you the same question.

320561003.speaker: 我
320561003.content: I'm nocturnal. I'm more active at night.

320561004.speaker: 我
320561004.content: You said you only stay up late once per week—is there a special reason?

320561005.speaker: 伽梨
320561005.content: I wouldn't call it special. I've been really into this show recently, and there are new episodes every week.

320561006.speaker: 我
320561006.content: I didn't peg you as a TV fan.

320561007.speaker: 伽梨
320561007.content: I wasn't before, but this show is really good. I couldn't stop watching after the first episode.

320561008.speaker: 我
320561008.content: I'm intrigued. Mind if I join? What's it about?

320561009.speaker: 伽梨
320561009.content: Of course! The more, the merrier. As for the show, the story focuses on a family.

320561010.speaker: 我
320561010.content: Will it be okay if I just jump in? How many episodes are there already?

320561011.speaker: 伽梨
320561011.content: 1,342 episodes. The story doesn't really matter, so it's fine.

320561012.speaker: 我
320561012.content: That's good. So today will be episode number... Wait a second—how many were there?

320561015.content: Before I can finish speaking, the sound of sobbing comes from the TV.

320561016.speaker: 我
320561016.content: What happened? Why is she crying?

320561017.content: Kali turns around, her eyes filled with tears. When she notices me looking at her, she hastily wipes them away.

320561018.speaker: 伽梨
320561018.content: That girl grew up on the streets of Gharpur. She always thought her parents abandoned her, but she was actually kidnapped.

320561019.speaker: 伽梨
320561019.content: The one crying is her real mom.

320561020.speaker: 我
320561020.content: (So that's the story... I'm starting to understand why Kali likes this show.)

320561021.content: Before I can say anything, impactful music begins to play. The woman who was just sobbing suddenly starts to dance.

320561023.speaker: 伽梨
320561023.content: She's dancing. Why do you look so surprised?

320581001.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320581001.content: You can't see me... You can't see me...

320581003.content: Parvati, who is slumped on a short stool, slowly removes the hand covering her eyes. She then stands up reluctantly, holding the stool.

320581004.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320581004.content: Time to find a new place to hang.

320581006.speaker: 我
320581006.content: A bird? Is it Meruism's pet or something? Why would a bird be in... the boxing gym?

320581007.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320581007.content: Yeah, kinda. It's a big white bird who's lazy and sneaks around all day long.

320581008.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320581008.content: It hides in the boxing gym since I don't like coming here.

320581009.speaker: 我
320581009.content: It doesn't really sound like you're describing an animal...

320581010.speaker: 我
320581010.content: Anyway, do you need a hand?

320581011.content: Parvati yawns, stool in hand, and peers at me closely.

320581013.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320581013.content: Alright—wait here for a few seconds. Then go in through the gym's side door. If anyone asks you a question, no matter what they say, just answer "no."

320581014.speaker: 我
320581014.content: Um... okay. I'm interested in seeing what kind of bird it is.

320581015.content: After waiting a few seconds like Parvati instructed, I walk into the gym. Excitable conversations and the sound of smacking punches hit me like a brick.

320581016.speaker: 拳馆店主
320581016.content: Ahem... Hi, did you book a time slot? Or are you looking for someone?

320581020.content: After answering the owner's questions, I calmly scan my surroundings. Unsurprisingly, I see a white figure squeeze its way through the crowd, and I instantly begin tailing it.

320581021.content: ...Naturally, the person waiting at the door has already appeared with a loud clang.

320581023.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320581023.content: Why am I the only one on call every day next week!?

320581024.speaker: 我
320581024.content: So that's what this is about...

320581026.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320581026.content: I need to make her change the schedule today!

320581027.speaker: 我
320581027.content: Wait, do we need to bring the stool?

320621001.content: Zhiming had invited me to talk, but we sit in silence for a few minutes.

320621002.speaker: 我
320621002.content: Um, Zhiming, was there something important you wanted to talk about?

320621003.speaker: 执明
320621003.content: Well... it's not really a big deal. Did Kali ask you to teach those kids from Meruism yesterday?

320621004.speaker: 我
320621004.content: Ah, yeah. It wasn't like a formal class or anything. I just told them some stories about stuff I'd seen.

320621005.speaker: 执明
320621005.content: Those kids were crowding around you and looked really happy after class though. What's your secret?

320621006.speaker: 我
320621006.content: Secret...? Zhiming, have you taught them before?

320621007.speaker: 执明
320621007.content: Yeah. Kali asked me to teach them some simple math lessons before.

320621008.speaker: 执明
320621008.content: But those kids have started avoiding me ever since I started teaching them. It doesn't really bother me, but...

320621009.speaker: 我
320621009.content: Ohhh, I get it now! Miss Zhiming is worried the kids don't like her enough, huh~?

320621010.speaker: 执明
320621010.content: No, that's not it. I'm just worried it might affect the learning process.

320621011.content: I stare at Zhiming, and she gazes back completely composed. But looking closely, I spot a pink flush forming on her neck.

320621012.speaker: 我
320621012.content: Alright. How do you normally teach them?

320621013.speaker: 执明
320621013.content: I lecture, give them homework, and remind them that we'll have a pop quiz during our next class.

320621014.speaker: 我
320621014.content: I see the problem. You're so scholarly and stoic—the kids are probably a little intimidated by you.

320621015.speaker: 我
320621015.content: It's not a bad thing. But if you want to get closer to them, maybe you could incorporate some fun activities into your class.

320621016.speaker: 执明
320621016.content: Fun activities... I didn't have to worry about this stuff when I was teaching Linyu.

320621017.speaker: 我
320621017.content: That was different. I'm actually going there tomorrow—why don't you make a lesson plan, and we can try it out together?

320621018.content: The second Zhiming enters the classroom, the temperature drops a few degrees.

320621019.speaker: 我
320621019.content: (So this is the legendary vibe of a strict teacher, huh?)

320621020.speaker: 我
320621020.content: Ahem. Miss Zhiming is going to be teaching you today. I'll be her assistant.

320621021.content: Zhiming walks up to the podium, still expressionless. The children all seem to tense up.

320621022.speaker: 执明
320621022.content: Um... For today's class, I'd like to try something new. Would you mind, Administrator?

320621023.speaker: 我
320621023.content: Alright, everyone come here. Each student needs to grab a box of parts.

320621024.speaker: 执明
320621024.content: Get into groups of four and use these parts to build a house. Whoever's house doesn't fall down... will get candy.

320621025.content: The classroom suddenly erupts in excitement, the children's eyes sparkling.

320621026.speaker: 执明
320621026.content: If you have any questions, like about how certain parts work, just let me know.

320621027.content: As soon as Zhiming finishes speaking, students surround her. Some brave kids even try pulling her toward their own groups.

320621029.content: Zhiming turns away slightly, but I still glimpse a faint smile on her lips.

320631001.content: Sunlight streams through gaps in the leaves as Osiris and I stand in front of a billboard. It reads, "Experience the colors of life!"

320631002.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631002.content: It's so pretty! But why does it seem like no one's here?

320631003.speaker: 我
320631003.content: This is Jivitabad's fully automated botanical garden. I heard that the gardening technology here is really advanced. Should we go in and take a look?

320631004.content: It seems I didn't even need to ask. As I ask her, I've already grabbed a guidebook and am planning on buying tickets for Osiris and myself.

320631005.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631005.content: Administrator, look up—those leaves are so big...

320631006.speaker: 我
320631006.content: It's like a ceiling covering most of the garden...

320631007.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631007.content: But even though those plants need a lot of nutrients, they still leave gaps between them to let sunlight pass through. How thoughtful!

320631008.speaker: 我
320631008.content: I think it's called "crown shyness." It's a natural phenomenon, but there's still no explanation for it.

320631009.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631009.content: Well, no matter what, it's nice that all the plants can live in peace without fighting.

320631010.content: She looks at me with a gentle smile as she says this. She seems genuinely happy for those tall trees and their massive leaves.

320631011.content: It's just her own interpretation of the plants' little world, so there's no need to correct her. After all, those trees would never hurt her...

320631012.content: Just as I have this thought, I spin around to discover that Osiris has suddenly vanished!

320631013.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631013.content: Administrator! Don't worry! I'm right here!

320631014.content: Well, the trees might not hurt her, but she definitely messes with me from time to time...

320631015.content: Osiris holds a wide, pliable leaf in front of half of her face, hiding herself amidst the vegetation. She waves at me as I look around frantically.

320631016.speaker: 我
320631016.content: Camouflaging yourself, huh? You didn't tell me we were playing hide and seek. Anyway, I give up. You win.

320631017.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631017.content: Hehe~ Alright, I'll stop teasing you. Let's go look at the shrubs over there.

320631018.content: After walking over together, we stop in front of a colorful herb.

320631020.speaker: 我
320631020.content: The guidebook says it's a mutation of foxtail grass. Its roots and stems are fused together, and its spikes are more colorful.

320631021.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631021.content: Oh. Well, it should be fine if we pull it out of the petri dish... Can I use it to scratch an itch?

320631023.content: I pull one out, handing it to Osiris. The tip of the spike gently tickles her neck.

320631026.content: A kitten struts over to Osiris out of nowhere. She gently rubs its chin as the kitten affectionately nuzzles her ankle.

320631027.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631027.content: Huh? Why are there cats in a botanical garden?

320631028.speaker: 我
320631028.content: "Thalia is often used in various pet toys. Sample products are as follows..."

320631029.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631029.content: So thalia plants are used to...

320631030.speaker: 奥西里斯
320631030.content: Hmph! ...Administrator, you tricked me! You're treating me like a cat again...

320641001.content: After finishing my work early and earning myself some free time, I listen as Osiris reads a story to the children.

320641002.speaker: 奥西里斯
320641002.content: In the end the Sheep decided to trust the Fox. She revealed her hideous scar to all. Far from abandoning the Sheep, everyone gathered around her with kind words and gifts of fresh grass and fruit.

320641003.speaker: 奥西里斯
320641003.content: But it was not so with the passage of time. The Sheep soon noticed the other animals sought her company less often or would quietly avoid her...

320641004.speaker: 奥西里斯
320641004.content: "The sheep can't help but sigh, walking home alone."

320641006.speaker: 弥楼衍孩童A
320641006.content: Miss Osiris, I have a question! What is the fox doing?

320641007.speaker: 弥楼衍孩童B
320641007.content: Yeah! Friends always stick together and help each other out!

320641009.content: As Osiris is about to tell them how the story ends, she suddenly spots me eavesdropping. A faint blush spreads across her cheeks.

320641010.speaker: 我
320641010.content: The fox went to see the sheep, of course. Then, they came up with a plan together.

320641011.speaker: 奥西里斯
320641011.content: Right! It takes time to rebuild a friendship, right?

320641012.speaker: 弥楼衍孩童A
320641012.content: Did the fox pay someone to be the sheep's friend?

320641014.content: ...The kids here are more mature than I thought, asking a question that makes both Osiris and I look down.

320641015.speaker: 弥楼衍孩童B
320641015.content: Um... Vijay and I do that a lot.

320641016.speaker: 奥西里斯
320641016.content: Friendship isn't an excuse to do things like that...

320641017.speaker: 我
320641017.content: At the very least, people aren’t that shallow…

320641018.speaker: 我
320641018.content: The sheep and the fox have to work hard together to grow up and change the way other people see them.

320641020.speaker: 我
320641020.content: And you guys might not know, but the sheep has another really interesting friend.

320641022.speaker: 我
320641022.content: She's always saying things like, "I'll chop anyone who hurts the lamb up and turn them into soup!"

320641023.speaker: 奥西里斯
320641023.content: Well, we shouldn't talk like that. Anyway, we're all friends, so we need to cherish each other.

320641024.speaker: 弥楼衍孩童A
320641024.content: But she sounds cool! If someone hurts one of my friends, I'd do the same thing!

320641025.speaker: 我
320641025.content: Violence isn't the answer. You won't grow big and strong if you act like that—and you'll get bullied. Plus, Big Sis Kali will punish you.

320641027.speaker: 奥西里斯
320641027.content: But... thanks for acknowledging her... I mean, the sheep's friend.

320641028.speaker: 我
320641028.content: Well, she and the sheep had some misunderstandings at the beginning.

320641029.speaker: 弥楼衍孩童B
320641029.content: Huh? It sounds like you know this story even better than Miss Osiris...

320641030.content: Osiris and I share a glance, secretive smiles playing on our lips.

320661001.speaker: 我
320661001.content: Control your mind. Let go of all distractions. Focus on y—

320661002.speaker: 冥王
320661002.content: Ah... Heheh. I thought this was boring and childish at first, but after trying it out, I'm impressed.

320661003.content: Hmm... It seems like she doesn't even need my guidance.

320661004.speaker: 我
320661004.content: R-Really? Other people look more relaxed after meditating, but you look ready to rip someone's throat out...

320661005.speaker: 冥王
320661005.content: What, I'm not allowed to tear stuff to shreds in my own mind? Give me some water.

320661006.speaker: 我
320661006.content: You're supposed to be relaxing—not venting your anger...

320661007.content: She rolls her eyes at me as she gulps down her water. She doesn't snap back at my comment, so she must be in a good mood.

320661008.speaker: 我
320661008.content: Oh well... I guess fighting and killing are ways to find peace too.

320661009.speaker: 我
320661009.content: "The original intent behind this activity is to achieve serenity, but there is nothing wrong with doing it your own way."

320661010.speaker: 冥王
320661010.content: You sure sound confident... Seems like you know a lot about this.

320661011.speaker: 我
320661011.content: Not really. I was just quoting the handbook.

320661012.content: Ausar snatches the handbook from me with a disapproving look.

320661013.speaker: 冥王
320661013.content: "Combining curated luxury and popular events, nurturing a pure heart, and bringing beautiful visions to life..."

320661014.speaker: 冥王
320661014.content: Tch. Can you really have visions just by unlocking your imagination?

320661015.speaker: 冥王
320661015.content: ...They even set aside two whole pages for membership sign-ups. People here are way too easy to fool.

320661016.speaker: 我
320661016.content: Well, it's an ad... Just take those exaggerations with a grain of salt.

320661017.speaker: 我
320661017.content: I've also meditated with Shu after training at Aether Gazer, but we just do it to relieve stress and calm down.

320661018.speaker: 冥王
320661018.content: Oh? I thought you two were constantly busy. You still have time for that?

320661019.speaker: 我
320661019.content: Well, even you said you were impressed, right? It's all about finding peace and tranquility.

320661020.speaker: 冥王
320661020.content: If there's no meaningful change and the problem stays the same, it's just a waste of time.

320661021.speaker: 我
320661021.content: I see... So you think it's just a band-aid solution. But it's nice to escape, right?

320661022.content: Ausar tosses the handbook back to me. I throw it aside with a wry smile.

320661023.speaker: 我
320661023.content: Anyway, it's rare that we have a common hobby.

320671002.speaker: 我
320671002.content: Ver, why are you mumbling with your eyes closed?

320671003.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671003.content: Ah, Administrator. I want to make the curry meat we had last time.

320671004.speaker: 我
320671004.content: Then... why aren't you in the kitchen?

320671007.speaker: 我
320671007.content: You're just using your imagination? That's interesting... When it comes to stuff like cooking, don't you have to get your hands dirty to learn?

320671008.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671008.content: You don't get it—if you want to make yummy food, you have to start cooking in your mind first!

320671010.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671010.content: That's how I learned to bake.

320671011.speaker: 我
320671011.content: Well, your steps to baking are just "put it there, turn it over, move it down"...

320671012.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671012.content: It's the same with curry meat! Just hold your breath, concentrate, and go through the process in your mind, then... voila! You know how to do it!

320671013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671013.content: Practicing like that is called meditation!

320671014.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671014.content: It can "improve sleep, reduce stress, boost concentration, and help you find meaning and purpose in your life"...

320671015.speaker: 我
320671015.content: Well, other than that last part, meditation and eating are pretty similar...

320671016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671016.content: Yep! I combined eating and meditation! Pretty creative, right?

320671017.content: Ver points with her index finger, speaking triumphantly.

320671018.content: Her big blue eyes look at me expectantly, so I oblige, nodding.

320671019.speaker: 我
320671019.content: But if you count meditation as eating, even after a dozen meals, you still can't get the food you crave. Isn't that kind of miserable?

320671020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671020.content: I guess you're right... Now that you mention it, I'm getting hungrier and hungrier...

320671021.content: Ver looks at me, rubbing her stomach.

320671022.speaker: 我
320671022.content: Cooking with your brain can't satisfy your stomach. Let's go grab a bite together...

320671023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671023.content: Hold on, Administrator! I have an idea! We can get the best of both worlds!

320671024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320671024.content: Let's order some takeout! We can sit here and meditate about how to make it while we wait. Then it'll be like we make it ourselves!

320681003.content: Ver's lazy voice sounds from her bed.

320681004.speaker: 我
320681004.content: Have you thought about waking up anytime soon...? Our mission starts in twenty.

320681005.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681005.content: I know... Gimme five more minutes... ugh...

320681006.speaker: 我
320681006.content: You said that five minutes ago.

320681007.content: I leave the room helplessly. As usual, she can't break her bad habit of sleeping in.

320681008.content: In the end, she finally wakes up.

320681009.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681009.content: Phew! I almost overslept. What's on the agenda again...? Buying stuff at the black market?

320681010.speaker: 我
320681010.content: That's just a cover. We need to look around the area to develop an emergency plan.

320681011.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681011.content: Then... should we disguise ourselves? Like, pretend to be tourists or something?

320681013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681013.content: Whoa! Did you bring all this stuff last time you went to Xu Heng and Omorfies too!?

320681014.speaker: 我
320681014.content: Well, it's precisely because I've been to so many places that I put a lot of energy into disguises and recon.

320681015.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681015.content: Hmm... I read your mission records from Sasanami. You ran into a lot of danger back then...

320681016.speaker: 我
320681016.content: What can you do? You have to put yourself in danger during missions. Gharpur is a little wilder than I imagined—it isn't much better than Shimogyou in Sasanami. We need to be prepared.

320681017.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681017.content: Don't worry! I won't leave your side. I'll make sure that kind of thing doesn't happen again!

320681018.content: Perhaps due to the local customs here, I can't help feeling like Ver has been more straightforward recently.

320681019.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681019.content: Hmph! Let's see who has the nerve to bully you! Hahaha... Administrator? What are you doing...?

320681020.content: Ver pouts, shaking her arms back and forth seriously. I can't help but laugh, reaching out to pinch her shoulder and gently tickle her.

320681021.speaker: 我
320681021.content: Okay, okay. I know you're super awesome now...

320681022.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681022.content: Hehe~ You can go get ready first. I'll rate your disguise!

320681023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681023.content: Administrator, you're wearing your mask upside down! Let me get you a new one.

320681024.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681024.content: Administrator! The knot on your tie needs to be a little higher...

320681025.speaker: 我
320681025.content: Stop, stop, stop... You're gonna... choke m—

320681026.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320681026.content: Those sunglasses make you look so old! Hahahaha!

320681027.speaker: 我
320681027.content: I look more like a burglar than a tourist...

320681028.content: I know she's laughing at me, but it's such a sweet sound.

320701001.speaker: 我
320701001.content: Do you guys want to pick out some protheses?

320701002.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320701002.content: Let's take a look! After all, protheses are pretty rare in Ain Soph.

320701003.speaker: 我
320701003.content: Each Sephirah Zone develops pretty independently. Other zones still use exoskeletons and other equipment. Only Shashvat... Ah, Osiris, are you going to pick some out too?

320701004.speaker: 奥西里斯
320701004.content: Yeah...! Only because they look pretty cool.

320701006.speaker: 我
320701006.content: How about this one? A hand prosthesis could improve your flexibility, and this attached blade is pretty cool... even though it's a little long.

320701007.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320701007.content: A three-meter-long blade hanging off my arm? Um, I mean... This one looks pretty cool.

320701008.speaker: 奥西里斯
320701008.content: But... Ver, it might look scary after you put it on. What if...

320701009.content: Osiris whispers something in Ver's ear. She suddenly goes pale, quickly shaking her head.

320701010.speaker: 我
320701010.content: If you don't like it, let's check out the next one.

320701011.speaker: 我
320701011.content: This one isn't bad. It's implanted throughout your body, promoting circulation and enhancing your athletic ability. I wonder how it would work for a Modifier?

320701012.speaker: 我
320701012.content: It's even red and green. Even though you can't see it after it's implanted... it's pretty perfect for you guys.

320701013.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320701013.content: Implanted throughout my body? That sounds like it might hurt...

320701014.speaker: 我
320701014.content: Of course it won't. Shashvat's prosthetic implant technology is really advanced. Kali can recommend the best doctor for you. Want to give it a try?

320701015.speaker: 奥西里斯
320701015.content: Administrator, your smile is kind creepy...

320701016.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320701016.content: We'll pick them ourselves! I think this one is nice.

320701017.speaker: 我
320701017.content: A... bionic patch? It can display 108 patterns that are popular in Gharpur on your skin, including wild beast stripes, a six-pack, a cute angel...

320701018.speaker: 我
320701018.content: Tch... Osiris, you like this one too?

320701020.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320701020.content: There's a trial room over there where you can simulate the final product. Come check it out with us, Administrator.

320701021.speaker: 我
320701021.content: Really? Ah... that glass room, right?

320701022.content: The two girls push and pull me over to the glass room, and I walk in with a smile. I turn around, noticing that they have already withdrawn to the outer room, locking me in.

320701023.speaker: 薇儿丹蒂
320701023.content: We got you, Administrator! Wow, I can't believe I actually tricked you...

320701024.speaker: 我
320701024.content: You were behind this, huh, Ver? No surprises there.

320701026.speaker: 我
320701026.content: Well, you can't run either, Lil' Osi. Take another look—it seems like the labels have been moved around. Which one's the trial room, and which one's the operating room?

320701027.content: The girls look at the label, their mouths agape, but it's too late for them to run. I reach out and close the door to the trial room.

320701028.speaker: 我
320701028.content: You guys chose that prosthesis yourself, right? Who's first? Ver, or Osiris?

320711001.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320711001.content: *Yawn*... Kubera's gone. Should we place our bets?

320711002.speaker: 梵天
320711002.content: Count me in! I'm guessing thirteen.

320711003.speaker: 伽梨
320711003.content: You're so cruel, Boss... I'll guess three.

320711004.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
