320711004.content: Alright. Then I'll go in the middle, and I'll wager eight boxes of chocolate bars.

320711005.speaker: 伽梨
320711005.content: I raise you one butter chicken.

320711006.content: As soon as I exit the elevator, a casual conversation in the lobby draws my attention. Three people lounge around the room, the table filled with milk tea and snacks.

320711007.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320711007.content: Ah, you're here... Wanna throw your hat in the ring?

320711008.speaker: 我
320711008.content: You have to tell me what you're betting on first, right?

320711009.speaker: 梵天
320711009.content: How many fights Kubera is gonna get in during this trip~

320711011.speaker: 伽梨
320711011.content: Boss... act a little more professional in front of our guest...

320711012.speaker: 伽梨
320711012.content: We're betting on how many people get in Kubera's way while he's out.

320711013.speaker: 伽梨
320711013.content: But no need to worry—Kubera knows the Affluent District like the back of his hand. He'll be fine. In fact, he brings back new "jokes" every time he goes there.

320711014.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320711014.content: Huh? He's going to the Affluent District this time?

320711015.speaker: 伽梨
320711015.content: Yeah. He left right before you came down. Why?

320711016.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320711016.content: He only takes the sports car when he goes to the Affluent District... So we're not betting on how many parts the old off-road car is going to lose...?

320711017.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320711017.content: Yesterday, I saw an obvious problem with some numbers in the black market account book. Why isn't he going to the black mar— Ah. I get it now. He changed his plan at the last minute...

320711018.speaker: 伽梨
320711018.content: Vati, you want the stuff the boss is wagering that bad? Uh... did you mess with the old car parts?

320711019.content: Parvati lowers her hand from her face, looking at Kali blankly. A heavy silence hangs in the air.

320711020.content: A Meruism member who took the old car to assist Kubera is probably picking up headlights off the road right about now...

320711021.speaker: 我
320711021.content: Wait—I have a question. What did Brahmā wager that Vati wants so bad?

320711024.content: Kali and Parvati give each other a strange look, then glance back at me. However, they remain silent.

320711025.content: Before I can ask further, my vision falls into darkness as my body goes limp. Brahmā rushes over and snarls, hanging on me like a cat.

320711026.speaker: 梵天
320711026.content: Curious? Try it out for yourself, Mr. Admin!

320721002.speaker: 我
320721002.content: I smelled something amazing as soon as I woke up. I had to see what you were cooking.

320721003.speaker: 伽梨
320721003.content: This batch of curry is almost ready. I was just about to bring some to your room. Want to try it first? Open wide~

320721006.speaker: 伽梨
320721006.content: Here, have some cold milk. Doesn’t it feel like your drowsiness just disappeared?

320721007.speaker: 我
320721007.content: Phew~ Yeah, I feel like a new man. Why would someone wake themselves up like that?

320721009.speaker: 伽梨
320721009.content: Why are you guys up so early? What do you have planned for today?

320721010.speaker: 梵天
320721010.content: Ugh... Vati said we can't ignore our guests, so she dragged me out of bed...

320721011.speaker: 伽梨
320721011.content: You two need to be more conscious of your image. Open up—one spoonful each.

320721012.speaker: 梵天
320721012.content: *Cough, cough*... Whew! Morning! You're getting better at cooking, Kali~

320721013.speaker: 我
320721013.content: So it's just a substitute for coffee!?

320721014.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320721014.content: It's more like an alarm clock... How'd you sleep last night?

320721015.speaker: 我
320721015.content: Pretty well. The smell of spices in my room was surprisingly relaxing.

320721016.speaker: 伽梨
320721016.content: Happy to hear it. By the way, Administrator—do you want a more traditional curry with coconut milk, or one with chocolate?

320721018.speaker: 梵天
320721018.content: Hahaha~ Well, it is your first time in Gharpur. No wonder you can't tell them apart.

320721019.speaker: 梵天
320721019.content: It's fine~ We'll try a new flavor today. I'll have Kubera pick up some ingredients you guys are more familiar with.

320721020.speaker: 我
320721020.content: Oh? What about the curry Kali already made?

320721021.speaker: 梵天
320721021.content: All of the kids need to eat too.—they'll finish it. Kali, you need to show Mr. Admin what a talented chef you are~

320721022.speaker: 伽梨
320721022.content: Eh? But what if the Administrator doesn't like it...

320721023.speaker: 梵天
320721023.content: If you're not up for it, why don't I cook a few dishes instead?

320721024.speaker: 伽梨
320721024.content: No! I'll do it! Just leave it to me!

320721025.speaker: 梵天
320721025.content: Hehe, mission successful. Mr. Admin, get ready to enjoy a delicious Ain Soph curry~

320721026.speaker: 我
320721026.content: After all that... it's still curry!?

320731001.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320731001.content: You're here. You weren't followed, right?

320731002.speaker: 伽梨
320731002.content: Everyone went to bed a long time ago. Who else would come to the warehouse this late?

320731003.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320731003.content: Good. We'll start as soon as he delivers the goods...

320731004.speaker: 我
320731004.content: ...Did I accidentally stumble onto a huge secret?

320731005.speaker: 梵天
320731005.content: Oh? Look what the cat dragged in. Are you lost, Mr. Admin~?

320731006.speaker: 梵天
320731006.content: Wanna guess what might happen if you eavesdrop on gang business, Mr. Admin?

320731007.speaker: 我
320731007.content: Uh, can I pretend I was just passing by?

320731008.speaker: 梵天
320731008.content: What a flimsy excuse~ Vati, what do you think we should do?

320731010.speaker: 我
320731010.content: Wait, let's talk this out! There has to be another way!

320731011.speaker: 梵天
320731011.content: Be good and do as you're told, and maybe I'll let you go~

320731012.speaker: 我
320731012.content: ...Looks like I don't have a choice.

320731014.speaker: 我
320731014.content: Ahem, you're the contact, right? Don't move.

320731015.speaker: 我
320731015.content: The password is... "O Brahmā, brave and wise"...

320731016.speaker: 俱毗罗
320731016.content: ..."Your reign encompasses all." Administrator? What are you doing here?

320731018.speaker: 我
320731018.content: The goods you guys are buying are... glow-in-the-dark watches!?

320731019.speaker: 俱毗罗
320731019.content: As long as those companies have blockades on Gharpur, tech products are always hard to come by.

320731020.speaker: 伽梨
320731020.content: I wanted to surprise the kids, so...

320731021.speaker: 我
320731021.content: ...Why didn't you say something sooner!? You scared me to death!

320731022.speaker: 帕尔瓦蒂
320731022.content: Boss Brahmā probably thinks you're fun to mess with.

320731023.speaker: 梵天
320731023.content: Okie-dokie~ I'll watch after you from now on as thanks, Mr. Admin.

320731024.speaker: 梵天
320731024.content: After all, we're in this together, right~?

320182084.content: There's nothing dark about that, right?

320261008.content: Maybe life always moves in cycles.

910303001.content: Ookuninushi is looking for me, so I proceed in the direction of the place marked on the map...

910303002.content: Is this the rendezvous point? Is this... a restaurant?

910303003.content: There you are. Let's head in.

910303004.content: Alright. Come to think of it, it seems unusual that you want to meet outside the office.

910303005.content: That should tell you how important the matter we have to discuss is.

910303006.content: But before we get down to business... What do you think of this place, Admin?

910303007.content: That's a pretty broad question, I'm not sure how to answer. At a glance, it looks like a restaurant well-located. The decor is pretty impressive, too. I'm guessing this place is popular.

910303008.content: Correct. This is a prime location to open a restaurant.

910303009.content: The decor is courtesy of our newest business partner,Tian Lu Traders. I'm rather pleased with the results myself.

910303010.content: It's in this prime location and environment... that the Cryptics plan to open a restaurant.

910303011.content: The Cryptics? Open a restaurant? Why? Wait... Don't tell me you plan on running some shady experiment here?

910303012.content: Not at all. I think it'll be a great way to raise research funds.

910303013.content: Shu is in charge of the Cryptics' budget, and you know how... austere she can be. So, I plan to run my own restaurant to pad out the budget.

910303015.content: Now for the important matter: Frankly, there's not enough of us in the Cryptics to manage everything by ourselves.

910303016.content: If you could help with the groceries and a few other tasks, that would be great... Of course, it might be difficult to do it all by yourself, so you could invite others to help you.

910303017.content: So... You want me to find people to run errands for you...

910303018.content: Well, it doesn't sound great when you say it like that... But yes, that's the gist.

910303019.content: Still, I'm sure you understand our predicament. I'll pay you for your troubles, of course. So, will you help?

910303020.content: ...Heh. I guess I don't have much of a choice.

910303021.content: Don't worry about paying me. I'll help you out... if you give me a permanent discount at this place.

910303022.content: Oh! Of course, have whatever you'd like on the house!

910303023.content: Alright, I'm counting on you, then.

910303024.content: And that's how we began running a restaurant together.
